job_desc: This is going to be your job This traineeship gives you the chance to work with data information products  Not just working on them  but building them yourself  And all this in a domain of interest to you  such as fixed income  equity or alternative investments  Or an area that matches your studies and interests  You will study APG real estate  for example  and translate it into a sustainability classification  Or discover how APG invests in ESG and develops products like carbon reporting or physical climate risk dashboards  You will be given the freedom to use your fresh university knowledge and to work autonomously  In fact  your teammates would love to be amazed by your out of the box ideas  Quote of Trainee Stefan Belleflame   As a Trainee  I was given the freedom to put my ideas into practice  During the first months  I developed a dashboard that assists APG in daily operations  It feels amazing to build a valuable tool that your colleagues can rely on  In addition  I got all the support I needed throughout the project  including trainings for personal skill development  The Trainee program allows you to choose your own assignments  which works great for steering your career opportunities and seeing as much of APG as possible   Of course you will be working together with various teams  so you can also master the day to day work  the show must go on  This enables you to experience the fact that APG Asset Management has all the necessary expertise in all asset classes at its fingertips  That formal reporting to AFM and DNB is important  And that APG Asset Management has a wealth of data  Are you interested in data  If so  you are free to do an assignment in this subject as well  You are given the opportunity take a look behind the scenes  where does the data come from  And how do you turn it into usable information  In short  you get to see how the process of back   mid  and front office goes and how the added value increases  Why start your career at APG  Because APG Asset Management  Is the largest pension investor in the Netherlands with 627 billion euros assets on the management and among the top five worldwide  Manages most investments and support processes in house  Owns a wealth of cool data sets  Offers an ideal environment for orientation and learning  Leads the way in sustainable investment  This is what you offer Master s degree in Business Intelligence  Data Analytics  Information Management  Business Economics e g  Accounting  Controlling  Finance or other business data oriented emphasis with outstanding study results  A maximum of two years  work experience  Broad ranging extra curricular development is a plus  e g  committee or board membership  volunteer work   Fluency in English  additionally  fluency in Dutch is a plus   Motivation and drive to learn tooling like QlikSense Dashboard and SAS enterprise Guide and programming languages such as R   Python  Basis knowledge of data analytics  but moreover the motivation to learn  Affinity with investment   net assue value  does make sense to you  Attention to detail  ambitious  analytical  critical and digital minded  This is where you ll work In the Traineeship of APG  You work on 4 assignments over a period of 2 years  each assignment is in another team and lasts 6 months  You will get a job offer on the track that you previously selected and worked for 2 years  You will have ample opportunity to do assignments in line with your field of interest  You will undergo a sharp learning curve  both personally and professionally  You will have your own mentor guiding you throughout the traineeship  By gaining two years of different experiences  you will find a position job that suits you best  In case of a successful traineeship your contract will be converted to a permanent employment contract  We offer you a competitive salary of max    3 385 00 based on a 40 hours working week and attractive terms of employment with a focus on flexibility  A guaranteed year end bonus of 8 33   Ample attention to your vitality and personal development  Hybrid working  at home and in one of our superb offices  And of course a well organized pension  For pension provider APG  pensions are about people  life and how we live together  Through careful asset management  pension administration  communication and advice  APG wants to help build a decent future in which we share our well being and prosperity honestly and sustainably  For present and future generations  For today  tomorrow and beyond  APG is committed to serving 4 7 million people in the Netherlands  That explains the importance we attach to reflecting Dutch society  To that end  APG strives for an inclusive work environment in which everyone can be themselves and their unique qualities are embraced  Choosing APG means choosing a job in which you contribute to a bright future  Don t delay  apply today

their future  We see you  with your skills  personality and dreams  Now let s take it to even greater heights by means of one of our traineeships We are Mploy Associates  a talent focused consultancy firm ready to make not only our clients  teams successful but also you  Your talent  our focus More specifically We are a consultancy firm specialized in the areas of data  finance and risk and work on a variety of projects like investment analyses  data engineering  quant modelling and much more  Our clients are banks  insurance companies  asset managers  pension funds and we are still expanding We help our clients build successful teams by providing the rights skills  talents and knowhow at the right place and time and develop ourselves continuously to stay successful  We believe that investing in talent through proven methods always pays out  Today we are proud to say that we are an international driven company with more than 80 people and many top tier clients who share the same vision How you fit into this vision You will work as a Data Expert for one of our clients with a special focus on your own development through one of our Talent Programs  Our Talent Programs are designed to accelerate your career from a junior to medior  level within 24 months  By means of certified training courses  coaching and intervision sessions our employees follow an above average steep career curve  Successful graduation in our Talent Programs usually results in a permanent medior  or senior position at one of our clients where it becomes your responsibility to keep the team successful Your activities as a Data ExpertYour responsibilities will include collecting  interpreting  and processing large datasets  You often have to investigate and edit the sources of this data yourself  by using SQL  SAS  and or Python  You select the relevant variables  edit the data  and apply the business rules  On top of that  you can also be involved in data engineering projects where you are building platforms or data warehousing  Examples of your day to day responsibilities are Discussing data requirements for different quantitative modelsMaking an inventory of the relevant databases within the bank and gaining access to themMerging  joining and aggregating tables in SQL  SAS and or PythonDevising and applying data quality analyzes  e g   identifying trends over time  missing values  and extreme values Visualize data by means of interactive dashboardsInvestigating the plausibility of the new dataDeveloping data lakes and pipelines in Microsoft Azure  AWS or HadoopDocumenting the data sourcing process and descriptive statistics whilst discussing this with the business unitsFurthermore  you will be the main point of contact for different stakeholders who would like to understand the data as well as you do What are we looking for For the position Data Expert we are looking for graduates with different data related backgrounds  experiences  and passions  To specify You have 0 3 years of work experience and want to learn everything about big data and the processing of this kind of dataYou want to put your data related knowledge that you have gained during your master into practice  e g   Data Science  Computer Science  Artificial Intelligence  Aerospace Engineering or another related study You have experience with programming in SQL or at least are an expert in working with large data filesYou are ambitious  self reflective and dare to be confident in an authentic wayYou do not hesitate to use your analytical skills to solve complex problems in a creative and logical wayYou are energized by stakeholder management and you are well adept at gathering reliable information What do we offer We offer the opportunity to become an expert in data analysis in an environment where we train you in a proven way to excel into a high end professional  In addition  good working conditions are just as important to us  This includes the following Working 4 days a week at a large bank or insurance company in Amsterdam  Utrecht  Rotterdam or The Hague1 day a week in house training with personalized and professional coachingRegularly fun team adviseur voor data   analytics toepassingen voor OHRA Schade  en Zorgverzekeringen  Het salaris voor deze functie betreft tussen de   4000 en   6000  afhankelijk van jouw kennis en ervaring  Dit is op basis van een 36 urige werkweek  exclusief een 13e maand en vakantiegeld  Jouw impact als Data Analist bij OHRA Jij zet al onze data in om impact te maken voor OHRA  Door verschillende databronnen aan elkaar te koppelen kom je tot heldere inzichten en adviezen voor OHRA en Schade en Inkomen  Met jouw analyses en conclusies lever je een proactieve bijdrage aan de groeiambities van OHRA  Met je Data Traineeship Focusgebied Data   Logistiek   Techniek Locatie Heel Nederland Dagelijks vervoert Arriva 500 000 reizigers naar hun bestemming  Hier gaat een complex logistiek proces achter schuil  waar tevens een grote hoeveelheid waardevolle data achter vandaan komt  Er liggen volop kansen om deze schatten aan informatie nog meer te benutten  data boven het oppervlak te krijgen en trends te ontdekken  Als data science trainee is het aan jou om haarscherpe analyses te maken en voorspelmodellen te ontwikkelen  waarop het management zichtbaar anticipeert en toekomstige beslissingen op baseert  Natuurlijk verwachten we niet van jou dat je al op je eerste dag een grootheid bent in data science  Je hebt wel een sterke drang om je zowel professioneel als persoonlijk te ontwikkelen  Zo kun jij het verschil maken  het vakgebied verder brengen en eraan bijdragen dat Arriva als bedrijf nog meer data gedreven gaat werken  Zowel op ons hoofdkantoor  in de 5 regio s als binnen Assetmanagement liggen complexe vraagstukken waar jij je tanden in mag zetten  Begeleiding en Training Naast je manager als eerste aanspreekpunt in de business  word je gekoppeld aan een personal coach  een buddy en een mentor  Jouw coach ondersteunt jou in je persoonlijke  en loopbaanontwikkeling en helpt je bij het opstellen van je persoonlijk ontwikkelplan  POP   Je buddy  ex trainee  maakt je wegwijs in de organisatie  Een mentor is een collega met een senior functie die bij kan dragen aan jouw professionele ontwikkeling  Bovendien biedt Arriva georganiseerde trainingen met andere trainees  word je lid van de Graduate Club en Young Arriva  Programma opzet Het Traineeship is opgedeeld in drie blokken waar je inhoudelijk de diepte in kunt  Opleiding en ontwikkeling  De eerste 2 maanden van jouw traineeship staan in het teken van opleiding en ontwikkeling  Je maakt kennis met de techniek achter de data en je leert de ins en outs van de applicatie Hastus  Daarnaast volg je een cursus Power BI en andere analysetools  aangevuld met extra DAX training en programmeren met Python  afhankelijk van kennisniveau bij onboarding   En je loopt mee met onze BI analisten binnen Datawarehouse  Aan de hand van concrete opdrachten uit de praktijk werk je in onze self service omgeving en ga je aan de slag met het bouwen van dashboards en maken van analyses Bouwen  voorspel modellen en toepassen econometrische analyses  je draagt dagelijks bij aan het realiseren van een zero emissie exploitatie van het openbaar vervoer  komt tot een optimalisatie van complexe vervoersstromen of een kostenbesparing  Denk daarbij ook aan het maken van commerci�le analyses  gebruikersdata van de nieuwe app  Glimble  t b v  de verdere uitrol van Mobility as a Service Projectmatig werken  je werkt mee in onze strategische programma s  reizigers terug in het OV  Maatschappelijk Verantwoord Ondernemen en  wendbaarheid  Kortom  een diversiteit aan werkplekken binnen een innovatieve   inter nationale logistieke omgeving  Op deze manier krijg je een goed beeld van de organisatie en ervaar je in de praktijk welke functie het beste bij je past  Je zult bovendien merken dat Arriva een bedrijf is waar de lijnen kort zijn en er ruimte is voor ontwikkeling en vernieuwing  Doorloop je het Traineeship met succes  dan kun je een vaste aanstelling krijgen voor bijvoorbeeld de functie van data scientist  vervoerkundig analist of commercieel analist  Wat biedt ArrivaIntensieve Begeleiding  Coaching  Mentoring  Buddyschap en Training Marktconform As a Data Scientist you ll delight our clients by transforming giant  complex datasets to awesome and relevant insights  You re resourceful in finding additional data sources and recoding variables  You don t just try to understand the past  you predict the future  You have knowledge of and experience with applying machine learning in a practical setting  where you ll turn a good model into a great one  You communicate and present results convincingly  to create real and lasting impact  What s in it for you  On top of excellent employment conditions  working at IG H will kickstart your career through the steep learning curve  Apart from learning on the job  there will be ample trainings to boost your core consulting and people skills through the Consultant Development Program  CDP   You will be assigned involved coaches  who will be there for you to provide you with guidance  Next to that  IG H offers you an inspiring office in Utrecht  an unparalleled good working atmosphere  and abundant parties  team activities and sporting events   The most beautiful thing about consulting is the diversity within the projects  IG H offers next to different clients  a variety in the types of assignments  One assignment could be very strategic  in which yououtline the direction of a company  Whereas another assignment could be focused on implementation  in which you are working together with the client to deliver concrete results   Peter Hardy  Manager  What we ask  MSc degree at least 2 years of relevant work experience within a consulting environment Analytical  inventive and practical Python and or R skills What we offer you Working at a Great Place to Work with a pleasant atmosphere and enthusiastic colleagues who support you  The chance to make a real contribution to the ongoing domestic and international growth of IG H  We offer a permanent  indefinite  contract right away  Excellent salary and working benefits  company car   good mobility scheme  Generous bonus scheme  25 holiday days with the possibility to take up more  The possibility to take a sabbatical after 3 years of employment  and more  which we would love to elaborate on  Why IG H  IG H is advice  great design and unrivalled digital platforms  Our exceptional results come from successfully aligning people  business and technology  With over 300 talented colleagues on board  people who genuinely embrace change and challenges  we ve created a unique high daring  high caring culture  Attracting extraordinary people and inspiring them to push the boundaries for themselves and our clients Now   are you excited  If this vacancy is right for you  then this is a great place to work with super happy employees and clients  NPS   60   On top of that  we re hitting double digit growth processes  and you do not give up until you completely understand a problem   You can work under pressure  and you live and breathe data  In fact  when you gaze at the Stars  you can identify Facts is impeccable and your communication skills top notch  allowing you to operate comfortably and connect easily with everyone in our organization   Responsibilities Fetch and thoroughly analyze operational and client data Develop and encourage the adoption of PowerBI reporting Support the data automation process and encourage innovation in 5CA s data information structure Support and work closely with Data Analysts and Senior Data Analysts in the team Proactively provide root cause analysis and improvements analysis based on data to various Operations Stakeholders  Bachelor s degree  preferably in the field of Economics  Business  Informatics  Econometrics  Computer Science  or similar Prior experience in the field of data analysis and statistical modeling Business acumen  you understand a growing company s needs  and can help empower and enable us to grow further by utilizing data effectively The ability to take data sets and extract valuable insights to help optimize various business processes Working knowledge of advanced Excel  SQL  R  and or Python  Star model  PowerBi  or Tableau Fluency in verbal and written English We offerA fast growing organization  double digit growth   and international  inclusive company culture  An inspiring environment with young  brilliant  and creative professionals with which you will have lots of fun working together  Continuous learning and plenty of opportunities for growth within your field of expertise  About Us  5CA provides people around the globe with outstanding customer support  We use their preferred channel  in their own language  at the time that is most convenient to them  We love hiring and working with geeks  people who are enthusiastic and engaged with gaming  tech  and digital topics  It is our successful Work From Home program that allows us to attract similarly minded and highly talented people  without being limited by geography  We re passionate in what we do  deliver a great customer experience  And most of all we re passionate about who we work with

Wij zijn op zoek naar een Data Analist Wij zijn per direct op zoek naar een enthousiaste Data Analist om ons team te komen versterken  Wil jij onze business ondersteunen door middel van het analyseren van data en onderdeel uitmaken van een jong  groeiend en dynamisch bedrijf  Grijp dan nu deze unieke kans Dit ga je doen  Als Data Analist ondersteun je de Controller en directieleden bij de financi�le huishouding  Voornamelijk houd jij je bezig met analyseren van data  Je inventariseert daarbij continu de wensen en behoeften van de interne klant  Het doel is de directieleden van de Werken als Data analist en bijdragen aan een klimaat robuust en waterbestendig Nederland voor huidige en toekomstige generaties  Duik in de wereld van Waterschap Vallei en Veluwe  Met ruim 550 medewerkers werken wij iedere dag aan veilige dijken  gezuiverd afvalwater en schoon en voldoende water in sloten  beken en kanalen  Het omvormen van data naar stuurinformatie middels rapportages en adviezen speelt daarbij een belangrijke rol  Het Uitvoeringsteam  UVT  heeft als taak de gemeentelijke partners en het waterschap te ondersteunen op het gebied van meten en monitoren in het stedelijk watersysteem  We doen dit onder andere door het continue valideren en analyseren van meetgegevens en daar adviezen over op te stellen  Het UVT vormt een onderdeel van het grotere Centrale Regie team  Dit team is een integraal team die de vraagstukken integraal benadert  Daarbij handelen we vanuit ��n systeemgedachte  met als doel de processen in de gehele waterhuishouding effici�nt en effectief aan te sturen  Centrale Regie is de plek waar processen  kennis kunde en informatiestromen samenkomen en een beeld heeft hoe de primaire processen ervoor staan of waar optimalisatie  sturing of bijsturing noodzakelijk is  Je trekt veel samen op met de Co�rdinator van het UVT  Verder werk je nauw samen met de Medewerker meten en monitoren die een belangrijke rol speelt in het proces van data inwinning en validatie  Samen met deze collega s werk je als een eenheid  Kennisuitwisseling onderling is daarom van groot belang om elkaar te ondersteunen en waar mogelijk te vervangen bij diens afwezigheid  Daarnaast heb je regelmatig contact met de gemeentelijke partners  Water verandert je wereld Als Data analist houd jij je bezig met het verwerken en analyseren van data  Het is aan jou om de verzamelde data op het gebied van stedelijk waterbeheer om te zetten in stuurinformatie  Vanuit deze inzichten lever je een bijdrage aan beheer  en beleidsvraagstukken  Je stelt rapportages en specifieke adviezen op  Je weet deze adviezen ook inhoudelijke te onderbouwen bij de gemeentelijke partners  Regelmatig heb je contact met hen om inzichten te delen of vraagspecificaties helder te krijgen  Je weet je gesprekspartners de juiste vragen te stellen om zo de informatie in te winnen die je nodig hebt voor een juiste analyse en advies  Je levert een bijdrage op het gebied van basis rioleringsplannen  In sommige gevallen beheer je zelfs het rekenmodel voor de gemeente en ondersteunt hen bij eenvoudige modelberekeningen  Op het gebied van meetnetbeheer ben je een adviseur en vraagbaak zoals ook het aanspreekpunt voor gebruikers op het gebied van gezamenlijke software  Je vervult daarin de functionele beheerrol  Wat breng jij mee  Je hebt een afgeronde opleiding op hbo niveau en enige jaren relevante werkervaring op het gebied van gegevensverwerking  data analyse en advisering  Data interpreteren en verwerken tot gedegen adviezen gaat jou bijzonder goed af  Je hebt ervaring met verwerking van data van operationele meetsystemen  Je brengt naast inhoudelijke kennis ook technische kennis mee om analyses en eenvoudige modelberekeningen uit te kunnen voeren  Affiniteit op het gebied van  afval  water riolering is een pr�  Je vindt het interessant je te verdiepen in de vraagstukken van de afvalwaterketen en het stedelijk waterbeheer en levert graag een bijdrage hieraan  Tot slot is kennis van beheerapplicaties een pr�  Je beschikt over goede communicatieve en schriftelijke vaardigheden en hebt een zelfstandige  resultaatgerichte en klantgerichte lenders on the market   Via Tulp Group  foreign  investors can invest in Dutch mortgage loan exposure  This can be achieved via warehouses  securitizations and whole loans  Tulp has finance relations Will you join us on a journey to disrupt the trillion dollar travel industry  We are looking for the best and brightest who share our passion for travel  data  and product   FindHotel believes travel is the one thing that opens minds to new ideas  cultures  and ways of thinking  Our mission is to get every traveller the best accommodation deal  worldwide  From adventure travel and backpacking to honeymoons and family vacations  we genuinely care that every traveller is able to make the best informed accommodation choice  with the absolute best conditions  for every trip   We are looking for Data Scientists  from mid level to senior  to join FindHotel and help us push our data driven organisation to even higher levels  We are looking people with a strong background in Machine Learning  Statistics and Programming  and with proven experience applying Machine Learning to real business problems  You will be leading a variety of projects within our company to empower users find their ideal accommodation   What you will do  Design  build and test data driven services that use machine learning and statistics to make our platform as effective as possible  e g by providing visitors the recommendations that are most relevant to them  Help to improve our content mapping algorithm  record linkage deduplication   Contribute to our deal prediction discount detection efforts  Fine tune our hotel sorting algorithm by continuously trying testing new methodologies and help us ingest more users  content and price related data  Ensure content sorting and selection for our platform  image text quality assessment   Perform real time pricing and conversion optimisation at scale   Who you are  You have excellent Python and SQL skills  You are interested in and willing to learn about the travel industry  You have a solid mathematical background  from statistics to calculus   You have the ability and interest to work with huge amounts of high dimensional travel data  You have experience with modern Python ML stack and concepts  gradient boosters  neural networks  NN  architectures  feature extraction  online offline validation approaches   You have at least 3 years of experience in productionizing complex pipelines  ML or any other quantitative development environment   You have experience in building scalable algorithms  you have some knowledge about computational complexity and data structures  Experience in any of the following problems is a plus  record linkage  image and text similarity   price prediction  named entity recognition textual data normalisation  learning to rank  reinforcement learning   Why join FindHotel now We aim to help 10M customers book on FindHotel annually by 2023  up from 3M in the past 12 months  We do that using data  transparency  and industry leading features  and managed to overcome the corona crisis remarkably fast  The company is evolving quickly to position itself among the global leaders in the travel industry  It is an exceptional journey to make  challenging  exciting  and a marvel to be part of  We place huge importance on rewarding our employees for the value they generate by giving Stock Appreciation Rights to all employees  Do you want to know if FindHotel is the right place for you  Find out by reading about the attitude that thrives at FindHotel   What we offer  Plenty of chances to learn and grow within an open  diverse culture which promotes knowledge sharing  trust and transparency  A great compensation package   perks and benefits  including significant stock appreciation rights   Flexible time off  take as many holidays as you need  and a chance to work remotely  You will be part of a highly international team that enjoys working  eating and playing together in one of the best office locations in Amsterdam  We value good food and offer catered lunches from various cuisines  great coffee  ice cream in the fridge and the occasional barbecue in our garden  We enjoy getting together to celebrate our wins with company events in Amsterdam and abroad  A budget for your dream home office   We encourage people from all ethnic groups  genders  sexuality  ages and abilities to apply  If this job description resonates with you  we want to hear from you    Follow us on Instagram to see what life at FindHotel looks like

Holmes in hart en nieren  En word jij blij van speuren in grote bakken met big data  Kies dan voor het traineeship data analytics en ontwikkel je in sneltreinvaart tot volwaardig professional in het vakgebied  WAT GA JE DOEN TIJDENS HET IT TRAINEESHIP DATA ANALYTICS IN REGIO GRONINGEN  Dit tweejarige traineeship leidt jou op tot volwaardig professional in data analytics  business analytics en data science  Tijdens opleidingsdagen op post master niveau wordt zowel theorie als praktijkkennis gedeeld door hoogleraren van de VU Amsterdam en senior professionals uit het bedrijfsleven  Hoe tof is dat  Naast de opleiding doe je ook praktische ervaring op bij ��n of meerdere van onze interessante opdrachtgevers binnen profit of non profit  Bij onze opdrachtgevers ontwikkel jij je onder anderen in het goed uitvragen van de klantvraag  welk inzicht willen ze graag hebben  Middels SQL en Python weet jij de data uit verschillende databronnen te ontsluiten  Door geavanceerde analyses op big data los te laten in R of Python  en door het maken van data visualisaties  dashboards  waar Picasso jaloers op zou zijn  kom jij tot waardevolle inzichten  Jij blijft niet achter je computer zitten maar trekt de organisatie in om jouw vondsten onder de aandacht te brengen  Je weet de brug te slaan tussen de big data en de praktijk en bent een �chte data translator  Zo maakt jij impact binnen de organisatie  WAT BIEDEN WE JOU  Een vast contract  ja echt   Een startsalaris van 2700 euro bruto per maand Een opleiding op post master niveau op het gebied van Business Analytics   Data Science  gegeven door hoogleraren van de VU Amsterdam Verdiepende cursussen gegeven door senior data scientists in machine learning  Python  R  SQL  textmining  data visualisatie  Scrum Master training  omgaan met weerstand en dergelijke Uitdagende opdrachten binnen bijvoorbeeld gemeenten  ministeries  luchtvaartmaatschappijen  winkelketens  verzekeraars en NGO s  Ontdek waar jouw passie ligt Een groot netwerk van professionals en andere vakidioten waar jij op terug kunt vallen Kennissessies die ervoor zorgen dat jij up to date bent in het vakgebied Een fieldcoach voor een snellere persoonlijke ontwikkeling Een super gezellige kickoff dag waar jij jouw medetrainees goed leert kennen Pensioenopbouw  toch lekker voor later  25 vakantiedagen en 8 33  vakantiegeld Reiskostenvergoeding WAT VRAGEN WIJ  Jij hebt een passie voor puzzelen in grote hoeveelheden big data en weet de juiste informatie daar uit te halen  Daarnaast heb je  Een afgeronde Masteropleiding met een kwantitatief karakter  bijvoorbeeld in de richting van Economie  Marketing Analytics  Data Science  een Research Master  Neuroscience  Sociale Wetenschappen of Earth Science  Uitstekende kennis op het gebied van toegepast onderzoek  data analytics en statistiek Praktische ervaring vanuit stage of studie met data analytics tools zoals Stata  Matlab  GIS  Python  R  SQL of vergelijkbaar  Een grote dosis enthousiasme en overtuigingskracht zodat de organisatie �cht wat met jouw resultaten gaat doen  Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal op C1 of C2 niveau  WAT KAN BREINSTEIN VOOR JOU BETEKENEN  Jij hebt je Master opleiding afgerond  Nu ben je op zoek naar de perfecte baan en een vliegende start van je carri�re  Dat is precies waar wij bij Breinstein gespecialiseerd in zijn  Daarnaast werken we landelijk  dus ook bij jou in de buurt  Tijdens ons gesprek leren we jou kennen zodat we weten wat jouw droombaan is  Breinstein zet zich in om deze droombaan voor jou te bemachtigen  Wij zorgen dat je niet tussen de eindeloze stapel cv s van concurrenten komt te liggen  maar krijgen jou direct aan tafel bij de juiste persoon binnen de organisatie  En ben jij bang je sollicitatiegesprek bij de opdrachtgever van je dromen te verpesten  Geen nood  wij pimpen jouw cv in een mooi cv template  geven je cv tips en gaan met jou mee op sollicitatiegesprek  Vooraf krijg je ook een sollicitatietraining met sollicitatie tips en oefenen wij jouw sollicitatie pitch zodat je gaat vlammen tijdens het gesprek  Breinstein staat voor fun  ondernemerschap  verbinding en het hebben van een groei mindset  De sfeer op kantoor is informeel  en we zoeken elkaar regelmatig op voor borrels en andere leuke uitjes  Wil jij binnenkort mee met een van onze vele personeelsuitjes  Solliciteer dan vandaag nog  ZIT JIJ NOG OP HET PUNTJE VAN JE STOEL  Om onze kwaliteit hoog te houden hebben we een beperkt aantal plaatsen beschikbaar  Gelukkig hebben wij een plekje voor jou gereserveerd  Reageer nu snel op onze vacature  Wil je meer informatie over deze vacature neem dan vrijblijvend contact op met Danielle Swets  Stuur een mail naar danielleswets breinstein nl of bel naar 06 20662841

Dutch speaking and writing proficiency is required   Burgers en bedrijven hebben een schat aan informatie tot hun beschikking  Die informatie wordt lang niet altijd optimaal benut  en blijft vaak zelfs onaangeraakt onder het oppervlak verborgen  In ons traineeship Data Science leer je die informatieschatten vinden  opgraven en benutten  Als trainee ontdek jij de waarde van kwantitatieve informatie en leer jij hoe je belangrijke inzichten ontvouwt uit klant  en bedrijfsinformatie  Zo helpen al onze data professionals afdelingen en beleidsmakers binnen de financi�le   overheid  en energiesector datagestuurd werken  Met als resultaat een scherpere focus op strategische bedrijfsdoelen en optimale dienstverlening richting klanten zoals jij en ik  Big data is een 21e eeuwse wetenschap op zich  die maar enkelen beheersen  Met ons traineeship Data Science word jij daar een van   Het ontwikkeltraject in het traineeship Data Science  Het traineeship Data Science bestaat uit drie belangrijke onderdelen  Kennismaking met House of B�ta  collega s en ons opleidingsaanbod tijdens de onboarding  Het beste Onboarding programma van Nederland doorlopen  Solliciteer nu en start met het Talent Pro onboardingsprogramma op bijvoorbeeld 4 maart of 1 april  Waardevolle ervaring in de praktijk via opdrachten bij onze klanten  Doorlopend opleidingen bij ons Brain Development Lab  waar de theoretische basis van jouw ontwikkeling gelegd en verbreed wordt Iedere consultant die bij House of B�ta start zal beginnen in de ori�ntatiefase  De ori�ntatiefase is een fase van ongeveer twee jaar waarin je de gelegenheid hebt te ontdekken waar je ambitie ligt en waarin jij je zou willen specialiseren  Ben jij er al zeker van dat je Data Scientist wil worden  Dat klinkt goed  maar je zal nog steeds uitgedaagd worden te onderzoeken wat er allemaal nog meer is  Om je hierin te helpen zal je aan de slag gaan bij verschillende opdrachtgever binnen en buiten de financi�le dienstverlening en opleidingen doen zoals Excel  VBA  Agile Scrum  Python  SQL of zelfs Actuarieel Rekenaar   De opdrachten  Business Intelligence en werken met Big Data Je gaat als young professional gedetacheerd werken voor klanten in de financi�le dienstverlening  zoals alle grote banken en verzekeraars in Nederland  Of je gaat aan de slag bij overheidsinstanties in de telecom  energiemarkt of transport  Tijdens het traineeship stomen we je klaar voor het bedrijfsleven  waarna jouw eigen groeipad je leidt naar mooie rollen als data analist  BI consultant of data scientist  Rollen waarin business intelligence en big data centraal staan  jij informatie om gaat zetten in kennis en kennis in passende acties bij jouw opdrachtgevers  In jouw route richting een carri�re in data science bepalen jij en je People Manager het tempo  Hoe snel breng jij jouw skills en ervaring als data specialist naar een hoger level   Starten met een Data Science traject zal niet altijd beginnen met een Data gerelateerde opdracht  Het leren kennen van onze klanten binnen de financi�le dienstverlening zal zeer belangrijk zijn  Starten met een operationele opdracht bij een bank  verzekeringsmaatschappij of pensioenfonds is wat je kan verwachten  Dat kan ook een servicefunctie zijn aan de telefoon   De opleidingen voor jou als Data Science trainee  Binnen het Traineeship Data Science is alles erop gericht je snel bekend te laten maken met de mogelijkheden binnen data science en business intelligence  Je begint met de basis  Tijdens de onboarding leer je de fijne kneepjes van dataverwerking in Excel en VBA  In het tweede jaar kies je met een stevig fundament van jouw opgedane kennis en praktijkervaring voor opleidingen en trainingen die passen bij jouw verdere ambities in de datawereld  Je leert programmeren in verschillende talen en gaat werken met dataverwerkingsprogramma s en  tools die jouw analytische vaardigheden versterken  Ook een masteropleiding behoort tot de mogelijkheden  Betaald data science studeren dus  m�t professionele begeleiding en mooie praktijkopdrachten   De coaching van jouw People Manager  De professionele begeleiding komt van jouw People skills: python, sql, hadoop, spark, kubernetes, learning, tableau, jira
job_desc: Data analyst planning and forecasting As Data analyst planning and forecasting you help companies make better forecasting  planning and inventory management decisions  based on quantitative analysis and models  You are a creative mind with a passion for planning  both the technology and the reality of business  You are keen to translate data science outcomes into business impact   Your role as Data analyst planning and forecasting  In your work  you deal with the three pillars of applied analytics  data engineering  model development and storytelling  You keep a sharp analytical eye on both the business challenges and the hard data science   Your activities are a mix between shorter customer projects  4 6 weeks   internal developments  and longer  interim  activities  3 6 months  at selected customers  This provides unique opportunities to learn about and work with the latest data science insights around forecasting  inventory management  and other aspects of planning  as well as great experiences being immersed in the reality of business   At EyeOn you will work with the latest techniques  solutions and insights in the field of planning and forecasting  As believers in the future where data is the core and most decisions are made by machines  we are constantly developing ourselves and the techniques and methods we work with  We challenge you to do the same   Your primary work location will be at our customer locations and our office in Aarle Rixtel  where our forecasting   planning knowledge center is located  We also have offices in Amsterdam  Antwerp  Geneva  Z�rich  Dublin  D�sseldorf  and New York City   Responsibilities Translating planning challenges into data science solutions  In interim projects  helping customers with their challenges in any way needed  creating ad hoc analyses  providing insightful dashboards  developing their in house data science knowledge  etc  Contribute to the innovative power of EyeOn by running applied analytics lab projects  Raising the expertise of EyeOn colleagues in the area of applied analytics  Preferred requirements A completed university education and master degree in operations research  data science  econometrics  mathematics or similar  Relevant experience in or affinity with supply chain planning and forecasting processes  You enjoy translating complex practical problems into mathematical models  Experience with programming  preferably in Python  Numpy  Pandas  Scipy  Scikit learn   Experience with processing and analyzing data  eg  SQL  Hadoop  Spark  Kubernetes  is a plus  Knowledge of  and experience with typical data science techniques  eg  time series  regression  classification  clustering  math programming  simulation  etc  EU working permit  Working location  Eindhoven  EyeOn Data Science  In EyeOn Data Science we re the best at helping our customers do better supply chain planning through data science  We make sure we stay the best by working together as a team  and by learning new things from each other and through our customer projects   We re a young team with a passion for data science  using tools such as Dataiku  Python  pandas  numpy   Spark  PowerBI  Tableau  Jira  Bitbucket  and more  We are creative minds with a fascination for data  We believe in the digital transformation and a data driven future  Why work for EyeOn  Join a global team with experienced experts who are passionate about supply chain planning and data science  Co create solutions with creativity and innovation to solve tough business challenges for some of the world s largest and most successful companies  Work in a culture that blends the best entrepreneurial spirit with a healthy work life balance  Experience the freedom of deciding how you schedule your agenda  work and location in teams that operate with trust and autonomy  Create your own personal development program with the counsel of our experienced experts and support from EyeOn  Receive excellent employee benefits and perks  including bonus potential  Answers to your questions  Inge Loog is available to answer any questions you may have about this role  Contact Inge at inge loog eyeon nl  An individual assessment is part of our selection procedure

Will you join us on a journey to disrupt the trillion dollar travel industry  We are looking for the best and brightest who share our passion for travel  data  and product   FindHotel believes travel is the one thing that opens minds to new ideas  cultures  and ways of thinking  Our mission is to get every traveller the best accommodation deal  worldwide  From adventure travel and backpacking to honeymoons and family vacations  we genuinely care that every traveller is able to make the best informed accommodation choice  with the absolute best conditions  for every trip   We are looking for Data Scientists  from mid level to senior  to join FindHotel and help us push our data driven organisation to even higher levels  We are looking people with a strong background in Machine Learning  Statistics and Programming  and with proven experience applying Machine Learning to real business problems  You will be leading a variety of projects within our company to empower users find their ideal accommodation   What you will do  Design  build and test data driven services that use machine learning and statistics to make our platform as effective as possible  e g by providing visitors the recommendations that are most relevant to them  Help to improve our content mapping algorithm  record linkage deduplication   Contribute to our deal prediction discount detection efforts  Fine tune our hotel sorting algorithm by continuously trying testing new methodologies and help us ingest more users  content and price related data  Ensure content sorting and selection for our platform  image text quality assessment   Perform real time pricing and conversion optimisation at scale   Who you are  You have excellent Python and SQL skills  You are interested in and willing to learn about the travel industry  You have a solid mathematical background  from statistics to calculus   You have the ability and interest to work with huge amounts of high dimensional travel data  You have experience with modern Python ML stack and concepts  gradient boosters  neural networks  NN  architectures  feature extraction  online offline validation approaches   You have at least 3 years of experience in productionizing complex pipelines  ML or any other quantitative development environment   You have experience in building scalable algorithms  you have some knowledge about computational complexity and data structures  Experience in any of the following problems is a plus  record linkage  image and text similarity   price prediction  named entity recognition textual data normalisation  learning to rank  reinforcement learning   Why join FindHotel now We aim to help 10M customers book on FindHotel annually by 2023  up from 3M in the past 12 months  We do that using data  transparency  and industry leading features  and managed to overcome the corona crisis remarkably fast  The company is evolving quickly to position itself among the global leaders in the travel industry  It is an exceptional journey to make  challenging  exciting  and a marvel to be part of  We place huge importance on rewarding our employees for the value they generate by giving Stock Appreciation Rights to all employees  Do you want to know if FindHotel is the right place for you  Find out by reading about the attitude that thrives at FindHotel   What we offer  Plenty of chances to learn and grow within an open  diverse culture which promotes knowledge sharing  trust and transparency  A great compensation package   perks and benefits  including significant stock appreciation rights   Flexible time off  take as many holidays as you need  and a chance to work remotely  You will be part of a highly international team that enjoys working  eating and playing together in one of the best office locations in Amsterdam  We value good food and offer catered lunches from various cuisines  great coffee  ice cream in the fridge and the occasional barbecue in our garden  We enjoy getting together to celebrate our wins with company events in Amsterdam and abroad  A budget for your dream home office   We encourage people from all ethnic groups  genders  sexuality  ages and abilities to apply  If this job description resonates with you  we want to hear from you    Follow us on Instagram to see what life at FindHotel looks like

Data Scientist   Energy Analyst Salary  Negotiable depending on experienceWe are looking for a highly motivated  organised  and insightful Data Scientist   Energy Analyst to work with us to operate and grow our business  Whilst established for many years we have in the last 5 years embarked on an aggressive growth plan which has seen us become a leading provider of energy market data  analysis  and consultancy We influence and inform investors  banks  traders and government agencies on a daily basis and we are looking to consolidate our position in our established market and grow our products and services into Continental Europe and the wider world by harnessing and developing your skills and knowledge We are looking for people who are comfortable interacting and building relationships with new and existing customers  working at all levels of an organisation  You will need to be highly numerate  to understand and help us run our business with good communication and analytical skills  to ensure we deliver valuable insight through our services Having the necessary creativity to spot opportunities and position us to take advantage of these is a key part of the role along with the focus needed to do the hard work that is required to deliver  Strong numeracy and IT skills are paramount  language skills desirable  and passion and a can do attitude are essential We anticipate that you will hold a degree in a business  engineering  science  or maths related subject but applicants with other experience who can demonstrate that they can work at the level required are welcome  Most importantly we are looking for people with drive  that are willing to grow with us We can offer hybrid working   regular weekly working from our Terneuzen office is preferred   and the opportunity to work in our UK office to integrate and interact fully with our colleagues there Please send a resume and covering letter and our recruitment team will contact you directly to confirm receipt Reference ID  BV DS 2022Job Type  Full timeSalary   3 000 00    5 000 00 per monthCOVID 19 considerations All current COVID 19 precautionary measures are in place Ability to commute relocate Postcode 4531 in Terneuzen  Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work  Preferred Education Master s  Preferred Work Remotely No

Job Category  Science Job title  Head of Data Science Contract type  Full Time Experience  Executive Job Location  Zeist NL Job description  For our Data Science Department  we are looking for an experienced  communicative and proactive Head of Data Science  The Head of Data Science is accountable for the creation of new data sciences capabilities  statistics  statistical programming  machine learning  and predictive analytics  for the business by envisioning and executing strategies that will impact the business s performance by enabling informed decision making and by increasing the range of functional offerings to our clients   The Head of Data Science proactively works with business executives and departmental heads across the business in order to provide statistical designs and or advanced analytical data modelling solutions  The services provided by Data Science include the design and implementation of innovative and complex statistical designs  analytical models  and machine learning applications which utilize a blend of contemporary and traditional data sources including both structured and unstructured data elements  The Head of Data Science will report to the Chief Operating Officer   Tasks and responsibilities Forming  developing  and maintaining the Data Science team  Data Scientists  Statistician and Data Management  Improving commercial decision making through the incorporation of advanced analytical tools and methods into Julius Clinical processes Developing  implementing and validating custom statistical based advanced analytics that help answer complex business questions Provide or oversee the statistical and statistical programming contributions towards clinical trials and clinical studies Collaborating with the project team to identify and deploy the appropriate data assets  methodologies  and statistical techniques to answer complex business questions Supporting ongoing proposals  ad hoc requests and complex data investigations Contributing to the development of innovative methodologies and new offerings Job requirements Master s degree  with minimum of 12 years  experience  or PhD  with minimum of 10 years  experience  in Statistics  Mathematics or Economics Strong background in statistical models  advance analytics and programming in the pharmaceutical industry for regulated activities supporting drug or device development Excellent grasp of current and emerging statistical  analysis and programming techniques technologies Strong understanding of industry standards and regulations regarding statistics  e g  ICH E6 and E9  CDISC  FDA and EMEA guidances Deep understanding of the secondary data sources commonly used in the pharmaceutical industry  i e  script level  patient longitudinal  promotional  chart audits  etc   including the caveats and appropriate uses of each source Strong business knowledge and mindset to provide guidance on how data and analytical methods can be applied to answer business questions Strong communication skills to explain and resolve strategic issues  ability to communicate  verbal and written  technical and non technical information clearly to a diverse audience We offer  An open culture in an innovative and dynamic environment with inspiring colleagues and good working conditions  An environment where you have room to be creative  take initiative and have direct influence on the way we work   We are located in a beautiful monumental building  close to Slot Zeist  the Netherlands  However we work internationally and we offer the possibility of working home based from anywhere in the EU  as long as you are willing to visit the Dutch office approximately once per month   depending on COVID related travel restrictions of course   How to apply  Interested in this position  Send your CV and motivation to vacancies juliusclinical com If you have further questions you can contact Hans van Dijk  Chief Operating Officer at   31  0  6 5579 3729 or Ellen Hunink  HR Business Partner at   31  0  6 2116 2980

As a senior data scientist you are capable of rapidly learning about the domain of our customers  build models and prototypes and coach data scientists in their way of working   How will you help in creating value with Data   AI  At GoDataDriven  we build strong data   AI practices to deliver value to our clients and their customers  In the past  our team of data professionals has predicted the daily demand for millions of loaves of bread  built advanced energy saving algorithms to nationwide scale  and set up data innovation labs at large multinational corporations  We have already enjoyed great success in making top companies AI driven   just think of what more we can achieve when YOU join our team   As senior data scientist  you are responsible for the creation of business value using data   AI  You are capable to rapidly learn about the domain of our customers and apply your experience with getting data driven applications into production  not only by yourself but also by coaching and mentoring other people in your team  What you will do to make data intensive applications work effectively and securely   You start by assessing the value driven use cases at the client and a good sense of what success looks like  Then you apply your skills in mathematics  statistics  machine learning and programming to analyze and model data  You work mostly with notebooks in Python and are also able to translate your notebooks into a working prototype  Together with a machine learning engineer or data engineer  you help to get the model into production and assess the value it creates  If required  you also set up a good way of working for your team  with a proper dev ops for AI approach   When you re working on site with a client  you eventually come across something really difficult to solve  Luckily  every few weeks everyone from GDD comes to our office to work remotely on their projects and you have the opportunity to discuss and even solve your problems with the help of the hive mind of GDD  And if that would take too long  everybody at GDD is just a quick message away and ready to help you at any time  Why this role is the dream job for you if you like to tell a story with data and the latest AI technology if you want to have impact on the bottom line of organisations if you like working for different clients and like the excitement of getting to learn new environments and people once in a while is not something you want if you have less than 2 years working experience in a similar role if you lack a working knowledge of the Dutch language if you are not excited by working in teams and coaching people in their role as data scientist or analyst If that sounds like you  let s talk

Company Description Who are we  Experian gathers  analyses and processes data in ways others can t  We help individuals take financial control and access financial services  businesses make smarter decisions  lenders lend more responsibly  and organizations prevent identity fraud and crime  Our 17 800 people in 45 countries believe the possibilities for you  and our world  are growing  We re investing in new technologies  talented people and innovation so we can help create a better tomorrow  What do we have to offer  Not only do we offer our employees a competitive benefits package and flexibility to have a good work life balance  We offer you an exciting  challenging environment where you get the opportunity to work in an international team and continuously learn and develop your technical and soft skills  Job Description What do you do as a Data Management Analyst  As our new Data Management Analyst  you will pro actively participate in a new team to set up and execute a data management practice regarding data governance  data integration and data operations  Your daily focus is on internal projects and processes and supporting other functions such as our Analytics team  Since we are a new and relatively small team you will have the opportunity to be involved in a wide variety of responsibilities  Some of the key responsibilities of the Data Management Analyst are  You are responsible for the day to day management of transferring data from our suppliers in a secure environment and loading onto our Experian platforms that our clients use for  amongst other things  credit checks You perform tasks to analyze the data  safeguard our data quality and interpret the data in the right way You collaborate with internal and external clients to determine the appropriate requirements  performance measures and statistical metrics to be applied during projects You play an active role in the preparation  administration and validation of specific audits  document and comply Additional Information Interested  If you want more information regarding this position  please contact Peter Achterberg  Head of Data Management at 06 51228412

We need you to help us reach our Big Hairy Audacious Goal  By building really smart software we enable insurers worldwide to automatically detect insurance fraud and identify high risks  Our ultimate dream is that in 2025 the FRISS Score is the global trusted standard for honest insurance  Do you have knowledge and experience within business intelligence  and are you ready for the next step  We want to expand our team with a colleague who likes to work hands on and can act as an inspirator for your colleagues and our customers  Your mission as a Data Analyst  You will work with FRISS at the next level of data driven fraud analytics and join the teams mission to make FRISS an even more data driven company  You will generate  ad hoc  insights for both our customers and for internal use  and help us make the best products ever in this sector  With your insights we will improve our product and internal processes like finance  sales or whatever process that needs to be improved  If you look back after one year at FRISS  what did you achieve   You ve already improved some internal processes with your insights  You spotted new opportunities and data sources to get even more insights  The prototypes you ve made for both our customers and your colleagues are adding value  Together with your colleagues of team X Ray these will become a fixed part of FRISS  Ok  enough of this  let s talk bullet points  From data to insights  Think about what insight will help our customers and internal departments in the best way  Spot opportunities to improve and translate those into insights and prototypes to help FRISS to the next level  Set up the back office in a structured and efficient way so you can easily access the data that you need  You and your FRISS team  We offer the opportunity to work in a fast changing and international environment  with lots of room for initiative and personal development  We want to step up our insight game and that s why we are looking for a data analyst  You help our customers and your colleagues making sense out of data  By listening to the customer you hear the struggles they experience  Based on this input you develop ad hoc insights and prototypes  You will be part of team X ray  The X ray team loves challenges So you need to challenge them with your creative  analytical and business oriented mindset  And in return  they will challenge you back   Who are you   You have a great interest in the world of data and you are always looking for ways to optimize the world around you  You are a Data Analyst not because you choose it but because you were born as one  therefore we also accept applicant with limited experience  You like to improve businesses with data driven insights  You make data practical and you think in terms of how data can improve our business  We d like you to have experience in as many of the following as possible   Working with the Azure Cloud Provider Power BI Excel T SQL Giving presentations to customers and colleagues Good stakeholder management You have our full attention if you also have   Experience with Azure Databricks  PySpark  Spark SQL  Don t let Imposter Syndrome stop you from applying  If you have any questions  you can contact us at recruitment friss com  FRISS is proud to be an equal opportunity employer  We encourage you to be yourself  All qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to race  religious affiliation  gender  gender identity  sexual orientation  disability  age  nationality  or veteran status

As a Data Scientist you ll delight our clients by transforming giant  complex datasets to awesome and relevant insights  You re resourceful in finding additional data sources and recoding variables  You don t just try to understand the past  you predict the future  You have knowledge of and experience with applying machine learning in a practical setting  where you ll turn a good model into a great one  You communicate and present results convincingly  to create real and lasting impact  What s in it for you   On top of excellent employment conditions  working at IG H will kickstart your career through the steep learning curve  Apart from learning on the job  there will be ample trainings to boost your core consulting and people skills through the Consultant Development Program  CDP   You will be assigned involved coaches  who will be there for you to provide you with guidance  Next to that  IG H offers you an inspiring office in Utrecht  an unparalleled good working atmosphere  and abundant parties  team activities and sporting events    In addition to on the job learning  you learn everything you need to know about consultancy in the Consultant Development Program  CDP   The program consists of various internal and external training courses and has been specifically developed for trainees  Besides training sessions  the CDP often organizes trips and dinners  Through these  you quickly develop good relationships with co workers at IG H  I see many of them outside of work on a regular basis  Jasmijn Haverhals  Consultant Healthcare    The most beautiful thing about consulting is the diversity within the projects  IG H offers next to different clients  a variety in the types of assignments  One assignment could be very strategic  in which yououtline the direction of a company  Whereas another assignment could be focused on implementation  in which you are working together with the client to deliver concrete results   Peter Hardy  Senior Consultant  Why IG H   IG H is transforming leading companies across the Health  Retail and Finance sectors  Together with our world class technology partners  we help our clients move forward and stay relevant  With insightful advice  great design and unrivalled digital platforms  Our exceptional results come from successfully aligning people  business and technology  With over 300 talented colleagues on board  people who genuinely embrace change and challenges  we ve created a unique high daring  high caring culture  Attracting extraordinary people and inspiring them to push the boundaries for themselves and our clients  What you bring MSc degree 0 3 years of relevant work experience within a start up or consulting environment Analytical  inventive and practical Python and or R skills You have a top sport mentality  we are looking for talent that continuously wants to be better What we offer you Working at a Great Place to Work with a pleasant atmosphere and enthusiastic colleagues who support you  The chance to make a real contribution to the ongoing domestic and international growth of IG H  We offer a permanent  indefinite  contract right away  Excellent salary and working benefits  company car   good mobility scheme  Generous bonus scheme  25 holiday days with the possibility to take up more  The possibility to take a sabbatical after 3 years of employment  and more  which we would love to elaborate on  Now   are you excited   If this vacancy is right for you  then this is a great place to work with super happy employees and clients  NPS   60   On top of that  we re hitting double digit growth and have our sights firmly set on continued international expansion  We re still just embarking on this exciting adventure   For more information please contact one of our recruiters Jesse Albus jesse albus igh com 06 18745743  You can also apply directly via the apply button  Hope to meet you soon

player agents and represents foreign players that want to make a move to the Dutch national football competition  With our services we give answers to questions like  which clubs are interesting for a certain player  what value does a player represent and other data related football questions  In the first years of its existence  FACTS acquired over 50 partners in most European countries  and lately we are working with clubs for our services  Job purpose  The core of our existence is data  All our services rely heavily on data and the intelligence that we extract from it  With the data science department  it is your job to ensure that the production of our reports and other data insights is 100  available  Next to this  with the addition of new data sources from suppliers and new demands from the market our models have to be updated and upgraded  Moreover  the development of new models that enhance the quality of our product is  together with the team  part of your job  You are the backbone of our company  Tasks and Responsibilities  Manage the production of our reports Make sure our current models are up to date with the latest mathematical and football insights Address and creating reports on a regular basis  Client Details Tulp Group is a mortgage company with a focus on clear and sustainable choices  It has 3 own mortgage brands in the Dutch mortgage market  Tulp Hypotheken   Owner occupied mortgage loans  AFM regulated  De Nederlandse   Buy to Let mortgage loans for professional landlords Brug Financieringen   Transition mortgage loans for professional investors We offer mortgage loans for the purchase  refurbishment  transition  from office to apartments  and refinancing of existing homes   mortgages with long periods of fixed interest rates  We operate of the premise of finding the right balance between sharp interest rates  repayment options and excellent conditions  This ensures that we are always one of the most competitive mortgage lenders on the market   Via Tulp Group  foreign  investors can invest in Dutch mortgage loan exposure  This can be achieved via warehouses  securitizations and whole loans  Tulp has finance relations with large investors and banks like Natwest  HSBC  Citi  MUFG  BNP Credit Agricole  TwentyFour Asset Management and Donner   Reuschel  Tulp Group was founded in 2015 by Paul Wessels and Pierre de Vos and has a team of approximately 20 professionals  Description Responsible for keeping the various reports up to date Striving to achieve a modular and re usable reporting landscape based on highly automated processes You will be instrumental in delivering reports in a consistent  accurate and timely manner  You have an integral role in gather requirements and data to utilize business decisions Provide advice to Sales  Underwriting and MT teams Daily contact with foreign funding teams to achieve optimal funding Monitoring data quality and making improvements where necessary  Profile Bachelor s Degree  economics accountancy finance treasury  Excellent command of the English language  written and verbal  Good Dutch language capability Excellent communications skills Experience with data What do you do as a Data Analyst   As a Data Analyst you will play a big part in our Vion Business Analytics Competence Center  VBACC   Vion aims to become a data driven organization  The further development of a Vion wide Azure data platform is a key step in doing so  You will act as the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  Data engineers  Data modelers  Front end specialists  You will work in an Agile environment where you discuss requirements with business stakeholders  translate them into solution designs  plan the deliverables  and work as part of the development team towards a successful result  You will perform exploratory data analysis  identify and perform data quality checks  and are able to communicate findings clearly to the relevant stakeholders in the organization  Top 100 food company Every day 100 million consumers worldwide eat a meal with a little bit of Vion  This quantity comes with a big responsibility  At Vion we work passionately every day on the global food challenge  feeding 9 billion people in 2050  How can you contribute to this  The main responsibilities of the role can be described as follows  create the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  you gather requirements in the business for dashboards   reports and translate them into appropriate solution designs  you provide technical support to developers in the business and plan the deliverables  you will standardize  optimize and safeguard the Vion processes and dashboard functionalities like designs  scripting  presentation choices  test findings  availability and authorizations in collaboration with the other BI team members  the BI Product Owners  the MDM team and the department IM T  you will contribute to and guide the reporting questions and projects based on your BI knowledge and business affinity  you give solicited and unsolicited advice to the BI Product Owners and Management in the field of BI process improvements and data quality  you perform exploratory data analysis  you will identify and perform data validation and communicate the findings to the relevant stakeholders to improve business processes  What do we expect from you  you have a Master s degree in IT or technical subject  you have a minimum 3 years of experience with business analysis and data analysis  you have experience with the Agile and Scrum way of working and with Data warehousing and Business intelligence projects  knowledge of SQL  Python  Microsoft Azure  data visualization tools  strong communication skills both verbal and written and fluent in Dutch and English  strong analytical skills  you are able to structure and solve both conceptual and concrete problems  pro active  pragmatic  customer oriented  hands on mentality with regards to data  team player with good social skills  What can you expect from us  In our company you will have an attractive  versatile and permanent position  with proven suitability  within a leading international food company  with around 12 400 employees worldwide  innovative market concepts and clear core values  You will be able to influence and shape Vion s digital transition  We offer excellent working conditions and an inspiring environment to work in and an enthusiastic team  Are you interested   In case you think you are the right candidate to become our new colleague  or would you like to have more information about this position  Share your talents with us by sending your application letter and resume via the apply button below  For information ask Maartje Faassen via phone number  31 88 995 3555 For this position Vion is looking for direct contacts with potential candidates  we appreciate if companies do not offer their services in this

As an a Data Analyst you will help us to make better use of the data we collect and make sure we deliver the best product as possible to our customers  Being a Data Analyst at Floryn means you are a healthy mix between an entrepreneur and data analyst  You should be interested in how the business operates  what makes the machine tick  but also how you can leverage technology to gain insight into this  You will work closely with the Development  Data  Risk  Marketing and Sales teams  We have a lot of interesting data on customer behaviour  marketing channels  sales and CRM  loan administration  company financials and machine learning models  We use Looker for our BI stack  so you can re use your definitions across reports  no more copy pasting SQL queries  We like simple visualisations and dashboards that can actually tell a story  What you ll be doing  Writing and automating data models in Looker and DBT  create clear definitions that can be used by business users in dashboards and reports  Build and manage dashboards  reports  scorecards  and other analytical services with visualizations that can tell a story  Collaborate across all our teams to understand business questions that data can answer  Build processes and standards that enable teams to become more self sufficient in creating their own reports  Raise questions of your own when you look at the data  we expect you to take initiative and come up with new insights about our business About Floryn  Floryn is one of the fastest growing fintech companies in the Netherlands  We aim to be the most responsible  scalable and customer friendly online lender in Europe  We ve lent out over   200 million since inception  2016  and have processed over   2 billion in transaction volume  We re located in a monumental building in the city centre of  s Hertogenbosch that also houses the Jheronimus Academy of Data Science  JADS   We are with around 50 people  split over Development  Data  Risk  Marketing and Sales  The technology that we build plays an essential role in everything we do  so we work with a fully in house development team  Building great stuff is what drives us and quality always comes first  Our technology has a major impact on businesses and people  Our organisation is flat and communication lines are short  so we can move quickly  We don t have code monkeys  Instead  we give you a problem and trust you will come up with an outstanding solution  We believe in sane working hours and long term solutions  instead of 70 hour work weeks with temporary workarounds  We do things our own way  we ship code every day and we take pride in our work  Skills  Expert SQL and data modelling skills Experience in business analytics and BI tools  Experience with Looker is a plus  willingness to learn is most important  Strong presentation skills  being able to author and present insights to the leadership team and internal teams Basic knowledge of statistics applied to business analytics  forecasting  segmentation  A B testing  predictive modeling  etc   Knowledge of database architecture  PostgreSQL  ETL data preparation tools  APIs  data science and machine learning technologies a plus Bachelor s degree in a quantitative field  Mathematics  Physics  Economics  Engineering or related areas   Master s degree a plus Perks  Good salary  pension contribution and 25 days paid time off  Daily  bourgondische  lunch at the office  Generous budget to develop yourself with books  courses and conferences  MacBook Pro and all high end gear that you need  Many team activities  from drinks to sporting events  Travel comfortably by first class rail or  0 19 km and parking  Work from home or from the office  whatever suits you

skills: machine, learning, deep, python, sql, aws
job_desc: The Data Science team at OLX Europe is responsible for building algorithmic solutions to facilitate transactions between millions of buyers and sellers across 8 countries  Among several other things  we are developing personalisation technologies and optimisation strategies that have a direct impact on OLX s users as well as the company s bottom line  This is a domain filled with interesting challenges as OLX facilitates a broad range of transactions including second hand goods such as cars  electronics and furniture  real estate  and services such as jobs which all contain user generated content that is consumed by machine learning applications at scale   You will lead the Data Science team working in the areas of search  recommender systems  as well as trust and safety in using state of the art Data Science and ML methods to improve the customer experience  The teams have already in most cases mature ML products in production with millions of users per month and a track record of success stories  We are looking for someone that will help us take this to the next level  creating best in class models that are tailored to the specific needs of our different verticals and customer segments   What you will be doing Lead the parts of the Data Science team that work on Buyer and Trust related efforts Partner with Heads of Product and Heads of Technology to solve customer problems and create excellent customer experiences  For example  improve the search and recommendation engines to help our buyers find relevant and inspiring content  and the moderation algorithms to keep our platform free from content that violates our terms of service  e g   illegal  fraudulent  inappropriate  etc   Work with Product Analytics to track the KPIs of different ML use cases and measure the impact for our customers  For example  fine tune KPIs impacted by Search and Recommendations  e g  related to effectiveness  efficiency  engagement  etc  and measure how specific ML models impact them  Partner with the Experimentation team to integrate the KPIs and their proxies to the Experimentation  A B testing  platform  What are we looking for  Experience leading mature technical teams for several years  in the broader area of Data Science and Machine Learning A deep understanding of machine learning techniques and their use in a business context At least 5 years of experience in the data science field with a track record of successful project delivery A strong engineering background with good knowledge of best practices  in Cloud Technologies  Python  SQL  ML infrastructure and pipelines  etc   Experience interacting with senior stakeholders from Product and Technology and co owning significant parts of the product roadmap  Nice to have  Experience in managing projects with diverse cross functional teams and multiple stakeholders  Experience creating ML and Data Products in online retail or online marketplaces  Experience with cloud based platforms and tools  e g   AWS Athena  AWS Sagemaker  AWS Kinesis  or equivalent tools from other cloud providers  What we offer  Competitive compensation and benefits Contributing to the global OLX Group A passionate and diverse team of data scientists spanning several tech hubs and close collaboration with other global teams The opportunity to learn from each other and become better every day Company mobile phone  laptop  MacBook Pro   PC   and other tools you might need What you ll need to know about us Be part of the Prosus universe   the largest consumer internet company in Europe OLX Group is a global product and tech company with over 20 brands   7500 people and one mindset OLX is the world s leading classifieds platform in high growth markets  It s available in more than 40 countries and in over 50 languages Our mission is to make it super easy for people to buy and sell almost anything  boosting local economies We are proud to be different  and we work differently too  We combine the spirit and agility of a start up with the maturity that comes from being part of a 100 year old company We are curious  ambitious and allergic to corporate interference  We improvise  experiment and push each other further  embracing uncertainty and inspiring change If you are as excited as us about this position and our company  we hope you join us  If you d like to learn more about us take a look around our careers page and the OLX Group website  Follow us on Linkedin  Check our OLX Group Engineering Blog and Twitter Tech   We are turning Diversity   Inclusion into our superpower and competitive advantage  We encourage people of all races  ethnicities  disabilities  ages  gender identity or expression  backgrounds and experiences to consider applying for this role

job_desc: Binnen Pon Automotive is het team Digital Solutions   Insights  DS I  verantwoordelijk voor de digitalisering  Dat doen we voor onze mooie merken als Porsche  Volkswagen  SEAT   KODA  CUPRA en Audi  Maar dat doen we vooral voor een optimale klantbeleving  Zowel online als offline bij onze retail partners  Voor de aanschaf van een auto  maar ook voor service en onderhoud  Binnen DS I zoeken we elkaar op om te inspireren en innoveren  Dit alles om te zorgen dat we met elkaar onze klanten en de organisatie verder brengen in een groeiende digitale wereld  Als Data scientist kom je binnen DS I in het Advanced Analytics team  AA   Hier werken 6 andere specialisten  Jij helpt vanuit jouw rol mee om impact te maken met interessante en innovatieve data projecten voor Pon Automotive  forecasting  kansherkenning  netwerkanalyse  A B testen  text verwerking  risicomanagement en machine learning  Samen met jouw collega s werk je aan grote projecten  In de sterk veranderende
