job_desc: Werk waar je trots op kan zijn Dit ga je doen  Door de energietransitie komt er meer werk dan ooit op ons af  Steeds meer huizen en wijken gaan van het gas af  En de meter  die rollen we nog steeds uit  Dat heeft impact  zeker op onze afdeling Meterdatamanagement  Het team Meterdatamanagement zorgt onder andere voor het verstrekken van meterdata van inmiddels 1 3 miljoen klanten met een slimme meter aan gemandateerde marktpartijen en interne afdelingen  De data uit de meter is essentieel om  zowel intern als extern  procesverbeteringen en kostenbesparing tot stand te brengen  En daar kom jij als data analist bij kijken   Je bent een belangrijke schakel in het realiseren van een functionerend meterpark  Voor het beheren hiervan hebben we diverse systemen en processen  Het beheren van onze data processen kunnen we dan ook aan jou overlaten  In opdracht van de proces managers onderhoud en verbeter je deze systemen en processen  Door jouw inzichten  analyses  dashboards en visualisaties hebben we controle over onze processen en ons meterpark  Door jou verbeteren we onze prestaties   Je analyseert bijvoorbeeld waarom een meter geen data levert  In teamverband vind je aansluiting bij organisatievraagstukken  leg je verbanden tussen de beschikbare data en kan je bestaande Python en Splunk applicaties en reports dashboards  door ontwikkelen  Je vertaalt analyses en visualiseert deze  Ook ben je de vraagbaak coach op de inhoudelijke materie voor de junior data analisten  Zo veel mogelijk functionerende slimme meters  ook dat is de energietransitie  Genoeg te doen dus  Doe jij mee   Jouw sterke punten Worden we blij van  Je bent in staat je complexe werkzaamheden in begrijpelijk Nederlandse taal aan je stakeholders uit te leggen  Je kan analyses vertalen en visualiseren  Daar krijg je echt energie van  Je bent in staat heldere doelen te formuleren en jaagt deze na  Je bent ondernemend  doelgericht en overziet het speelveld en de hieraan gerelateerde afdelingen en processen  Je bent pro actief en meedenkend met jouw stakeholders uit de business  Immers zorgen we samen voor een functionerend meterpark  Wat jou verder onze nieuwe  junior  data analist maakt   Je hebt minimaal een hbo niveau opleiding afgerond  bij voorkeur in de richting informatica of vergelijkbaar   Je hebt enige jaren relevante  stage ervaring met relationele databases RDMS SQL en het analyseren  koppelen en transformeren van data   Je hebt kennis en ervaring van een of meerdere programmeertalen  zoals Python  Splunk C    Java   Je bent goed in staat om hoofd  van bijzaken te onderscheiden en kan ook goed zelfstandig werken   Bekijk Onze arbeidsvoorwaarden  Elke maand je Persoonlijk Budget kiezen  Het Persoonlijk Budget is een percentage van je bruto maandsalaris en ontvang je bovenop je salaris  Afhankelijk van je salarisschaal is dat tot 24  van je brutosalaris  inclusief 8  vakantiegeld  Je bepaalt zelf waaraan je het Persoonlijk Budget wilt besteden  Zo kun je het uit laten keren voor een maandelijks extraatje  Of je koopt extra verlofdagen   Flexibele werktijden  Wil je zelf je werkweek indelen  Samen met je leidinggevende bepaal jij zo veel mogelijk je eigen werktijden  We werken 8 uur per dag  Afhankelijk van je werkzaamheden  heb je de mogelijkheid om  wanneer het kan  thuis te werken   Vervoer  We zijn een duurzaam bedrijf  Reis je met het OV naar je werk  dan krijg je van ons een OV Vrij abonnement 2e klas  Dit abonnement mag je ook priv� gebruiken  Kies je voor een vaste reiskostenvergoeding dan ontvang je 13 cent per kilometer  maximaal 60 kilometer enkele reis   Met je FlexBudget kun je dit aanvullen tot 19 cent netto per kilometer  Krijg je als monteur je eigen bedrijfsbus  dan mag je deze ook gebruiken voor woon werkverkeer  Onze bedrijfs  en leaseauto s zijn steeds vaker elektrisch  Voor zakelijk verkeer gebruiken we deelauto s   Een goed team Daar hoor je bij  Meteen vanaf dag ��n maak je deel uit van analisten en een aantal proces managers in het team waarmee je werkt  De aankomende jaren zorgen we ervoor dat we het beheer en de waarborging van de analyse omgeving naar een hoger kan en mag ongeveer de helft van de tijd op ons kantoor in Rotterdam en Delft  de plek waar jij je collega s ontmoet  Wel zo flexibel  De andere helft van de tijd werk je thuis  Natuurlijk zorgen wij in de maand februari  Gewoon met de knop  solliciteren   Vergeet niet je CV mee te sturen  Om een goede selectie te kunnen maken  ontvangen we ook graag een motivatiebrief   Als we ook denken dat je selectieprocedure  De procedure is als volgt  je maakt meteen kennis met de materie door een case die je we opsturen ter voorbereiding van het 1ste gesprek  Zien wij het allemaal nog zitten na een citizenM is a global lifestyle hotel company involved in the full spectrum of the customer journey  from sourcing a potential reservation  to checking in and staying in the hotel  to the design and development of our hotels  This degree of vertical integration is unique in the industry  This gives us an incredibly rich dataset to collect  transform  and analyze in order to improve the effectiveness of the operating model and therefore guest experience  Much of this data is combined in citizenM s data platform  If data to you is like a bee to honey then we have the honey pot for you purpose As a data analyst on the hotel operations domain you will have the opportunity to work citizenM s rich data sources  You will be preparing dashboards and performing in depth analysis to provide insights in the operational activities around our hotels so that we can smoothen our operations and optimize our guest experience  This role is part of the Business Intelligence Team  where you will be working closely with all functions in the team to transform data into wisdom for different disciplines within citizenM  As part of this role you will collaborate closely with the  hotel  operations team  key responsibilities  leading consumer insight initiatives in an agile way together with all relevant business units  develop dashboards in PowerBI which allow relevant teams to generate insights and track performance around operational hotel initiatives such as food   beverage  housekeeping and guest satisfaction  identify the requests for operational insights and separate the nice to knows from the need to knows  translate these requests into valid research questions  work with big data sets in our data platform to generate the required insights you are able to translate these outcomes into useful insights and to prepare proposals for metrics and solutions  you will apply different data visualization and storytelling techniques in order to convey the message  in this role you should have a curious mind and will analyze data proactively in order to propose areas in need for insights and in order to seize business opportunities  since you will work closely with the core business units you should understand what is happening at citizenM and be able to develop a strong network across several layers within the organization  qualifications   skills a genuine passion for data and the ability to combine analytical data skills with business knowledge  a bachelor  masters preferred  degree  preferably in the field of data analytics  data science or business analytics  proven proficiency in the use of PowerBI  understanding of relational modeling and relational databases  mainly SQL   affinity with a statistical  data science  programming language for advanced analytics  such as R or Python  attention to detail and a creative mindset  ability to succeed in both collaborative and independent work environments  strong communication skills   both written and oral   in order to convey complex analytical results clearly  you re eager to understand and learn about operational processes and the data that is generated through these processes  experience with Agile way of working  locations   hours Voorschoten Support office  Hybrid working is possible  not fully remote  This is a full time position  citizenM is an affordable luxury hotel chain for mobile citizens of the world  With style that will knock your socks off  we offer citizens a real home from home  plus the world s fluffiest pillows  Our typical guest is a frequent traveler who is quality and design driven  and value conscious  We currently have hotels in the Netherlands  France  UK  Switzerland  Denmark  USA and Asia  with more to come soon  We are proud to put hospitality back into the hospitality industry  and have received numerous awards for our groundbreaking approach  We like to do things differently  This means our hotels are not traditional  and neither are our support offices  We re open minded  with kind hearts and global minds  citizenM loves diversity  We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from anyone   AS  LI Hybrid

job_desc: A lot of companies are drowning in data but starving for information  Are you excited about turning their data into actionable insights and unlocking their true potential  Then Rockfeather is the place to be Your role as a Data Science Consultant As a Data Science consultant  you guide our customers in their data driven journey  You help them unlock the true value of their data by sharpening their vision  educating them on data science  and support them in selecting the right solutions  As a real hands on consultant  you provide them with an implementation approach that you will execute later on  You are responsible for those projects from start to finish  Sometimes you will act as project lead  and you are the primary contact for your customer  You will serve as the leader of the pack of young and ambitious data scientists on these projects  You do not simply create what your customers ask for  but what they need  After all  it is your profession  Your most important tasks as a Data Science ConsultantYou advising clients on data science challenges  You provide and develop good management information for your customers  You develop tangible data science solutions  You work with various solutions such as Python  Azure Machine Learning  Alteryx  Dataiku  and other leading Data Science solutions  You creating content to inspire  potential  customers and colleagues   What does Rockfeather have to offer  Rockfeather gives you the complete freedom to continue your development as a Data Science specialist if you want to combine challenging assignments  work for ambitious companies  and help build a team in an entrepreneurial environment  Together we are passionate about the possibilities of data driven working and offering the best solution for our job_title: Two Assistant Professors in Geometric and Topological aspects of Data and Algorithms
job_desc: Are you a researcher in mathematics  Are you interested in geometry  topology  data science and algorithms  Please apply at Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam  VU   Location  Amsterdam FTE  0 8   1 Job description We are seeking a new colleague who is passionate about scientific research and education  Our department is looking for mathematicians with a proven expertise in geometric and topological aspects of data and algorithms  This topic can be interpreted in a wide sense  we are interested in analytical  statistical  probabilistic and combinatorial ideas to deepen our understanding of the relation between geometric and topological ideas on the one hand  and data science and its algorithms on the other hand  Concrete subject fields include stochastic geometry  topological  methods in  data analysis  geometric aspects of statistical learning  reconstruction of manifolds from data  equivariant deep neural networks  and applications of these  Other combinations of geometry topology and data algorithms are also a possibility   In this position  you develop their own research line  The position of Assistant Professor is initially a tenure track position for five years  After four years  based on transparent criteria  we will take a decision on the tenure  The preferred starting date is on or before September 1  2022   Applications from all groups currently under represented in academic posts are particularly encouraged  We are working to improve the present gender balance within the department  and particularly welcome applications from women Your duties you develop a research line in the broad area covering geometric and topological aspects of data and algorithms you complement existing research activities in the department you contribute to the teaching of the department  at both the undergraduate and graduate level you show academic leadership  nationally and internationally you participate in departmental activities and tasks  including writing grant proposals Requirements you have a PhD in mathematics  for example in the fields mentioned above  with a few years of postdoctoral experience you have a strong research record  as witnessed by excellent publications  original research projects  and an international network you are an inspiring lecturer you have good communication and execution skills you are fluent in English you have a basic teaching qualification   BKO    as required by Dutch universities  or equivalent  If not  you are willing to obtain this qualification What are we offering  A challenging position in a socially involved organisation  Based on full time employment  and depending on experience  the gross monthly salary ranges from  3807 to  5922 in accordance with Dutch academic salary scales 11  or 12  The job profile  Assistant professor or  Universitair docent   is based on the Dutch university job ranking system and the position is available for 0 8 1 0 FTE  For exceptional  experienced candidates an appointment as associate professor is a possibility   The appointment will initially be for 5 years  tenure track   After a satisfactory evaluation of the initial appointment  the contract will be extended indefinitely  Additionally  Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam offers excellent fringe benefits and various schemes and regulations to promote a good work life balance  such as  a maximum of 41 days of annual leave based on full time employment 8  holiday allowance and 8 3  end of year bonus contribution to commuting expenses good paid parental leave scheme child daycare facilities available on campusAbout Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam The ambition of Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is clear  to contribute to a better world through outstanding education and ground breaking research  We strive to be a university where personal development and commitment to society play a leading role  A university where people from different disciplines and backgrounds collaborate to achieve innovations and to generate new knowledge  Our teaching and research encompass the entire spectrum of academic endeavor   from the humanities  the social sciences and the natural sciences through to the life sciences and the medical sciences   Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is home to more than 26 000 students  We employ over 4 600 individuals  The VU campus is easily accessible and located in the heart of Amsterdam s Zuidas district  a truly inspiring environment for teaching and research  Diversity  We are an inclusive university community  Diversity is one of our most important values  We believe that engaging in international activities and welcoming students and staff from a wide variety of backgrounds enhances the quality of our education and research  We are always looking for people who can enrich our world with their own unique perspectives and experiences  The Faculty of Science  The Faculty of Science inspires researchers and students to find sustainable solutions for complex societal issues  From forest fires to big data  from obesity to medicines and from molecules to the moon  our teaching and research programmes cover the full spectrum of the natural sciences  We share knowledge and experience with leading research institutes and industries  both here in the Netherlands and abroad   Working at the Faculty of Science means working with students  PhD candidates and researchers  all with a clear focus on their field and a broad view of the world  We employ more than 1 250 staff members  and we are home to around 6 000 students The Department of Mathematics  The Department of Mathematics strives for excellence in research  The department balances pure mathematical research with mathematical research motivated by applications  Researchers in the department are on one hand active at a fundamental and theoretical level  and  on the other hand  work on applications with links to business  the sciences  and societal issues  The department has a strong international research staff with expertise in dynamical systems  geometry and algebra  as well as in stochastics  statistics  data analytics  probability    The department offers bachelor and master programmes in mathematics and in business analytics  In addition  the department provides mathematics courses for other programmes of the Faculty of Science  for programmes of other faculties in the university  and for the Amsterdam University College  Application Are you interested in this position  Please apply via the application button by 1 April 2022 and upload  a cover letter in which you describe your abilities and motivation  a research statement  a brief teaching statement  a curriculum vitae  a publication list  as well as the contact details of three potential referees Applications received by e mail will not be processed  Vacancy questions  If you have any questions regarding this vacancy  please contact   Name  Bob Rink  Position  Professor of Mathematics  E mail  b w rink vu nl

You thrive working in a diverse   dynamic environment  are passionate about data and can explain the story the data tells in simple wording  Being a self starter you meet deadlines on assignments and juggle projects focusing on key issues and the details that come with it You have a natural curiosity to understand our diverse business with the same entrepreneurial spirit as our business leaders and are able to provide independent and objective data driven insights to help improve our performance  governance  controls  risk management and behaviours  Finally you are committed to self development as the world of data and technology is fast paced Preferred qualifications  Bachelor or Master degree  preferably in Engineering  Management Information Systems  Computer Science  Data Science or equivalent practical experience 3 to 5 years of relevant work experience in data analysis  visualisation or modelling Ability to navigate through ambiguity  manage and coordinate your part of the assignment and engage with multiple teams in a fast paced  deadline driven environment  accepting ownership and accountability of your area of the process and deliver on your commitments Fluent in English and able to express yourself both in writing as well as during interviews and presentations  Mastery of one additional language is preferred Fluent in SQL  and familiar with statistical programming languages Has high concern for quality  data and accuracy Can apply the rigor of working in a scientific manner Is eager to work on a variety of topics to support the global audit team Proven learning agility in either relevant work experience  participation in research or execution of assignments with a relentless hunger for developing yourself  Leadership skills  ability to take charge  confidence to interact with all levels  set objectives  drive results  and a team player  and excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to work with a wide variety of departments

Battolyser Systems is looking to recruit a Data Scientist Welcome to Battolyser Systems  a fully funded  cleantech scale up company based in The Netherlands  We develop and manufacture products that can store electricity and produce hydrogen from renewable power to balance societal demand in a truly revolutionary way  Let us take you on this journey and show how you can make a difference by joining a fast growing purpose driven company   First  some background information on Battolyser Systems  Seven years ago  some really smart people at the Delft University of Technology invented the world s first integrated battery and electrolyser system  They named it a  Battolyser  and realized this invention could connect renewable power generation in a revolutionary way with how society will consume energy in a net zero emission world  To make real impact  the technology was spun out of the Delft University of Technology into a separate company in 2018 to demonstrate a proof of concept in an industrial setting  And so  Battolyser Systems was born  Fast forward to today  We have a patented and proven technology  customers are lined up and funding is secured  We have also attracted top talent in the renewable energy and hydrogen market  whom are passionate and motivated to make a difference  Knowledgeable  connected and committed are some of the keywords that best describe current leadership  In growing the company we are looking for a data scientist to join our team and help us and our customers realize the value that Battolyser unlocks The Role  This role is part of the business development team  You are responsible for modelling and optimizing the value a Battolyser creates  Thanks to the unique technology a Battolyser unlocks value in different electricity markets  day ahead  balancing and frequency  and by producing clean hydrogen  In your role you will interact closely with the rest of the business development team and potentially with customers and the product team  Specific task include   Own and improve a Python model that optimizes and compares the value of Battolyser to competing technologies Set up a robust  version control environment to manage model development in a structured manner Work with the business development and sales team to model the performance of a Battolyser in different set ups  e g  grid connected  off grid  hydrogen customer on site  and geographies Use data visualization tools to develop reports to present the outcomes of your modelling Identify and implement new algorithms to optimize the trade offs that a Battolyser allows a customers to make  Co  Develop a strategy to help our customers realize the value of a Battolyser  including options to support customers to operate  dispatch  the Battolyser in real time The Person  We feel  in order to be successful in this role  you need at least 2 4 years of experience with Python in a professional context  You need to have a firm grip on Object Oriented Programming  OOP  and be comfortable in Git  Also  experience with data visualization is a must  You are self driven and intrinsically motivated to build the best model possible and unlock value to our customers  You can strike a good balance between optimizing and being flexible to tailor your priorities to business needs  Finally  you want to learn and aspire a career in renewable energy  Oh  and if you have experience in data science  operational optimization or energy market modelling that would really set you apart  How to apply  Hopefully we managed to get you interested  If you feel you are the right fit with the right motivation we can t wait to receive your application  Battolyser Systems is an Equal Opportunity Employer and welcomes Diversity

As a Data Scientist at Facebook  you will shape the future of people facing and business facing products we build across our entire family of applications  Facebook  Instagram  Messenger  WhatsApp  Oculus   By applying your technical skills  analytical mindset  and product intuition to one of the richest data sets in the world  you will help define the experiences we build for billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses around the world  You will collaborate on a wide array of product and business problems with a diverse set of cross functional partners across Product  Engineering  Research  Data Engineering  Marketing  Sales  Finance and others  You will use data and analysis to identify and solve product development s biggest challenges  You will influence product strategy and investment decisions with data  be focused on impact  and collaborate with other teams  By joining Facebook  you will become part of a world class analytics community dedicated to skill development and career growth in analytics and beyond Product leadership  You will use data to shape product development  quantify new opportunities  identify upcoming challenges  and ensure the products we build bring value to people  businesses  and Facebook  You will help your partner teams prioritize what to build  set goals  and understand their product s ecosystem Analytics  You will guide teams using data and insights  You will focus on developing hypotheses and employ a diverse toolkit of rigorous analytical approaches  different methodologies  frameworks  and technical approaches to test them Communication and influence  You won t simply present data  but tell data driven stories  You will convince and influence your partners using clear insights and recommendations  You will build credibility through structure and clarity  and be a trusted strategic partner Data Scientist  Product Analytics Responsibilities  Work with large and complex data sets to solve a wide array of challenging problems using different analytical and statistical approaches  Apply technical expertise with quantitative analysis  experimentation  data mining  and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our products that serve billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses  Identify and measure success of product efforts through goal setting  forecasting  and monitoring of key product metrics to understand trends  Define  understand  and test opportunities and levers to improve the product  and drive roadmaps through your insights and recommendations  Partner with Product  Engineering  and cross functional teams to inform  influence  support  and execute product strategy and investment decisions Minimum Qualifications  A Bachelor s degree  BA or BS  A minimum of 4 years of work experience in analytics  minimum of 2 years with a Ph D   Experience with data querying languages  e g  SQL   scripting languages  e g  Python   and or statistical mathematical software  e g  R Preferred Qualifications  Masters or Ph D  Degree in a quantitative field

Introduction to the job Do you enjoy building in depth understanding of our business  processes  by deep diving into data  turning this into information and insights and creating applications with business stakeholders  Are you a pragmatic team player that likes to participate in solving challenges in a complex  high tech environment  Then you are a great candidate to become our new Data Analyst in the D E Quality   Continuous Improvement organization  Role and responsibilities The mission of the data analyst is to draw fact based conclusions based on available data  You will create reports and small applications for this  Reports may be industrialized to serve repeated analysis and steering  You will participate in improvement programs and or development teams in the ASML Information System  AIS  value stream  As Data Analyst you take responsibility to  Create in depth understanding of the business problems our stakeholders face Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends and patterns to clarify and detail our understanding of the issues Find and combine  structured and unstructured  data  Clean and prepare data for processing  statistical analysis and  predictive  modelling  Transform data into information and insights  by using your craftsmanship and applying different techniques   Execute analysis and creating visualizations and reports Formulate hypotheses based on business process understanding and test using business process data Challenge business assumptions using fact based analyses on business process data Ensure developed work is properly documented and can be handed over to colleagues and or IT Directly manage stakeholders of your analysis by involving them on developments in your workEducation and experience BSc   HBO degree 2 7 years  experience in working with data  statistics  analysis tools and techniques  Knowledge of Business Intelligence  databases and related techniques  Knowledge of data cleaning  modelling and transformation  Experience with applications like Spotfire  Mendix  SAP HANA  Excel  SQL and Python Skills Working at the cutting edge of tech  you ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve   and working together is the only way to do that  You won t work in a silo  Instead  you ll be part of a creative  dynamic work environment where you ll collaborate with supportive colleagues  There is always space for creative and unique points of view  You ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems  To thrive in this job  you ll need the following skills  Thinks creative  out of the box  Internal drive to  find the needle in the haystack   Pragmatic pro active  entrepreneurial  Team player  good social skills  customer oriented  Good communicative skills  including presentation skills  Take ownership over your team s work to together create a successful end product Use business knowledge and prior experiences to challenge data analysis requests and approaches Speak up towards colleagues and stakeholders to ensure quality expectations are met Think outside boundaries of your job description in order to support the quality of your deliverableDiversity   Inclusion ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce  It is the policy of the company to recruit  hire  train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race  color  religion  sex  age  national origin  veteran status  disability  sexual orientation  or gender identity  We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company  Other information Need to know more about applying for a job at ASML  Read our frequently asked questions

job_desc: Do you get excited about analyzing data in game performances  Then continue reading   WHO WE AREAt Guerrilla  our Data Analytics team is an integral part of the game development process  Working closely with the stakeholders to create highest quality games  We are looking for a passionate and resourceful Data Scientist to identify opportunities to improve the player experience WHAT YOU WILL DOYou will develop and maintain standards for dashboards and reporting initiatives  This includes making sure data is visualized appropriately  creating consistent standards  and confirming that all data is accurate You will document requirements  develop  and deliver both written reports with analysis and charts on a dashboard You will work with engineering and QA to consistently monitor and improve our data You will perform statistical data analysis using data querying tools such as SQL and Spark You will synthesize disparate data  detect  and work around broken data  and investigate every possibility until you have a thorough solution You will analyze player gameplay and economy telemetry data to understand player behavior and suggest actions to improve the player experience You will work closely with development teams to provide insights into game quality  difficulty  and fun WHO YOU AREYou have a M S  in Mathematics  Machine Learning  Data Science  Statistics  Operations Research  Economics  or another quantitative field You have 3  years experience as a data scientist in the video games industry You Demonstrated understanding and passion of both contemporary video games and analytics best practices You have demonstrated skills in visualizing data  specifically utilizing Tableau You have experience with predictive modeling techniques and accomplished in the use of R or Python modules You possess a solid understanding of statistics  e g  statistical power analysis  significance testing  t tests  ANOVA You have experience in at least one cloud platform such as AWS  GCP  or Azure You have proven track record in data mining   analytics  building models with large  complex  and multi dimensional data sets Please note  this position is based in our studio in Amsterdam  Guerrilla offers comprehensive relocation and immigration support for candidates with experience in AAA games recruitment INTERESTED If you think you re up for the challenge  we d love to hear from you  You can apply by hitting the  apply now  button  Be sure to submit your CV and a Cover Motivation Letter   we like learning a bit about your background and your reasons for applying at Guerrilla Job Type  Full time

The Data Reporting Analyst will be responsible for transforming data into information that can be utilized to make business decisions and actions  This will involve acquiring data from various sources and creating reports on a regular basis  Client Details Tulp Group is a mortgage company with a focus on clear and sustainable choices  It has 3 own mortgage brands in the Dutch mortgage market  Tulp Hypotheken   Owner occupied mortgage loans  AFM regulated  De Nederlandse   Buy to Let mortgage loans for professional landlords Brug Financieringen   Transition mortgage loans for professional investors We offer mortgage loans for the purchase  refurbishment  transition  from office to apartments  and refinancing of existing homes   mortgages with long periods of fixed interest rates  We operate of the premise of finding the right balance between sharp interest rates  repayment options and excellent conditions  This ensures that we are always one of the most competitive mortgage lenders on the market   Via Tulp Group  foreign  investors can invest in Dutch mortgage loan exposure  This can be achieved via warehouses  securitizations and whole loans  Tulp has finance relations with large investors and banks like Natwest  HSBC  Citi  MUFG  BNP Credit Agricole  TwentyFour Asset Management and Donner   Reuschel  Tulp Group was founded in 2015 by Paul Wessels and Pierre de Vos and has a team of approximately 20 professionals  Description Responsible for keeping the various reports up to date Striving to achieve a modular and re usable reporting landscape based on highly automated processes You will be instrumental in delivering reports in a consistent  accurate and timely manner  You have an integral role in gather requirements and data to utilize business decisions job_desc: Hunt   Hackett helps European companies prevent  detect and respond to today s most advanced adversaries  safeguarding them against cyberthreats and espionage  We don t stir a bit into security strategies  our talented team of responsible rebels shakes them up to build  operate and maintain digital immune systems for our customers to outsmart their digital adversaries   To extend our multidisciplinary team we are now hiring Data scientist   Developer  Are you thorough by default and pragmatic when needed  Do you like to explain to your friends how your piece of code found the Russian adversary in the terabytes of event data  You know that Pandas are more than just black  and white coloured fluffy animals  Do you belong to the most talented group of data scientist and   or developers in the industry   or is this where you plan to be  Then Hunt   Hackett might be your next best step   Data Scientist at Hunt   Hackett  Data science is a core competency and focus within Hunt   Hackett and not just an ingredient of our marketing storyline  We believe that modern cyber security and catching bad guys requires data science in order to build  operate and maintain a digital immune system  This gives the power to our clients to safeguard their organization against cyber attacks  To do this we collect  big data and use our tradecraft to create  real time  insights that guide our actions in order to secure our customers   Hunt   Hackett is currently in start up phase  This means that you work highly independently and no one needs to explain to you what needs to be done  You have experience with properly processing large amounts of data and developing code around this  You do this by applying the latest software development and architectural paradigms  which ultimately gives you warm and fuzzy feelings  Your standard modus operandi is developing robust  high quality  reusable and production level source code  However  you have a pragmatic attitude as well and nothing is stopping you if you are in a situation that requires direct patching code in a production environment   You have architectural capabilities and like to glue things together  ranging from internal business processes to individual systems  applications and API s  In practice this means that next to your innovative projects  you support internal processes related to Incident Response  Threat Intelligence and our Cyber Defense Center   Furthermore  you might be interested in Hunt   Hackett because you like the company name  or having an office close to the beach  However  we are not yet another company and we would like to see that next to your passion for data science and software development  you have an interest as well in finding bad stuff and contributing to safeguarding our society   Hunt   Hackett is not yet another security company and we expect our employees to match that  We are looking for data science and software development passion  but expect you to have a strong interest in finding bad stuff and making society more secure as well   The Hunt   Hackett wish list  The right candidate The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  Is able to demonstrate their experience by showing their source code and or projects worked on   showyourgithub An aspiration to fulfill a role as an expert architect on technical projects  Preferred development language experience in Python and JavaScript  Experience with Pandas  Scikit learn and Spark or similar tools and techniques  Experience with Cloud services in AWS  GCP  Azure and cloud tools like Google Big Query   What is your wish list  As a minimum  Hunt   Hackett offers you The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  A unique culture of  responsible rebellion  where you can learn from the best to get the most out of yourself  The most innovative security tools you need to get the job done  Plenty of time and opportunity to develop yourself with regards to SOC  IR  Red Teaming etc   A proper laptop and phone to get the job done  A modern pension  which is transparent and can be controlled by yourself  Employee share participation scheme  Compensation for your travel costs   A culture of  responsible rebellion   Only  very  talented  multidisciplinary teams of threat hunters  intelligence analysts  reverse engineers  data scientists  developers and hackers are able to outsmart the increasingly professional community of cyber attackers  We pride ourselves as a force for the good and as such we think and act as responsible rebels  We are not  just another security company   and our people are not  just employees   Everyone at Hunt   Hackett wants to be the best in their field and focusses at delivering next gen levels of service  This means that we  Push the envelope  Everyone at our teams takes the responsibility to make our work better every day  by being creative to color outside of the lines if needed  Help you to become the best version of yourself  We bring together the best minds in the field  to inspire each other and to learn from each other  Personal development and growth are important to us and our customers  Build mission driven teams  We believe in the power of small teams who can focus on strategic tasks  not on repetitive work that can be automated  It s up to you to make this happen  Believe that God is in the details  Tiny details can have a huge impact  especially in security  This is why we champion tradecraft  We are system thinkers that oversee the big picture but who are simultaneously obsessive about the details Are Responsible Rebels  We are polite  We are courteous  We show professionalism  For more information or to apply  send an email to info huntandhackett com

As a Data Scientist at Facebook  you will shape the future of people facing and business facing products we build across our entire family of applications  Facebook  Instagram  Messenger  WhatsApp  Oculus   By applying your technical skills  analytical mindset  and product intuition to one of the richest data sets in the world  you will help define the experiences we build for billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses around the world  You will collaborate on a wide array of product and business problems with a diverse set of cross functional partners across Product  Engineering  Research  Data Engineering  Marketing  Sales  Finance and others  You will use data and analysis to identify and solve product development s biggest challenges  You will influence product strategy and investment decisions with data  be focused on impact  and collaborate with other teams  By joining Facebook  you will become part of a world class analytics community dedicated to skill development and career growth in analytics and beyond Product leadership  You will use data to shape product development  quantify new opportunities  identify upcoming challenges  and ensure the products we build bring value to people  businesses  and Facebook  You will help your partner teams prioritize what to build  set goals  and understand their product s ecosystem Analytics  You will guide teams using data and insights  You will focus on developing hypotheses and employ a diverse toolkit of rigorous analytical approaches  different methodologies  frameworks  and technical approaches to test them Communication and influence  You won t simply present data  but tell data driven stories  You will convince and influence your partners using clear insights and recommendations  You will build credibility through structure and clarity  and be a trusted strategic partner Data Scientist  Product Analytics Responsibilities  Work with large and complex data sets to solve a wide array of challenging problems using different analytical and statistical approaches  Apply technical expertise with quantitative analysis  experimentation  data mining  and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our products that serve billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses  Identify and measure success of product efforts through goal setting  forecasting  and monitoring of key product metrics to understand trends  Define  understand  and test opportunities and levers to improve the product  and drive roadmaps through your insights and recommendations  Partner with Product  Engineering  and cross functional teams to inform  influence  support  and execute product strategy and investment decisions Minimum Qualifications  A Bachelor s degree  BA or BS  A minimum of 4 years of work experience in analytics  minimum of 2 years with a Ph D   Experience with data querying languages  e g  SQL   scripting languages  e g  Python   and or statistical mathematical software  e g  R Preferred Qualifications  Masters or Ph D  Degree in a quantitative field

Introduction to the job Do you enjoy building in depth understanding of our business  processes  by deep diving into data  turning this into information and insights and creating applications with business stakeholders  Are you a pragmatic team player that likes to participate in solving challenges in a complex  high tech environment  Then you are a great candidate to become our new Data Analyst in the D E Quality   Continuous Improvement organization  Role and responsibilities The mission of the data analyst is to draw fact based conclusions based on available data  You will create reports and small applications for this  Reports may be industrialized to serve repeated analysis and steering  You will participate in improvement programs and or development teams in the ASML Information System  AIS  value stream  As Data Analyst you take responsibility to  Create in depth understanding of the business problems our stakeholders face Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends and patterns to clarify and detail our understanding of the issues Find and combine  structured and unstructured  data  Clean and prepare data for processing  statistical analysis and  predictive  modelling  Transform data into information and insights  by using your craftsmanship and applying different techniques   Execute analysis and creating visualizations and reports Formulate hypotheses based on business process understanding and test using business process data Challenge business assumptions using fact based analyses on business process data Ensure developed work is properly documented and can be handed over to colleagues and or IT Directly manage stakeholders of your analysis by involving them on developments in your workEducation and experience BSc   HBO degree 2 7 years  experience in working with data  statistics  analysis tools and techniques  Knowledge of Business Intelligence  databases and related techniques  Knowledge of data cleaning  modelling and transformation  Experience with applications like Spotfire  Mendix  SAP HANA  Excel  SQL and Python Skills Working at the cutting edge of tech  you ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve   and working together is the only way to do that  You won t work in a silo  Instead  you ll be part of a creative  dynamic work environment where you ll collaborate with supportive colleagues  There is always space for creative and unique points of view  You ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems  To thrive in this job  you ll need the following skills  Thinks creative  out of the box  Internal drive to  find the needle in the haystack   Pragmatic pro active  entrepreneurial  Team player  good social skills  customer oriented  Good communicative skills  including presentation skills  Take ownership over your team s work to together create a successful end product Use business knowledge and prior experiences to challenge data analysis requests and approaches Speak up towards colleagues and stakeholders to ensure quality expectations are met Think outside boundaries of your job description in order to support the quality of your deliverableDiversity   Inclusion ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce  It is the policy of the company to recruit  hire  train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race  color  religion  sex  age  national origin  veteran status  disability  sexual orientation  or gender identity  We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company  Other information Need to know more about applying for a job at ASML  Read our frequently asked questions

job_desc: Do you get excited about analyzing data in game performances  Then continue reading   WHO WE AREAt Guerrilla  our Data Analytics team is an integral part of the game development process  Working closely with the stakeholders to create highest quality games  We are looking for a passionate and resourceful Data Scientist to identify opportunities to improve the player experience WHAT YOU WILL DOYou will develop and maintain standards for dashboards and reporting initiatives  This includes making sure data is visualized appropriately  creating consistent standards  and confirming that all data is accurate You will document requirements  develop  and deliver both written reports with analysis and charts on a dashboard You will work with engineering and QA to consistently monitor and improve our data You will perform statistical data analysis using data querying tools such as SQL and Spark You will synthesize disparate data  detect  and work around broken data  and investigate every possibility until you have a thorough solution You will analyze player gameplay and economy telemetry data to understand player behavior and suggest actions to improve the player experience You will work closely with development teams to provide insights into game quality  difficulty  and fun WHO YOU AREYou have a M S  in Mathematics  Machine Learning  Data Science  Statistics  Operations Research  Economics  or another quantitative field You have 3  years experience as a data scientist in the video games industry You Demonstrated understanding and passion of both contemporary video games and analytics best practices You have demonstrated skills in visualizing data  specifically utilizing Tableau You have experience with predictive modeling techniques and accomplished in the use of R or Python modules You possess a solid understanding of statistics  e g  statistical power analysis  significance testing  t tests  ANOVA You have experience in at least one cloud platform such as AWS  GCP  or Azure You have proven track record in data mining   analytics  building models with large  complex  and multi dimensional data sets Please note  this position is based in our studio in Amsterdam  Guerrilla offers comprehensive relocation and immigration support for candidates with experience in AAA games recruitment INTERESTED If you think you re up for the challenge  we d love to hear from you  You can apply by hitting the  apply now  button  Be sure to submit your CV and a Cover Motivation Letter   we like learning a bit about your background and your reasons for applying at Guerrilla Job Type  Full time

job_desc: Hunt   Hackett helps European companies prevent  detect and respond to today s most advanced adversaries  safeguarding them against cyberthreats and espionage  We don t stir a bit into security strategies  our talented team of responsible rebels shakes them up to build  operate and maintain digital immune systems for our customers to outsmart their digital adversaries   To extend our multidisciplinary team we are now hiring Data scientist   Developer  Are you thorough by default and pragmatic when needed  Do you like to explain to your friends how your piece of code found the Russian adversary in the terabytes of event data  You know that Pandas are more than just black  and white coloured fluffy animals  Do you belong to the most talented group of data scientist and   or developers in the industry   or is this where you plan to be  Then Hunt   Hackett might be your next best step   Data Scientist at Hunt   Hackett  Data science is a core competency and focus within Hunt   Hackett and not just an ingredient of our marketing storyline  We believe that modern cyber security and catching bad guys requires data science in order to build  operate and maintain a digital immune system  This gives the power to our clients to safeguard their organization against cyber attacks  To do this we collect  big data and use our tradecraft to create  real time  insights that guide our actions in order to secure our customers   Hunt   Hackett is currently in start up phase  This means that you work highly independently and no one needs to explain to you what needs to be done  You have experience with properly processing large amounts of data and developing code around this  You do this by applying the latest software development and architectural paradigms  which ultimately gives you warm and fuzzy feelings  Your standard modus operandi is developing robust  high quality  reusable and production level source code  However  you have a pragmatic attitude as well and nothing is stopping you if you are in a situation that requires direct patching code in a production environment   You have architectural capabilities and like to glue things together  ranging from internal business processes to individual systems  applications and API s  In practice this means that next to your innovative projects  you support internal processes related to Incident Response  Threat Intelligence and our Cyber Defense Center   Furthermore  you might be interested in Hunt   Hackett because you like the company name  or having an office close to the beach  However  we are not yet another company and we would like to see that next to your passion for data science and software development  you have an interest as well in finding bad stuff and contributing to safeguarding our society   Hunt   Hackett is not yet another security company and we expect our employees to match that  We are looking for data science and software development passion  but expect you to have a strong interest in finding bad stuff and making society more secure as well   The Hunt   Hackett wish list  The right candidate The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  Is able to demonstrate their experience by showing their source code and or projects worked on   showyourgithub An aspiration to fulfill a role as an expert architect on technical projects  Preferred development language experience in Python and JavaScript  Experience with Pandas  Scikit learn and Spark or similar tools and techniques  Experience with Cloud services in AWS  GCP  Azure and cloud tools like Google Big Query   What is your wish list  As a minimum  Hunt   Hackett offers you The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  A unique culture of  responsible rebellion  where you can learn from the best to get the most out of yourself  The most innovative security tools you need to get the job done  Plenty of time and opportunity to develop yourself with regards to SOC  IR  Red Teaming etc   A proper laptop and phone to get the job done  A modern pension  which is transparent and can be controlled by yourself  Employee share participation scheme  Compensation for your travel costs   A culture of  responsible rebellion   Only  very  talented  multidisciplinary teams of threat hunters  intelligence analysts  reverse engineers  data scientists  developers and hackers are able to outsmart the increasingly professional community of cyber attackers  We pride ourselves as a force for the good and as such we think and act as responsible rebels  We are not  just another security company   and our people are not  just employees   Everyone at Hunt   Hackett wants to be the best in their field and focusses at delivering next gen levels of service  This means that we  Push the envelope  Everyone at our teams takes the responsibility to make our work better every day  by being creative to color outside of the lines if needed  Help you to become the best version of yourself  We bring together the best minds in the field  to inspire each other and to learn from each other  Personal development and growth are important to us and our customers  Build mission driven teams  We believe in the power of small teams who can focus on strategic tasks  not on repetitive work that can be automated  It s up to you to make this happen  Believe that God is in the details  Tiny details can have a huge impact  especially in security  This is why we champion tradecraft  We are system thinkers that oversee the big picture but who are simultaneously obsessive about the details Are Responsible Rebels  We are polite  We are courteous  We show professionalism  For more information or to apply  send an email to info huntandhackett com

job_desc: About us  Beat is one of the most exciting companies to ever come out of the ride hailing space  One city at a time  all across the globe we make transportation affordable  convenient  and safe for everyone  We also help hundreds of thousands of people earn extra income as drivers   Today we are the fastest growing ride hailing service in Latin America  But serving millions of rides every day pales in comparison to what lies ahead  Our plans for expansion are limitless  Our stellar engineering team operates across a number of European capitals where  right now  some of the world s most ambitious and talented engineers are changing how cities will move in the future   Beat is currently available in Greece  Peru  Chile  Colombia  Mexico and Argentina   About the team  The Dispatch Domain at Beat consists of 4 teams  i e  dispatch  matching  mapping  machine learning  and works remotely in a dynamic and agile culture  to build a full suite of dispatch features and strategies  Some of the team s responsibilities include finding the  best  match between the passenger and the driver  accurate and flexible geo services  and optimising the supply allocation   The dispatch squads also develop the platforms and data pipelines to monitor  analyze and flawlessly deliver these features that create world class experiences for our drivers and passengers  Everything in a state of the art machine learning enviroment   About the role  As a Dispatch Analyst  you dig into various data sources of dispatch and other entities and provide meaningful insights to support the Dispatch Domain in understanding the problems they are trying to solve and the values that new ideas may bring   Your impact will be truly global as you will work on projects that affect dispatch decisions globally  The ideal candidate is strong in their craft and is experienced in using data to create insights for stakeholders across various functions such as big data and machine learning engineers  back end developers  data analysts  product managers  designers  senior management and operational teams   What you need to have 3 years of proven experience in a quantitative or analytical role in creating software products and services Educational background in quantitative discipline or equivalent experience Hands on knowledge of SQL and databases querying Hands on experience in using leading data visualization tools  preferably Tableau  for producing engaging and useful insights Strong statistics background  area of focus hypothesis testing  Experience working on geodata analysis  geohashes  geo functions  geometries and route planning is a plus Knowledge of programming languages like Python R is a plus Excellent communication skills to be able to share compelling data driven narratives Ability to collaborate with individuals from varying backgrounds and skill sets What you ll be doing Own end to end data analysis including business interpretations and formulation of next steps Proactively contribute to strengthening our experimentation framework efforts  by providing your expertise on metrics  statistics and visualisation of results Analyse  visualise and communicate key insights and metrics internally to dispatch domain and to other parts of the business Use domain s internal or external data in order to identify areas of opportunity to drive value Support on creating a robust quality assessment procedure of the dispatch mapping data Develop  implement and maintain internal reports that improve our ability to proactively and reactively measure and act on our dispatch mapping strategy Support other team members  as well as be an advocate for a data driven approach within the organisation What s in it for you  Competitive full time salary Private Health Coverage on the Company s group program  Breakfast  high quality daily lunch on a very low cost  fruit and snacks all day long Flexible working hours  top Line tools  Spanish Lessons Working in a hyper growth environment  you will enjoy numerous learning and career development opportunities A great opportunity to grow and work with the most amazing people in the industry  Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals  autonomy and mentoring  which creates incredible opportunities  both for you and the company  As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce  Beat is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race  color  national origin  ethnicity  gender  disability  sexual orientation  gender identity  or religion

Introduction to the job Do you enjoy building in depth understanding of our business  processes  by deep diving into data  turning this into information and insights and creating applications with business stakeholders  Are you a pragmatic team player that likes to participate in solving challenges in a complex  high tech environment  Then you are a great candidate to become our new Data Analyst in the D E Quality   Continuous Improvement organization  Role and responsibilities The mission of the data analyst is to draw fact based conclusions based on available data  You will create reports and small applications for this  Reports may be industrialized to serve repeated analysis and steering  You will participate in improvement programs and or development teams in the ASML Information System  AIS  value stream  As Data Analyst you take responsibility to  Create in depth understanding of the business problems our stakeholders face Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends and patterns to clarify and detail our understanding of the issues Find and combine  structured and unstructured  data  Clean and prepare data for processing  statistical analysis and  predictive  modelling  Transform data into information and insights  by using your craftsmanship and applying different techniques   Execute analysis and creating visualizations and reports Formulate hypotheses based on business process understanding and test using business process data Challenge business assumptions using fact based analyses on business process data Ensure developed work is properly documented and can be handed over to colleagues and or IT Directly manage stakeholders of your analysis by involving them on developments in your workEducation and experience BSc   HBO degree 2 7 years  experience in working with data  statistics  analysis tools and techniques  Knowledge of Business Intelligence  databases and related techniques  Knowledge of data cleaning  modelling and transformation  Experience with applications like Spotfire  Mendix  SAP HANA  Excel  SQL and Python Skills Working at the cutting edge of tech  you ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve   and working together is the only way to do that  You won t work in a silo  Instead  you ll be part of a creative  dynamic work environment where you ll collaborate with supportive colleagues  There is always space for creative and unique points of view  You ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems  To thrive in this job  you ll need the following skills  Thinks creative  out of the box  Internal drive to  find the needle in the haystack   Pragmatic pro active  entrepreneurial  Team player  good social skills  customer oriented  Good communicative skills  including presentation skills  Take ownership over your team s work to together create a successful end product Use business knowledge and prior experiences to challenge data analysis requests and approaches Speak up towards colleagues and stakeholders to ensure quality expectations are met Think outside boundaries of your job description in order to support the quality of your deliverableDiversity   Inclusion ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce  It is the policy of the company to recruit  hire  train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race  color  religion  sex  age  national origin  veteran status  disability  sexual orientation  or gender identity  We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company  Other information Need to know more about applying for a job at ASML  Read our frequently asked questions

job_desc: Purpose   Overall Relevance for the Organization  Earlier this year  adidas decided to elevate the Data   Analytics function  moving from a tech service to a value oriented business function that actively and directly impacts adidas  P L The Data   Analytics function will include a Global Operations Advanced Analytics team  which will work hand in hand with the Global Operations organization on strategically relevant use cases that have the potential to deliver substantial value and redefine the way that the Global Operations business function operates  For example  the Global Operations Advanced Analytics team will build data science products to make supply chain faster  more efficient  and responsive through seamless demand   supply planning  optimized logistics and distribution  customized replenishment and automated workforce and production planning  The Data Scientists in the Global Operations Advanced Analytics team will support the development of data science methods for specific use cases across the full analytics lifecycle  from defining the business   data understanding to data preparation  modeling  evaluation  and deployment  Key Responsibilities Data science Support the development of data science methods for specific Global Operations use cases Continuously improve our methodologies and challenge the status quo  raising the standards for faster delivery Support improving and automating the data science platform and our machine learning pipeline to facilitate our data science activities and service use cases Data science network and storytelling Develop and nurture a data science network  both within and outside of adidas  to ensure that best practices and innovations are disseminated across the company Support presenting and promoting results and insights to adidas colleagues at all levels Stakeholder management Manage the relationships with the Global Operations project team  ensuring their views and requirements are captured Act as the ambassador for your use case  showcasing the key functionalities  driving adoption  and assuring operational excellence together with IT peersKey relationships Global Operations project teams SCM IT team Other teams within Data   Analytics  e g   Data assets  data platforms  data governance  market teams  Requisite Education and Experience   Minimum Qualifications Work experience University degree in the field of numeric statistical discipline or equivalent At least 4 years work experience  preferably in a data science or analytics environment Analytical experience in Supply chain planning and operations preferred Proven track record of working with senior stakeholders Hard skills Proficiency in data science methods  including supervised techniques  unsupervised techniques  recommender systems  Experience in developing and running simulation  optimization  and what if scenario planning tools to support decision making Proficiency in at least two of the standard data science programming languages  e g   Python  R  Java  Scala  Octave  Solid understanding of relational databases and NoSQL databases  Experience working with Databricks preferred Solid understanding of Machine Learning Operations  MLOps  required to scale and sustain use cases in a large and global corporation Familiarity with agile development methodology Soft skills Impeccable and to the point written and oral communication skills  English  Comfortable in presenting complex topics to stakeholders at various organizational levels Proven team player that can collaborate across functions and organizations Ability to develop influential and collaborative relationships High resilience and solution oriented attitudeAT ADIDAS WE HAVE A WINNING CULTURE  BUT TO WIN  PHYSICAL POWER IS NOT ENOUGH  JUST LIKE ATHLETES OUR EMPLOYEES NEED MENTAL STRENGTH IN THEIR GAME  WE FOSTER THE ATHLETE S MINDSET THROUGH A SET OF BEHAVIORS THAT WE WANT TO ENABLE AND DEVELOP IN OUR PEOPLE AND THAT ARE AT THE CORE OF OUR UNIQUE COMPANY CULTURE   THE 3CS  CONFIDENCE  COLLABORATION AND CREATIVITY  CONFIDENCE allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field  to reach higher  For us at adidas confidence means acknowledging that we don t have all the answers  But we are willing to take risks  we try new things  And if we fail  then this is part of our learning   it helps us improve  COLLABORATION  Every elite athlete relies on partners  coaches  teammates  and nutritionists  We  too  know that we are stronger together  Winning as one team takes open and candid dialogue  inclusiveness and trust in each other s abilities and talents  Being the best sports company in the world takes CREATIVITY  No great athlete succeeds by copying their predecessors  training plans and strategies  We have to be open to new ideas  explore  gain an edge and stand out  Only then can we succeed  ADIDAS CELEBRATES DIVERSITY  SUPPORTS INCLUSIVENESS AND ENCOURAGES INDIVIDUAL EXPRESSION IN OUR WORKPLACE  WE DO NOT TOLERATE THE HARASSMENT OR DISCRIMINATION TOWARD ANY OF OUR APPLICANTS OR EMPLOYEES  WE ARE AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER   JOB TITLE  Data Scientist BRAND  adidas LOCATION  Amsterdam TEAM  Data   Analytics STATE  NH COUNTRY REGION  NL CONTRACT TYPE  Full time NUMBER  378020 DATE  Feb 8  2022

job_desc: At TripActions   It s all about the user  All of them   We re passionate about providing a seamless one stop experience for business travelers  no matter how they travel  where they stay  or where they re going   As a Data Analyst  you will be part of a fast growing Data team based from the EMEA Headquarters located in Amsterdam  We work in a dynamic environment  where we embrace moving quickly and work with the latest techstack and learning is part of the job  You will be working with a variety of stakeholders across the whole organisation ranging from our core travel product  next level expense management and finance and shape business decisions and our future product   The ideal candidate will be extremely curious  have a strong background in statistics and be obsessed with results  We take great pride in our diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives and we strongly believe this is helping us to grow as a successful and impactful team  To learn more about our team  you can watch this recent talk on the types of problems we work on and this one on how we work together as a group   RESPONSIBILITIES Support and advise the business with ad hoc analytics as well as applying statistical techniques to create insights and discover new business opportunities Enable and support the business regarding the development and use of data analysis and reporting by  building reporting grade data sources in our BI environment and translating those data sources into meaningful dashboards and reports for easy business use Provide business expertise and guidance  consultative partnership  on how to apply leverage data analytics and reporting within business operations Create and deliver documentation and training on reporting and BI tools for business users to enable self service on company data QUALIFICATIONS Masters in mathematics  statistics  computer science  information science  or related technical field 3  years of work experience in Data Analysis Experienced in SQL  experience with dbt is highly desirable  Experienced in BI tooling like Tableau  Looker  etc Demonstrated ability to translate business information needs into technical requirements and functional code reporting Demonstrated knowledge of standard statistical techniques like significance testing  regression modeling  etc Familiar with commonly used data technical tools like  R  Python Git Excellent communication and stakeholder relationship skills and a strong team player

We re looking for a data analyst to join our agile EU Growth squad  Our ideal candidate is adept at modeling complex data  uncovering patterns  and delivering data driven insights   In this role  you ll help provide the analytical firepower to help evolve our acquisition strategy and effective  efficient expansion to new EU markets  You ll collaborate with other data analysts and leverage the many internal tools we have developed to continuously measure  test  and optimize across all partners and platforms   If you love to take initiative and are a natural self starter who never backs down from a challenge this one s for you   Requirements 2  years of experience in a data analytics role  preferably within a fast growing consumer company Bachelor s degree in Mathematics  Statistics  Computer Science  or a related field Proficiency in SQL is essential  knowledge of statistical modeling is preferred Familiarity with digital marketing platforms is strongly preferred Hands on experience with modern data analytics stack  e g  Snowflake  dbt  Looker  and common MarTech tools  e g  Google Tag Manager  Google Analytics  Appsflyer  is a plus

infrastructure or access  security and governance   You will be The data analyst acts as the bridge between the customer and the Dev   Ops team in an Agile squadron environment  You discuss quality controls  and to evaluate the results of your team s development and analysis to all relevant stakeholders in the organisation   You will be joining one of the fastest growing consultancies in operationalising strategy  process design  digitisation  data and analytics  automation  technology and change  But because the whole will always be greater than the sum of the parts  we weave these skills together in different ways to respond to new opportunities and challenges   Can you say yes to the following    3 years  experience in the field of Business Analysis    1 year of experience with Agile Scrum way of working    1 year experience with ETL processes  Knowledge of SQL and Data visualizations  e g  Power BI   Real team player with excellent communication   analytical skills  Fluent in Dutch  We offer you The opportunity to work in a diverse and international environment with an informal culture  with a flat hierarchy  in which we cooperate across business areas and levels  You will be working with some of the most talented and experienced consultants  and you will become part of a value driven company  In addition  you will receive direct freedom and responsibility in your work guided by structured coaching from your own mentor   We care about results  not methodologies  But first and foremost  we care about people and how we can constantly challenge each other to and extracting meaningful insights from various forms of  structured and unstructured  datasets  Our work is revolving around 3 pillars  Providing insights using Data analytics  DA  and Machine Learning  Supporting investigations and Automating compliance and governance  About the role Perform custom data analysis using various DA skills using the following technologies  Python  SQL  diverse machine learning models  application of Responsible AI principles  NLP  network analyses and many many more  The focus in this profile is on the pillar Providing insights using Data Analytics  Come up with creative and innovative DA solutions to various business problems in the areas of fraud detection and prevention as well as compliance to create business impact and value  Work in diverse project Oss  Noord Brabant Squadra Machine Learning Company is een vernieuwend Nederlands bedrijf wat kennis over bedrijfsprocessen  data mining  statistiek en data visualisatie combineert met als doel klanten te helpen met machine learning algoritmes en het toepassen van kunstmatige intelligentie  We hebben een passie voor Data Science en Machine Learning in het bijzonder  Machine Learning is een krachtige techniek waardoor software intelligente taken kan uitvoeren die tot voor kort voornamelijk door mensen uitgevoerd werden  Daarmee helpen we onze klanten diverse bedrijfs  en industri�le processen  klantgerichte diensten en andere data gedreven functies op een vernieuwende wijze te automatiseren Wie ben jij  Je bent in het bezit van een WO diploma in richting van kunstmatige intelligentie  wiskunde  econometrie of een andere analytische studie  Je hebt uitgebreide kennis van Python  Je hebt ervaring in het toepassen van big data oplossingen in de praktijk Je bent bekend met Cloud platformen  zoals Azure AWS  Wat bieden wij jou  Kansen om mee te groeien in ons bedrijf voor een langere periode  Marktconform salaris  Iedere middag een verzorgde lunch  Maandelijkse teambuilding en gezamenlijke activiteiten

Solynta  based in Wageningen  the Netherlands  is a hybrid potato breeding company that  develops hybrid potato varieties with superior traits and performance at a rate much faster  than can be achieved with traditional breeding  The successful application of hybrid breeding  enables the use of Hybrid True Potato Seeds  HTPS   This revolution in breeding not only  allows for much faster product development  but also offers enormous logistical and  phytosanitary advantages  2500 kg of traditional seed tubers are replaced by 25 grams of  seed  Solynta is at the forefront of this innovation and  with its patented technology  platform  is ideally positioned to tap into the multi billion dollar global market for potato  genetics  www solynta com    To expand the research team  we are looking for a Digital Phenotyping Data Analyst   MSc  Full time  For our selections on plants and on tubers we are looking for possibilities to use digital  phenotyping methods for improving the data collection  You are the person that determines  the best way to phenotype different traits  and that calibrates digital phenotyping data with  actual plant measurements  You have experience in image analysis and machine learning   The goal of this position is to develop methods of digital phenotyping to a tool that breeders  can use to make selections KEY ACTIVITIES  RESPOSIBILITIES Image analysis of plants Processing of raw data into interpretable information Correlation of digital phenotyping data to plant traits Automatization of data processing pipelinesWE ASK An MSc in biosystems engineering or similar Image analysis and machine learning skills Experience in digital phenotyping techniques Insight in plant growth characteristics Interest to translate science into a usable product Ability to work closely together with diverse peopleWE OFFER    A one year employment contract with the prospect of permanent employment A competitive salary depending on work experience and education The opportunity to become part of an enthusiastic group of people working on one of the world s most promising innovations for improving food supply   Location  Wageningen  The Netherlands  If you are motivated to strengthen the potato hybrid breeding program at Solynta  we would  like to invite you to send a motivation letter and CV to recruitment solynta com   If you have any questions about the vacancy  please contact Julia Stockem  tel   31   0 6 51894987  This vacancy has no fixed end date

in analyst reports from Gartner and Forrester  In the 2021 Gartner  Magic Quadrant for Multiexperience Development Platforms  Mendix placed at the very top of the Leaders quadrant   Mendix  the global leader in enterprise low code  was created to promote collaboration between Business   IT teams  Thousands of forward thinking companies around the world like Ford Auto  Rabobank Netherlands  Zurich engineering  manufacturing and electronics meet the future of innovation  Mendix employees have the opportunity to work in a hyper growth environment with the support of Siemens  unbeatable market
