the use cases expected to be initially covered on the monitoring platform   Consistency in prediction scores across the Mendix systems Relationship Integrity between salesforce contacts and accounts Consistency between user profile data Completeness of accounts records across the different Mendix systems Reconciliation of Mendix and Siemens contracts Type of data issues include  Data accuracy  comparing against a set of rules  Data consistency  comparing against a corresponding dataset  Missing Incomplete data or records Data integrity issues  checking that data meets certain business rules   2  Assist in making detail technical data documentation of data from source to destination  This includes all data moving from the different source systems  in transit  and to the data lake   Marketing data flowing from source through Marketo and Salesforce to the data lake  Salesforce data moving to Zuora and to the data lake Zuora data moving to SAP and to the data lake Other duties include  Maintaining overview of ongoing data issues  tracking and documenting progress Support the Data Quality Manager on a tactical and operational level  Requirements  Recent graduate in computer science or a related field in IT  Bachelor s degree would be ideal Relational database proficiency experience Data modelling  Technical writing experience Computer programming experience Experience with SQL is a must  R and or Python experience is beneficial  Microsoft Power BI experience   preferred Mendix Rapid Application Development experience   Beneficial Agile development experience  Scrum    Preferred Ability to Speak write English fluently  Dutch speaking is preferable  Ability to work under indirect supervision Flexible in a fast paced dynamic environment with shifting roles and responsibilities Fast and eager to learn new concepts Ability to multi task   work well under pressure Strong computer technical skills Excellent verbal and writing communication skills Working for Mendix and with our Customers means your reliability has to be beyond any doubt  and therefore every employment is subject to a onboarding screening and the condition precedent a Certificate of Conduct is provided that demonstrates you did not commit any offenses that are relevant to the performance of your function   LI PN1 Working at MendixMendix has been recognized as a Best Cloud Computing Company to Work For by Forbes  With offices in 16  countries including headquarters in Rotterdam and Boston  Mendix provides an international playground to truly impact the world through low code   While each employee brings their own unique cultures and personalities to the workplace  we collectively live by our Mendix Blue Guiding Principles  While we live on different continents  speak different languages  and work on different things  we are bound by our  MendixBlue  guiding principles  Being  MendixBlue  means that you live the culture  and you consistently improve it as we grow  It s kind of a big deal  We put the customer first  Without our customers  we have no business  So  if you act in the best interest of our customers  always you belong here  We think big  We work to de eindproducten zijn onderdeel van politieke en beleidsmatige besluitvorming  We bieden jou een interessante en uitdagende baan op een dynamisch dossier  Jouw inzet draagt bij aan een gezonde en Afdelingshoofd   Goed om te weten  Deze vacature gaat offline na de sluitingsdatum  Wil je hem later nog eens teruglezen  bijvoorbeeld voor je sollicitatiegesprek  Vergeet dan niet om de tekst te downloaden en op te slaan  We zijn benieuwd naar jouw motivatie voor deze functie  en zien een toelichting daarvan dan ook graag terug in je sollicitatiebrief  Daarnaast vragen we om in jouw cv uitvoerig jouw werkzaamheden te omschrijven  zodat we een juiste inschatting kunnen maken van jouw ervaring  De sollicitatiegesprekken zullen plaatsvinden op het RIVM of via video bellen  Het werving  en selectieproces ziet er als volgt uit  Wanneer we een match zien op papier  nodigen we jou uit voor een eerste  online  gesprek  Is dat van beide kanten positief  Dan nemen we contact met je op voor maatschappelijke verantwoordelijkheid met zich meebrengt  zullen we je dan vragen om een Verklaring Omtrent Gedrag  VOG   Ben je al in dienst bij het Rijk  Nieuwe loopbaanstappen binnen de rijksoverheid moedigen we aan  Als je solliciteert als  van werk naar werkkandidaat  of als  herplaatsingskandidaat   stuur dan een kopie van je aanwijzingsbrief mee  Werk je nu via een uitzend  detacheringsbureau bij de Rijksoverheid  vermeld dit dan in je brief  Het RIVM zet zich in om medewerkers in dienst te nemen die onder de doelgroep van de Wet banenafspraak vallen  Val je in deze doelgroep en sta je in het doelgroepenregister  Dan nodigen we ook jou uit om te reageren  Meer weten  Klik dan hier  Samen met jou kijken we of en hoe je eventueel invulling kunt geven aan deze functie  Bij het RIVM ben je welkom zoals je bent  Wij zijn ervan overtuigd dat diversiteit in een team de samenwerking en uitkomst sterker maken  Rijksinstituut voor Volksgezondheid en Milieu  RIVM  RIVM  deskundig  betrouwbaar en onafhankelijk Als Rijksinstituut voor Volksgezondheid en Milieu  RIVM  zijn we een deskundige  betrouwbare en onafhankelijke adviseur voor overheid  professionals en burgers  Ons doel  een gezonde bevolking en een duurzame  veilige en gezonde leefomgeving  We bewaken gezondheid  ziekten  de kwaliteit van de leefomgeving �n het milieu  Daarvoor doen we onderzoek en we verzamelen kennis voor toegankelijke informatie en toepasbare adviezen  Het RIVM zorgt voor een goede geboortescreening  het bestrijden van infectieziekten en heeft een centrale rol bij het Rijksvaccinatieprogramma en de bevolkingsonderzoeken  We onderzoeken wat er nodig is voor goede zorg  een gezonde leefstijl  veilige producten en een veilige en gezonde leefomgeving  Ook dragen we bij aan het voorkomen  bestrijden en beheersen van incidenten en crises  Vanuit ons hoofdkantoor in Bilthoven en vanaf 2023 vanuit een prachtig nieuw gebouw op het Utrecht Science Park  werken we met ongeveer 2100 collega s aan al onze adviezen  rapporten  factsheets en publicaties  Daarbij laten we ons leiden door de vragen van vandaag �n morgen  We doen ons werk midden in de maatschappij  Trots zijn we op onze organisatie waar iedereen welkom is  Als kennisinstituut van de overheid willen we een afspiegeling van de samenleving zijn  Naast talent  ervaring en motivatie maken ook aspecten van identiteit zoals leeftijd  geaardheid  culturele achtergrond of arbeidsbeperking  onze organisatie rijker  innovatiever �n leuker  Met deze verschillende achtergronden  perspectieven en inzichten werken wij samen aan een nog beter resultaat  RIVM   De zorg voor morgen begint vandaag Ook benieuwd naar hoe anderen het werken bij het RIVM ervaren  Bekijk het op RIVM ers aan het woord   RIVM van de datastrategie  Lees dan snel verder  Dit ga je doen Ook in de railonderhoud markt is datamanagement steeds belangrijker geworden voor maximaal inzicht in de conditie en prestaties van rail gebonden assets  Het beschikken over betrouwbare systemen en up to date informatie is cruciaal tijdens de uitvoering van onze dagelijkse onderhoudswerkzaamheden en bij evaluatie   optimalisatie van onderhoudsconcepten  Professioneel beheer van data alsmede de integratie en presentatie hiervan maken dit mogelijk  Strukton is dan ook een data gedreven organisatie te noemen   Als gevolg van het beschikbaar komen van steeds meer databronnen zijn de afgelopen jaren verscheidene tools ontwikkeld om die onze processen ondersteunen  In deze tools en onderliggende data tabellen is een zekere mate van wildgroei ontstaan waardoor de beheersbaarheid en hun betrouwbare werking in het gedrang zijn gekomen  Beheer  uniformering en doorontwikkeling van deze omgevingen vallen dan ook binnen de rol van Systeemspecialist   Als Systeem  en dataspecialist krijg je te maken met een breed scala aan interne en externe klanten met uiteenlopende vragen  Enkele acties die hieruit kunnen volgen zijn het inrichten of wijzigen van beslissingsondersteunende systemen  ETL tools of processen  Wij zijn op zoek naar een persoon die in staat is om vanuit een architectuurblik een re�le visie te vormen over oplossingsrichtingen om zo onze klanten optimaal te bedienen  In feite ben je spin in het web tussen ICT en de gebruikers  Je bent ben je communicatief vaardig en je bent je continu bewust van het belang dat onze tools hebben binnen onze klantprocessen  Dit is jouw bedrijf Je valt onder de afdeling Asset Management waarin je het team van 7 collega s op de subafdeling Beheer MMS met jouw expertise en collegialiteit zult versterken  De afdeling Asset management is ondersteunend aan de contractteams op gebied van de inrichting en beheer van systemen en het leveren van verschillende tactische en operationele producten  Dit mag je van ons verwachten Onze collega s hebben een 8 1 gegeven op hun algemene tevredenheid over het werken bij Strukton Rail  En dat is niet voor niets  De betrokkenheid en trots in de organisatie is groot en je krijgt veel ruimte om eigenaarschap te pakken over de inhoud van je takenpakket  maar ook over de inrichting van je werktijden  Veel vrijheid dus  en ruimte voor initiatief en ontwikkeling  En natuurlijk gaat het om jouw ontwikkeling als vakspecialist  daarin ondersteunen we volop met opleidingen  Tenslotte is veiligheid een belangrijk ziektekostenverzekering  Mogelijkheid om thuis te werken  25 vakantiedagen  13 roostervrije dagen en de mogelijkheid om extra dagen te kopen  Flexiele werktijden en de mogelijkheid om het eigen werk en werktijden in te delen  Een heldere HR cyclus waarin jouw ontwikkeling centraal staat  Dit verwachten wij van jou Een afgeronde hbo opleiding richting ICT is een must  Kennis ervaring met  ETL This is going to be your job Within APG AM Operations the Master Data Management Team  MDM Team   sources  enriches  assures  and publishes Master Data via the MDM platform to ensure delivery of ready to use data to customers throughout APG AM  The MDM team continuously improves their processes to make them as efficient as possible and strives to be a leader in automation and the leveraging of the global company footprint  The team consists out of multiple data domains and is multi international  For one of the domains we are hiring a Data Service Officer  Your main responsibilities  Roll out of the business service model for our data vendors  Deliverables are providing a service report  highlighting the services delivered to APG AM in the past period   discussing this report with the vendor and if necessary  defining follow up actions  Part of the monitoring of the services of a data vendor is also translating the contract to the drivers that impact the monthly invoice  For each contract these cost drivers  aka key usage indicators  need to be established and reported internally  Responsible for the entire data vendor contract administration of the Operations department  not limited to the legal agreements but mainly focusing on related docs  such as policy docs  price schedules  service descriptions  service reports  Yearly review of existing contracts  defining the compliance and cost drivers and establish whether the actual usage of the data is in line with the terms and conditions  Set up of a cost model which makes the costs more transparent as part of management reporting  This is what you offer Have some affinity with the set up of financial models including an initial analysis of the different variables of the model as well a first build of a financial model  e g  in excel   Have sufficient basic consultancy skills  such as analyzing a problem  defining alternatives  preparing presentations  drafting memos etc  The candidate will be involved in multiple meetings with external parties and therefore should have relevant skills to attend service meetings with global service providers  Profile requirements Relevant HBO or academic study  A minimum of 2 5 years of relevant working experience is required  Knowledge of programming languages such as VBA  R or Python is a pre  Have a background in economics or international business  Important hereby is to have good insight in the functioning of the financial and money markets with a basic understanding of the different financial products as well as the related institutions and financial process  Be able to work in different teams  but at the same time show ample maturity to follow up on his own deliverables and involve support when needed  Good communication skills  Language skills  English  excellent  Proactive  result driven  analytical  team player  hands on  client and service oriented  Working under daily time pressure in a dynamic and changing environment is not a problem for you This is where you ll work We offer you a competitive maximum salary of   5 484 based on a 40 hours working week and attractive terms of employment with a focus on flexibility  A guaranteed year end bonus of 8 33  Ample attention to your vitality and personal development Hybrid working  at home and in one of our superb offices And of course a well organized pension  For pension provider APG  pensions are about people  life and how we live together  Through careful asset management  pension administration  communication and advice  APG wants to help build a decent future in which we share our well being and prosperity honestly and sustainably  For present and future generations  For today  tomorrow and beyond  APG is committed to serving 4 7 million people in the Netherlands  That explains the importance we attach to reflecting Dutch society  To that end  APG strives for an inclusive work environment in which everyone can be themselves and their unique qualities are embraced  Choosing APG means choosing a job in which you contribute to a bright future  Don t delay  apply today

job_desc: purpose As a highly digital focused company  citizenM strives to offer our guests the best digital experience amongst any hospitality company  We also want to free our hotel staff from any administrative tasks to allow them to provide our guests with the best non digital experience  In all our digital touchpoints for guests and staff data is used and created  This data needs to be understood  managed  loved and exploited   In this role you will help to understand our data flows  improve our data quality so that it can be used to create guest and business value  You will help projects and new initiatives to ensure the produced and consumed data is interfaced properly between systems and in compliance with our privacy policy  GDPR and other regulations  You will initiate and drive initiatives to measure and further improve data quality across our technology platforms  You will provide level 3 operational support to ensure that our data flows through our systems as smoothly as a salmon swimming up a pristine mountain stream   Your secret superpower is your ability to understand our data flows from the highest  most abstract level to the individual bits in our datastores  You love to query our databases to find the bits which are out of line and you are not scared to do some occasional scripting in our API gateway or create a proof of concept for a new micro service  Your best friends at citizenM are the BI team  they are everybody s best friend  and the Enterprise Architect   To achieve this we will seek to use the most recent data  analytical techniques  and appropriate technologies  We collaborate with teams across the organization to provide colleagues with reliable and actionable information through research  reporting  dashboards  and analytics  As an enabler to this you will provide a strong focus on data reliability and data reuse which will help lift our overall data quality  We value peer feedback  continuous learning  and blameless post mortems  We prefer proven technology and have built most of our data infrastructure on Azure  but we also care about finding the right tools for the job  so we invest in cutting edge technology when it s a good fit  Please attach a cover Letter including a brief introduction and your motivation   we will not consider your application without it   key responsibilities keep track of the data flowing through our systems and ensure these flows are properly documented  design and document data models for custom solutions where needed  analyse the data quality in citizenM systems and start and drive initiatives to improve the data quality  prepare data migration plans and execute them  design and drive the implementation of GDPR and other data governance processes across citizenM  design  test and implement strategies for matching  linking and merging customer data  raising the quality of data in our system via our data infrastructure modelling and testing  You will implement relevant KPIs to allow us to measure the improvements  qualifications   skills  previously worked in a technical role as developer  data engineer or similar  Bachelor s or Master s degree in a discipline relevant to the role  or equivalent work experience   hands on experience with technologies as Relational databases  JSON APIs and ETL processes  basic knowledge with software development in languages such as Python or dotNet  familiarity with Azure data services landscape and PowerBI is a plus  knows how to use ci cd methods tooling in the data domain is a plus  familiar with process documentation and tools such as Lucidchart  familiarity in Agile ways of working  strong communicator  self motivated  mature reasoning at a strategic level  able to take ownership and drive for results  able to work with a high level of attention to detail  fluent in English  citizenM is an affordable luxury hotel chain for mobile citizens of the world  With style that will knock your socks off  we offer citizens a real home from home  plus the world s fluffiest pillows  Our typical guest is a frequent traveler who is quality and design driven  and value conscious  We currently have hotels in the Netherlands  France  UK  Switzerland  Denmark  USA and Asia  with more to come soon  We are proud to put hospitality back into the hospitality industry  and have received numerous awards for our groundbreaking approach  We like to do things differently  This means our hotels are not traditional  and neither are our support offices  We re open minded  with kind hearts and global minds skills: marketing, deep, go, sql, tableau, r, python, scripting, excel, network
job_desc: The role  We are challenging how live sport and entertainment is delivered and consumed   From the world s biggest sporting events  to the best local sport  to award winning original programming   our audiences enjoy a 24 7 offering of the best live and non live content across the ELEVEN Group  At a time of significant growth for our company and in continuing to deliver industry changing developments  we want you to help provide world class entertainment to the global fan community by strengthening ELEVEN s global sports platform and live streaming technology  We re now looking for a thoughtful and open minded Data Analyst  Sitting in the marketing team  you ll drive how data is leveraged in solving business problems within our cross functional teams  which comprise staff from across our functions and regions  You ll help consult with these stakeholders in defining what data is critical for our success  help set relevant success metrics  and shape our future revenue growth through data insights and effectively communicating possible solutions  Together with the Senior Marketing and Communications Manager  you ll help manage stakeholders based on their experience by prioritising business impact  efficiently adapting to business needs  and managing expectations accordingly  You ll also use your deep practical understanding of the data  workflows  methods  and tooling to autonomously drive dashboarding  analysis and reporting within your scope  At ELEVEN we re committed to hiring the person who we believe is the strongest candidate for the position  However  research indicates that women frequently only apply for roles where they believe they satisfy 100  of the role requirements  We don t want anyone to feel discouraged in applying for any of our vacancies  so if you believe you meet 60  or more of the criteria  we definitely encourage you to apply  What you ll do  Support the design of key metrics that quantify the success of our initiatives Organise and present your findings in a meaningful way to make sure your stakeholders are able to make the right decision Build dashboards that help internal and external stakeholders understand the performance of their business segment  and identify action points Design and implement decision making tools that enable data driven decision making Support our teams in planning and forecasting with automated reporting Work across our teams to build a joined up view of our customer lifecycles Be the  go to  data person across our teams for questions related to commercial and campaign performance  customer behaviour  and more Monitor data and information management processes to ensure data quality and consistency You are already a great candidate if you have   2 3 years of generating insights from large and complex digital data sets Deep familiarity with analytical and visualisation tools including SQL  Google Big Query  Google Analytics  Google Search Console  Firebase  Google Data Studio  and Google Tag Manager  Any experience with additional tools such as Youbora  Tableau  or Qlik is a bonus  The ability to deliver and communicate insights and reporting to commercial  technology  and product team audiences as well as external stakeholders Familiarity with measuring incrementality via the use of benchmarks  control groups  and statistical modelling Basic data science experience including modelling using R or Python And even better if you have   Worked with an international digital business whose revenue streams include subscriptions  pay per view  data av monetisation  and or sponsorship Proven experience with analytics across multiple digital platforms  including apps  smart TV  and games consoles Scripting experience in Google Sheets   Excel and creating workflow automations A good understanding of the global sports and media landscape Awareness and experience of working in an experimentation culture Opportunities you ll enjoy Be part of a company fundamentally transforming the live streaming landscape in sports and beyond on a global scale  Having the freedom to pitch  implement  and execute new ideas Flexibility over your holidays  If you want to work on Netherlands public holidays  that s fine   just take what suits you best from 33 days annual leave Flexibility where you work We have a company culture like no other  About ELEVEN ELEVEN is a global network of LIVE and non live sport and entertainment content   from the world s biggest sports events to the best longtail sport  to award winning original programming   The state of the art technology available via our newly launched global sports platform ELEVENSPORTS com  previously MyCujoo tv   which allows anyone to stream from a device as simple as a mobile phone  revolutionised football broadcasting  Our crazy idea to transform every single match into a live broadcast became the world s largest live football streaming platform  With an initial focus on niche premium and longtail sports  our ambitions are now even bigger   In 2020 we also delivered our newest product  MyCujoo Live Services  MCLS   a highly scalable live streaming solution built on the tech stack powering ELEVENSPORTS com  Developed for rights owners in sports and beyond  MCLS equips content creators with the technology and tools to provide their fans with the most powerful  authentic  and engaging live streaming experiences

Overview   Venn Life Sciences  part of Open Orphan plc  is an Integrated Drug Development Partner offering a unique combination of pre clinical and CMC drug development expertise  clinical trial design and management  This enables us to create  plan and execute drug and medical device development programs effectively and seamlessly for our clients    Our vision  is to play a pivotal role in the development of new products enabling disease prevention and treatment We do this by creating an environment that generates opportunities for employees to stretch their potential and fully exercise their talents thereby consistently providing outstanding service to our clients  We nurture an environment of respect  pro activity  teamwork and above all keep the patient at the heart of what we do   We are currently looking for a Clinical PK PD Data Analyst to join Clinical PKPB Team based in our office in Breda  Netherlands  Reporting to the Group Leader Clinical Pharmacokinetics  the successful candidate will be responsible for independently managing a diverse and complex range of non compartmental  NCA  pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic analysis of a clinical trial  The role holder will support the consultants in clinical pharmacokinetics   clinical development   If you are seeking a rewarding and challenging career this could be the perfect opportunity for you  Main Responsibilities   Responsibilities  Perform preliminary and final pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic non compartmental analysis in line with the applicable ICH GCP Guidelines  relevant SOPs  manuals and procedures including specific Sponsor requirements Review and contribute to PK analysis plans and data transfer agreements Generate supporting tables and figures by means of SAS or other specific software Generate datasets containing the pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic results in line with CDISC standards Review and QC of pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic analysis and related output  including PK report  may also contribute to PK report writing under guidance of consultant Keep up to date with the expertise in the relevant areas and proactively identify opportunities to update and increase knowledge Contribute to the success of the project through the successful delivery of the pharmacokinetic results within agreed timelines and budget Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction by focusing on efficiency and results and exceeding customer expectations on assigned work activities Skills   Experiences   Qualifications   Experience  BSc degree or higher in a life science area Eager to learn on the job after graduation or has a one or two years of relevant work experience  Enthusiastic about working with data and knowledge of SAS or another program language such as R is a plus  Knowledge education background in the areas of clinical development  pharmacokinetics is a plus  Skills  Ability to work independently and as part of a team Results oriented with the ability to multi task  with skill in establishing priorities  managing workload and meeting strict deadlines timelines  Ability to anticipate potential issues and problems that may arise and proactively identify ways to resolve mitigate  Independent analytical thinking  creativity and innovation and excellent attention to detail  planning   organisational skills  Ability to be flexible and to adapt and work effectively with a variety of situations or individuals Team worker with strong customer service and interpersonal skills  ability to communicate effectively and form positive relationships at all levels in and outside the company Professional who is experienced and dependable with discretion  enthusiasm and a positive attitude Good understanding of the pharmacokinetic principles and clinical development  Proficiency in usage of SAS and Phoenix WinNonlin Proficiency in PC skills required for Word  Excel  PowerPoint and Outlook Written and verbal communication skills including command of English The office in Breda is currently being transformed to maximally facilitate a hybrid way of working  A place to meet your colleagues  work closely together on multidisciplinary projects and to share knowledge  As we believe this teamwork with the other expert colleagues is crucial to achieve the best performance for our clients as well as supporting your development  Disclaimer  applicable only for employees based in the Netherlands  How to apply  Please forward your CV  in English  by email to careers vennlife com

Simon Loos is door het ondernemersplatform MT  Sprout uitgeroepen tot beste logistieke dienstverlener 2021 in de categorie goederenvervoer  Om ook in 2022 deze titel in de wacht te kunnen slepen heeft Simon Loos grote ambities  Om deze waar te kunnen maken zijn wij op zoek naar een gedreven Data Analist  Het belang van data analyse vormt namelijk een steeds groter component in de aansturing van logistieke processen  Simon Loos is daar niet anders in  business intelligence  data analyse en bedrijfskundige adviezen vormen binnen onze organisatie een belangrijke pilaar in onze dagelijkse beslissingen  Binnen de Simon Loos familie houd jij je bezig met analyses in de breedste zin des woords met betrekking tot alle bedrijfs    logistieke processen  Concreet betekent dit dat een groot gedeelte van jouw werktijd gevuld is met het analyseren van de cijfers  deze cijfers vertalen inzichten  het weergeven van deze inzichten in duidelijke dashboards en het aanreiken van oplossingen voor de business  Een praktisch voorbeeld van het resultaat van jouw analyses is de aanpassing van de routes van de chauffeurs op basis van rittendata van klanten en wagens  Je dagelijkse werkzaamheden zien er in hoofdlijnen als volgt uit  Je maakt vooruitstrevende analyses en bouwt heldere rapporten Je draagt bij de organisatie naar een data driven organisatie te worden wat helpt bij het realiseren van de bedrijfsdoelstellingen Op basis van bestaande data ontwikkel je visuele dashboards om de collega s te voorzien van inzichten en concrete oplossingen Zoeken we jou   Werken bij Simon Loos betekend een omgeving die houdt van nuchter en praktisch handelen en schakelen  Geen woorden  maar daden  Daarom vinden we jouw mentaliteit en houding misschien nog wel belangrijker dan je ervaringen  Om helemaal bij ons op je plek te zijn als data analist heb je wat ons betreft in ieder geval het volgende in huis  Een afgeronde HBO opleiding in bijvoorbeeld bedrijfskunde  Econometrie of een logistieke of business intelligence richting  Toepasbare kennis van statistiek  Ervaring met planningspakketten en BI tools  Het talent om de wirwar van informatie begrijpelijk te rangschikken en analyseren Het lef om verantwoordelijkheid te nemen Wat mag je van ons verwachten Je krijgt een brede  zelfstandige functie met veel leuke uitdagingen binnen een hecht team en een solide bedrijf  De sfeer binnen Simon Loos is prettig en informeel  en je krijgt alle ruimte om het beste van jezelf te laten zien  Natuurlijk zijn de arbeidsvoorwaarden goed en marktconform  Je standplaats betreft in eerste instantie Middenmeer  na 6 maanden wordt dit Wognum  en bent  als dat nodig is  ook te vinden op ��n van de andere locaties van Simon Loos  bij onze leveranciers of bij ��n van onze klanten  Over Simon Loos  Simon Loos is een organisatie van ruim 3 000 medewerkers en 1 400 voertuigen  verdeeld over meer dan 60 standplaatsen door heel Nederland  Wij zijn hartstikke trots op al onze collega s die   dag in dag uit   onze mooie naam in de logistiek waar maken  Als familiebedrijf vinden wij  of je nu onderweg bent of op de plaats van bestemming  persoonlijk contact en collegialiteit belangrijk  Kom jij ook werken bij het leukste familiebedrijf van Nederland  Alle basisvoorwaarden zijn uitstekend geregeld en je salaris is altijd op tijd  Je komt daarnaast te werken bij een fijne  professionele werkgever met een prettige  sociale en informele werksfeer  INTERESSE  SOLLICITEER DIRECT

Do you want to work on deploying a platform that aims to reduce carbon emissions   We are seeking a Data Scientist who has a background in the energy sector to join a growing scale up that is playing a vital role in reducing carbon emissions in the energy sector  Industry  Development Energy Machine Learning Sustainability What to expect  You will be performing research and analysis on complex and varied data sources  blending data sets to create insights for example IoT data and satellite data to name a few  Work with a cutting edge stack to develop  deploy  build and test predictive models using machine learning and advanced statistics  with a strong emphasis on the latter  This is a diverse role requiring skills from software development to applied mathematics and statistics  This role will report to the Chief Data Scientist  Perks  Have huge impact and scope in your role Fewer restrictions on what methods you use  lots of autonomy Lots of space for creativity   it s encouraged Fully remote role  must be based in Netherlands Requirements  3  years minimum as Data Scientist Strong programming skills in Python  Experience with JavaScript is a plus Experience with Python  data science and machine learning ecosystem including NumPy  Pandas  Jupyter  SciPy  Scikit Learn Previous experience performing data analysis in oil   gas or climate science applications would be viewed favorable

The opportunity ING is looking for a Data Quality Analyst to drive the building of data quality  DQ  rules  DQ dashboards and DQ issue remediation within Risk and Finance  The role has a primary focus on DQ for Compliance  Non Financial Risk and Credit Risk modelling  Are you looking for the opportunity to work with data in the area of risk and finance and to work with a broad international network of people to address key DQ issues  then this job is something to apply for  The team You will be part of the Risk Data Quality team consisting of 4 colleagues working from Amsterdam and 4 colleagues that are based in Manilla  The team follows an agile way of working in which it provide services to the Risk and Finance stakeholders within the ING organization  Openness in communication  passion inzicht in de maatschappij spreekt je aan en je hebt een neus voor het aanboren van nieuwe data om tot verrassende inzichten te komen  Je deelt de ambitie van Atlas Research om data analytics van world class niveau te ontwikkelen   Werken bij Atlas Atlas is een onderzoeksbureau met een divers samengesteld vast team  aangevuld met een flexibele schil van zelfstandige onderzoekers  Atlas is een onderdeel van Sijthoff Media  een cross mediaal mediabedrijf gevestigd in Capital C  h�t centrum voor de creatieve industrie van Amsterdam  gelegen naast metrohalte Weesperplein   Wij hanteren wetenschappelijke maatstaven en streven ernaar deze om te zetten naar praktisch bruikbare antwoorden en sprankelende teksten  Als bureau doen we relevant werk  zijn we ambitieus en durven we ook Overview of the role   Venn Life Sciences  part of Open Orphan plc  is an Integrated Drug Development Partner offering a unique combination of pre clinical and CMC drug development expertise  clinical trial design and management  This enables us to create  plan and execute drug and medical device development programs effectively and seamlessly for our clients    Our vision  is to play a pivotal role in the development of new products enabling disease prevention and treatment We do this by creating an environment that generates opportunities for employees to stretch their potential and fully exercise their talents thereby consistently providing outstanding service to our clients  We nurture an environment of respect  pro activity  teamwork and above all keep the patient at the heart of what we do   We are currently looking for a Clinical PK PD Data Analyst to join Clinical PKPB Team based in our office in Breda  Netherlands  Reporting to the Group Leader Clinical Pharmacokinetics  the successful candidate will be responsible for independently managing a diverse and complex range of non compartmental  NCA  pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic analysis of a clinical trial  The role holder will support the consultants in clinical pharmacokinetics   clinical development   If you are seeking a rewarding and challenging career this could be the perfect opportunity for you  Main Responsibilities   duties   Responsibilities  Perform preliminary and final pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic non compartmental analysis in line with the applicable ICH GCP Guidelines  relevant SOPs  manuals and procedures including specific Sponsor requirements Review and contribute to PK analysis plans and data transfer agreements Generate supporting tables and figures by means of SAS or other specific software Generate datasets containing the pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic results in line with CDISC standards Review and QC of pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic analysis and related output  including PK report  may also contribute to PK report writing under guidance of consultant Keep up to date with the expertise in the relevant areas and proactively identify opportunities to update and increase knowledge Contribute to the success of the project through the successful delivery of the pharmacokinetic results within agreed timelines and budget Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction by focusing on efficiency and results and exceeding customer expectations on assigned work activities Skills   Experiences   Qualifications   Experience  BSc degree or higher in a life science area Eager to learn on the job after graduation or has a one or two years of relevant work experience  Enthusiastic about working with data and knowledge of SAS or another program language such as R is a plus  Knowledge education background in the areas of clinical development  pharmacokinetics is a plus  Skills  Ability to work independently and as part of a team Results oriented with the ability to multi task  with skill in establishing priorities  managing workload and meeting strict deadlines timelines  Ability to anticipate potential issues and problems that may arise and proactively identify ways to resolve mitigate  Independent analytical thinking  creativity and innovation and excellent attention to detail  planning   organisational skills  Ability to be flexible and to adapt and work effectively with a variety of situations or individuals Team worker with strong customer service and interpersonal skills  ability to communicate effectively and form positive relationships at all levels in and outside the company Professional who is experienced and dependable with discretion  enthusiasm and a positive attitude Good understanding of the pharmacokinetic principles and clinical development  Proficiency in usage of SAS and Phoenix WinNonlin Proficiency in PC skills required for Word  Excel  PowerPoint and Outlook Written and verbal communication skills including command of English The office in Breda is currently being transformed to maximally facilitate a hybrid way of working  A place to meet your colleagues  work closely together on multidisciplinary projects and to share knowledge  As we believe this teamwork with the other expert colleagues is crucial to achieve the best performance for our clients as well as supporting your development  Disclaimer  applicable only for employees based in the Netherlands  How to apply  Please forward your CV  in English  by email to careers vennlife com

De Waarderingskamer houdt toezicht op gemeenten en uitvoeringsorganisaties voor de uitvoering van de WOZ taxaties  De Waarderingskamer doet dit met een team van circa 20 professionals met verschillende specialismen  De manier waarop dit toezicht is ingericht betekent dat de Waarderingskamer beschikt over veel gegevens over de WOZ uitvoering die aan systematische analyses onderworpen worden  Door het bijzondere karakter van de WOZ werkzaamheden gaat het in de meeste gevallen om zelf ontwikkelde analyses  Hierbij wordt enerzijds gebruik gemaakt van standaard applicaties zoals Excel en SPSS  maar er wordt ook uitgeweken naar zelf ontwikkelen binnen bijvoorbeeld  R   Analyses hebben betrekking op de onderlinge vergelijking van  de kwaliteit van  WOZ taxaties en WOZ gegevens  maar ook op de onderlinge vergelijking van WOZ uitvoeringsorganisaties  De Waarderingskamer faciliteert bijvoorbeeld de WOZ benchmark die uitvoeringsorganisaties ondersteunt bij het  leren van elkaar   In het team van de Waarderingskamer is er behoefte aan een data analist die het leuk vindt om creatief vorm te geven aan analyses en daarbij ook niet bang is om de voor deze analyses noodzakelijke gegevens te verzamelen en de resultaten in een team te bespreken  Functie eisen Je hebt een  recent afgeronde  opleiding op universitair niveau bij voorkeur op het terrein van analysetechnieken  bijvoorbeeld econometrie  wiskunde statistiek of bedrijfskunde  Je hebt interesse in kwaliteitszorg bij de overheid op het terrein van informatievoorziening en vastgoed  Je hebt interesse in overheidsfinanci�n en kostenbeheersing binnen de overheid  Wat bieden wij  Salaris afhankelijk van ervaring  maximaal salarisschaal 12     4 000     5 800 bruto per maand  gebaseerd op een volledige 36 urige werkweek  Een leuke uitdagende  afwisselende baan in een kleine organisatie  Een prettige werkplek op 5 minuten loopafstand van het station Den Haag Centraal  Een uitstekend secundair arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket  conform CAO Provincie   hiertoe behoren onder meer verschillende studiefaciliteiten en volledige vergoeding van je OV reiskosten woon werkverkeer  Interesse  Wil je meer weten over de functie  Neem dan contact op met r kathmann waarderingskamer nl  Solliciteren  Stuur dan jouw sollicitatiebrief en cv naar info waarderingskamer nl  We ontvangen je reactie graag oudsher dankzij onze slimme oplossingen en netwerk van experts  maar inmiddels ook omdat wij onze oplossingen steeds meer funderen op data  Wij zoeken een ambitieuze data scientist die meebouwt aan dat fundament   Jouw functie  Veel van onze klanten beschikken over een grote hoeveelheid data  Maar de stap van data naar inzicht  dat is een hele grote  Laat staan van inzicht naar toepassing  Jij werkt precies op dat snijvlak  Je gaat op projectbasis aan de slag bij organisaties van formaat en brengt daar de kansen van data in kaart  Vervolgens vertaal je die kansen naar slimme oplossingen om jouw klant ook �cht verder te helpen  Soms individueel  vaak samen met onze consultants  Zo ben jij de schakel tussen data science en business   Ondertussen bouw je mee aan de groeiende tak van analytics binnen EIFFEL  Ons team van data scientists werkt dagelijks aan onze ambitie om alle oplossingen in legal  finance  process met data te onderbouwen  Jij bent onderdeel van dat team en krijgt de kans om deze werelden met elkaar te verbinden   Jouw profiel  Je hebt een WO opleiding afgerond  bij voorkeur met een econometrische  statistische  wiskundige en of technische achtergrond  Vervolgens heb je 1 tot 3 jaar relevante ervaring opgedaan in het vakgebied van big data en advanced analytics  je hebt uitgebreid kennisgemaakt met technieken als R  Python  Hadoop en SQL  Ook heb je ervaring met machine learning  de ontwikkeling van algoritmes en het opstellen van wiskundige en statistische modellen  Je bent analytisch sterk  praktisch ingesteld en beschikt over een grote mate van zelfstandigheid  Daarmee kun je wisselen tussen projecten  kun jij je goed verplaatsen in een klant en begrijp je de business rondom data   Het aanbod  Werken bij EIFFEL betekent werken in een omgeving van continu leren  Je krijgt de ruimte om jouw eigen skills en kennis te ontwikkelen  maar ook het kennisniveau van de organisatie  �n van onze klanten  Tijdens trainingen  inspiratiesessies  events en borrels leer je jouw collega s uitgebreid kennen  ondertussen krijg je de vrijheid die projectmatig werken met zich meebrengt  Natuurlijk zijn een leaseauto  smartphone en laptop onderdeel van jouw arbeidsvoorwaarden

skills: python, machine, learning, tensorflow, r, ai, matlab, c, network
job_desc: Eindhoven In this position you will have the opportunity to drive innovations for the patient monitoring portfolio as part of a cross functional research team  The work is application oriented aiming at competitive measurement solutions which are driven by technical progress  new and improved clinical workflows  changing customer patient needs and new business models  Recent development in computer vision and video analyses allowed extraction of vital signs and other physiological parameters of patients by means of a contactless  camera based remote sensing  Such unobtrusive measurement allows design of new solutions for efficient  context aware monitoring of patients across continuum of care  from precision diagnosis  MRI  CT   up to home healthcare    Your challenges   As a Computer Vision Scientist  you will be working on developing complex analytical algorithms using Python and Machine Learning  Keras  Pytorch  TensorFlow   You will also join a very skilled team of Data Scientists and Data engineers   Deploy complex Computer Vision analytical algorithms using Phyton and R  Evaluating and optimizing algorithm concepts based on simulated data  Programming on higher level platforms  and support of real time proof of concepts and demo systems  Algorithm development from design through implementation and performance optimization  What do we expect from you   We are looking for an ambitious Computer Vision Scientist to strengthen our team  Requirements   PhD or Master s degree in signal processing  image and video analysis  computer vision Application oriented signal processing and or computer vision expertise  understanding of the latest approaches for 2D  3D data analysis  Experience with design of AI ML computer vision algorithms  affinity with the latest approaches for object and motion recognition and analysis Experience with optimization of complex computer vision and signal processing algorithms for real time SW implementation  Understanding of the latest developments in camera sensing technologies   incl  3D   optics  Experience with writing scientific articles in high rank engineering or medical journals  presentations of scientific results on international conference Strong programming skills in Matlab  Python  C C   Algorithm development from design through implementation and performance optimization  What does our Business Cell have to offer   We have a highly specialized and varied team  This provides a lot of expertise and knowledge that you can learn a lot from   With our strong network and your personal ambition  we will ensure a wonderful career together     What can you expect from TMC   TMC is an international high tech consultancy company that brings expertise to their clients in order to support them with the realization of their technological challenges  As such  TMC is operating as an expert center at the disposition of its clients and we help them to be more competitive in an ever more global and faster changing technological world   At TMC we believe that people are the driving force behind technological innovation  That is why we want to create the best possible conditions for tech talents to thrive in  We offer you a challenging and stimulating work environment in which you can be the director of your own career  As an Employeneur you are part of our TMC family  Next to our outstanding technical expertise  fun and engagement are meaningful parts of our culture    Why choose for Employeneurship   We are truly unique thanks to our Employeneurship model which is a true innovation for the High Technology consulting business  It is the business relationship of the 21th century for high skilled technical professionals  It is built around 5 main pillars   You will have a permanent employment contract  offering you stability and security You will get to know your market value and have a share in the profit your work generates thanks to the individual profit sharing We will support you with a one on one coaching and trainings designed to help you develop your entrepreneurial skills The competence cells structure  provides you with a strong as Data Analyst   Platform P L Management Bol com is a full fledged retail tech platform that offers multiple  partner  propositions  Our partners can sell to an audience of millions  take advantage of attractive digital advertising options  in shopping   and trust on our  logistics as a service  solutions  such as  Logistiek via bol com  and  Verzenden via bol com   This necessitates commercial tradeoffs  How can we optimize our investment across these different propositions  What has the greatest return on investment  How can we use data insights to inform these decisions  And can you financial data to discover new opportunities to improve the top and bottom lines in our P L statements  This often involves scrutinizing expenses and translating actionable insights into compelling provide management with financial reports so it can  continue to  monitor investments You work together with business teams to quantify the impact of their decisions Why you can make the difference The Data Reporting Analyst will be responsible for transforming data into information that can be utilized to make business decisions and actions  This will involve acquiring data from various sources and creating reports on a regular basis  Client Details Tulp Group is a mortgage company with a focus on clear and sustainable choices  It has 3 own mortgage brands in the Dutch mortgage market  Tulp Hypotheken   Owner occupied mortgage loans  AFM regulated  De Nederlandse   Buy to Let mortgage loans for professional landlords Brug Financieringen   Transition mortgage loans for professional investors We offer mortgage loans for the purchase  refurbishment  transition  from office to apartments  and refinancing of existing homes   mortgages with long periods of fixed interest rates  We operate of the premise of finding the right balance between sharp interest rates  repayment options and excellent conditions  This ensures that we are always one of the most competitive mortgage lenders on the market   Via Tulp Group  foreign  investors can invest in Dutch mortgage loan exposure  This can be achieved via warehouses  securitizations and whole loans  Tulp has finance relations with large investors and banks like Natwest  HSBC  Citi  MUFG  BNP Credit Agricole  TwentyFour Asset Management and Donner   Reuschel  Tulp Group was founded in 2015 by Paul Wessels and Pierre de Vos and has a team of approximately 20 professionals  Description Responsible for keeping the various reports up to date Striving to achieve a modular and re usable reporting landscape based on highly automated processes You will be instrumental in delivering reports in a consistent  accurate and timely manner  You have an integral role in gather requirements and data to utilize business decisions Provide advice to Sales  Underwriting and MT teams Daily contact with foreign funding teams to achieve optimal funding Monitoring data quality and making improvements where necessary  Profile Bachelor s Degree  economics accountancy finance treasury  Excellent command of the English language  written and verbal  Good Dutch language capability Excellent communications skills Experience with data analysis  reporting  and making models  Power BI experience is a plus Support with the compilation of management reports  presentations and financial deep dives Use quick insight and data management skills to quickly respond to ad hoc enquiries from the business  Eager   ambitious Apply expertise in quantitative analysis and work together with other teams to provide actionable insights Job Offer Competative salary Engaging working environment Flexible working Growth perspective

skills: sql, postgresql, mysql, tableau, https, machine, learning
job_desc: Cloud Data Analyst As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

onze opdrachtgevers tot betere inzichten komen  Kortom  je gaat je data skills inzetten om echte problemen op te lossen  Begrip van de context is daarvoor noodzakelijk  Vaak werk je dan ook samen met onze vastgoedspecialisten  samen komen jullie tot de beste oplossing   Je pioniert samen met een team aan onze innovaties  Het zou mooi zijn als je ervaring hebt met ETL en R  maar daar kunnen we je ook bij helpen  Je werkt meestal aan drie of vier projecten tegelijkertijd  Denk bijvoorbeeld aan de ontwikkeling van tooling voor assetmanagement  de waardering van woningportefeuilles op basis van open data of een benchmark van het voorzieningenniveau van gemeenten  Sommige projecten zijn kort en intensief  andere projecten vereisen een langere aanloop  Het mooie van consultancy is dat je context  Die afwisseling en uitdaging maakt dat je snel leert  Daarnaast kun je er van op aan dat onze ervaren data specialisten je helpen in jouw ontwikkeling   Dit is echt iets voor jou want jij kiezen alle ruimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling werk dat er toe doet  we spelen een  disruptive  rol binnen het publiek vastgoed Hier ga je werken  Republiq is een Great Place to Work    al 4 jaar op rij   Jouw toekomstige teamgenoten beoordeelden Republiq op de thema s geloofwaardigheid  respect  eerlijkheid  trots en kameraadschap met een 9 9   Samen bouwen we aan het tofste vastgoed Type vacature  RegulierCity  Schiphol OostHours per week  32 40Education  HBO Master  HBO Master  WO pre master  WO MasterApply before  11 03 2022 Introduction Are you truly passionate about Data  And are you ready to transform KLM into the best digital and data driven airline of the industry  Data is crucial in improving customer satisfaction  making the next steps in becoming an Operational Excellence organization and stay at the top of being a sustainable airline  More data awareness  getting organized and improving data quality are key for creating more value  Does this sounds good  This is your chance  We are looking for a Data Management   Quality consultant to join our team at the KLM Data Management Office  Hereby offering a unique opportunity to oversee  facilitate   improve Data Management for KLM   What are you going to do  As a Data Management   Quality consultant  you take the lead in improving data quality within KLM from the perspective of Data Management  By monitoring and improving subjects like Data Governance  Classification  Modelling   Design for the entire organization  You will continuously improve the organizations ability to create value from data and become  data driven   You will  Play a crucial role in the way KLM becomes more data driven  Take responsibility for the implementation of the KLM Data Management   Quality philosophy by guiding and mentoring the business domains   Using the DAMA DMBOK data management framework  Setup  Implement and support a Data Quality Strategy Guide the domain data officers and data stewards in the domains with implementing data quality  Metadata  data modeling  and master data in a consistent way Analyze the current maturity of Data Management   Quality for the entire KLM by executing a yearly  Data Maturity Scan   You will also make recommendations for improvement  Give follow up on the recommendations of the KLM Data maturity scan by defining targets and facilitate   steer those within the organization  Contribute to topics that will be discussed on the KLM Data Officer Table Facilitate   maintain a Data Stewards community including document management  training   communication  Where do you land  The Data Management Office  DMO  is a central department within KLM  recently established on behalf of the KLM Executive Committee  Excom  to support and advise the KLM Data Management strategy  The DMO oversees   facilitates Data Management for the entire organization by ensuring consistency and maturity from a KLM wide perspective  The DMO constantly works on DATA SCIENTIST  DEMAND FORECASTING  70 000   80 000 AMSTERDAM This is a new opportunity for an experienced Data Scientist to join one of the most recognizable sportswear brands  that has a well established Data Science team spread across Europe  THE ROLE As a Data Scientist  with a particular focus on demand forecasting  you will help deliver value across the business  and build data science products to optimise demand and supply chain planning  Day to day you will be tasked with  Taking ownership of the full end to end analytics lifecycle  from conducting statistical testing as part of exploratory data analysis and gathering requirements  to supporting deployment Applying demand forecasting techniques Automating ML pipelines and improving the existing data science platform Applying a range of data science techniques and methodologies  including but not limited to  linear regression models  time series decomposition Working with the following tech stack  Python  Python Libraries  AWS  Databricks YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE To be successful in this role  you will need to  Know how to code in at least one object orientated language  whether that is Python  Scala  R or Java Have a sound understanding of working with a range of Data Science methods Have experience working within demand forecasting Ideally have exposure to operations or the field of supply chain Be fluent in both written and spoken English BENEFITS Basic Salary of 70 000   80 000 gross per annum Yearly bonus WFH Flexibility In house training and development HOW TO APPLY Please register your interest by sending your CV to Mathieu Wilken via the Apply link on this page  E  mathieuwilken harnham To apply to the role  you must currently be residing within the Netherlands

job_desc: Company Description Sia Partners is a next generation management consulting firm and pioneer of Consulting 4 0  We offer a unique blend of AI and design capabilities  augmenting traditional consulting to deliver exceptional value to our clients  With 2 200 consultants in 18 countries and expertise in more than 30 sectors and services  we optimize client projects worldwide  Through our Consulting for Good approach  we strive for next level impact by developing innovative CSR solutions for our clients  making sustainability a lever for profitable transformation Sia Partners Netherlands In 2009 the office in Amsterdam was opened  which is now situated at the 28th floor of the Rembrandt Tower with a great view on the city of Amsterdam  We focus on the following sectors  Energy   Utilities  Financial Services  Marketing   Customer Experience  Data Science and HR  Transformation   Change  The Dutch team is experiencing strong growth and has now built up an impressive client portfolio  supported by and cooperating with colleagues from our international offices  Sia Partners Netherlands employs approximately 55 consultants  Job Description The Amsterdam Data Science team  currently 8 data scientists engineers  is young  diverse and growing  As we are still relatively small you will be in the driver seat to shape its future  We have a flat structure and value the entrepreneurial spirit of our members  initiative is highly encouraged  We are also striving for well being  diversity and knowledge sharing inside the team  so that we all grow  We want to expand our capabilities in the risk domain and are currently looking for at least 3 new risk data scientists to join our team  As a risk data scientist you will be working on various client projects as well as on building our own Sia AI solutions  together with our French Data Engineering team and the Financial Services business units of Sia Partners Global  You perform complex analyses  build or improve risk models  identify business needs and create relevant solutions and action plans  You work on structural solutions for our clients and to that end you ensure that your work is understandable  well documented and reusable  If there are any commercial opportunities within your expertise  you notice and develop these together with the team  Since you are the expert in the field of Risk  you take initiative and are not afraid to guide other consultants from your team in achieving deliverables and facilitate personal development  You will actively participate in knowledge sharing  code reviews and deep dives to develop the ambitious team that you are part of  Qualifications You hold a Master s Degree with a strong quantitative component  e g  Econometrics  Physics  Mathematics  Statistics  Quantitative Finance  You have 1 3 years of relevant experience in the financial services sector  e g  credit risk  portfolio management  assessing regulations  trading strategies  You have deep understanding of modelling techniques used within the risk domain and are capable to communicate and explain your knowledge to different audiences You are a true problem solver  you turn complex issues into simple business understandable solutions You have excellent interpersonal and team working skills Strong coding skills in at least Python  other programming languages are a plus Good experience with database management languages  e g   SQL  PostgreSQL  Consulting experience is a plus  Proficiency with unix based command line and DevOps tools  Git  Docker  Kubernetes   big data technologies Spark  Hadoop  Databricks  and in cloud based infrastructures  AWS  GCP  Azure  is a very strong plus Excellent English verbal and written skills are required  other languages are considered  especially Dutch  are a plus What do we offer  Competitive salary with great extra advantages such as  a clear and structured yearly salary increase and yearly bonuses  Flexible transport options that match your personal needs  Training plan to develop yourself as an expert in your discipline  You have the opportunity to work from home  with the client or from our inspiring office in Amsterdam  Working in an international environment creates opportunities to share knowledge and work together on international projects with colleagues all over the world  Additional Information Sia Partners is an equal opportunity employer  All aspects of employment  including hiring  promotion  remuneration  or discipline  are based solely on performance  competence  conduct  or business needs

practical experience in a Data Scientist role and will help build a strong foundation for success in your future  During your tenure at our company  you will be provided with the opportunity to support  develop and improve our quality and processes as well as be provided opportunities to travel to our other sites  You will be part of a friendly  energetic  highly motivated and collaborative team working on Projects using leading edge technologies In this dynamic position you are responsible for challenging data analytical projects to support current manufacturing  You will develop as a Subject Matter Expert in the area of the data analytics within Global Animal Health Manufacturing  In this position you will gain knowledge of business processes and the technical mapping of manufacturing data Welcome in our team Our Bioprocess Engineering   Innovation team operates as a business partner proposing ideas and innovative solutions that enable new capabilities and insights for our animal health manufacturing division  We collaborate internationally to drive innovation and bring solutions that help everyone to be more productive Main responsibilities Development   implementation of new business insights to meet business specifications  project timescales and users  expectations Provide business expertise to implement and integrate new and existing systems and technologies Will own project budgets between  100k    500k Will deliver complex projects against tight timelines Will work on delivery of multiple data science projects simultaneously Will identify and manage risks with clear mitigation plan Maintenance and development of existing analytical solutions Opportunity to work in an agile environment to deliver business demands and drive business value Delivering projects throughout different phases of the digital transformation Maintain compliance to our Company s Corporate and Regulatory guidelines Ensuring all necessary training is completed and documented successfully Adherence to our Company s Standard Operating Procedures  SOP s  in everything you do Your profile Master s in science  Operation s management  Industrial engineering  big data analytics  process optimization  1 3 years of relevant work experience in large organizations 1 2 years of experience in data analytical projects within the pharmaceutical industry 3 5 years of programming experience during education or career 3 5 years of experience in statistical and data mining techniques Previous data driven process optimization experience is desirable but not essentialQualities we look forDemonstrates clear and effective communication A self starter who can be relied upon to work with minimal supervision Demonstrates a  can do  attitude Able to demonstrate reliability and build relationships at all levels with diverse stakeholders Strong problem solving and innovating skills Demonstrates initiative  proactivity and academic curiosity What we offer We welcome you to a truly global  dynamic and challenging environment with great opportunities for personal development  Our benefits are very competitive  and the summary below will give you an idea of what you can expect Competitive salary and a 3  year end allowance 35 5 days of leave Attractive collective health care insurance package with considerable reduction rates Solid Pension Plan Annual bonus based on own and company performance Travel allowance for commuting Numerous training  coaching and e learning modules for long term job opportunities and development For job_desc: Company Description Sia Partners is a next generation management consulting firm and pioneer of Consulting 4 0  We offer a unique blend of AI and design capabilities  augmenting traditional consulting to deliver exceptional value to our clients  With 2 200 consultants in 18 countries and expertise in more than 30 sectors and services  we optimize client projects worldwide  Through our Consulting for Good approach  we strive for next level impact by developing innovative CSR solutions for our clients  making sustainability a lever for profitable transformation Sia Partners Netherlands In 2009 the office in Amsterdam was opened  which is now situated at the 28th floor of the Rembrandt Tower with a great view on the city of Amsterdam  We focus on the following sectors  Energy   Utilities  Financial Services  Marketing   Customer Experience  Data Science and HR  Transformation   Change  The Dutch team is experiencing strong growth and has now built up an impressive client portfolio  supported by and cooperating with colleagues from our international offices  Sia Partners Netherlands employs approximately 55 consultants  Job Description The Amsterdam Data Science team  currently 8 data scientists engineers  is young  diverse and growing  As we are still relatively small you will be in the driver seat to shape its future  We have a flat structure and value the entrepreneurial spirit of our members  initiative is highly encouraged  We are also striving for well being  diversity and knowledge sharing inside the team  so that we all grow  We want to expand our capabilities in the risk domain and are currently looking for at least 3 new risk data scientists to join our team  As a risk data scientist you will be working on various client projects as well as on building our own Sia AI solutions  together with our French Data Engineering team and the Financial Services business units of Sia Partners Global  You perform complex analyses  build or improve risk models  identify business needs and create relevant solutions and action plans  You work on structural solutions for our clients and to that end you ensure that your work is understandable  well documented and reusable  If there are any commercial opportunities within your expertise  you notice and develop these together with the team  Since you are the expert in the field of Risk  you take initiative and are not afraid to guide other consultants from your team in achieving deliverables and facilitate personal development  You will actively participate in knowledge sharing  code reviews and deep dives to develop the ambitious team that you are part of  Qualifications You hold a Master s Degree with a strong quantitative component  e g  Econometrics  Physics  Mathematics  Statistics  Quantitative Finance  You have 1 3 years of relevant experience in the financial services sector  e g  credit risk  portfolio management  assessing regulations  trading strategies  You have deep understanding of modelling techniques used within the risk domain and are capable to communicate and explain your knowledge to different audiences You are a true problem solver  you turn complex issues into simple business understandable solutions You have excellent interpersonal and team working skills Strong coding skills in at least Python  other programming languages are a plus Good experience with database management languages  e g   SQL  PostgreSQL  Consulting experience is a plus  Proficiency with unix based command line and DevOps tools  Git  Docker  Kubernetes   big data technologies Spark  Hadoop  Databricks  and in cloud based infrastructures  AWS  GCP  Azure  is a very strong plus Excellent English verbal and written skills are required  other languages are considered  especially Dutch  are a plus What do we offer  Competitive salary with great extra advantages such as  a clear and structured yearly salary increase and yearly bonuses  Flexible transport options that match your personal needs  Training plan to develop yourself as an expert in your discipline  You have the opportunity to work from home  with the client or from our inspiring office in Amsterdam  Working in an international environment creates opportunities to share knowledge and work together on international projects with colleagues all over the world  Additional Information Sia Partners is an equal opportunity employer  All aspects of employment  including hiring  promotion  remuneration  or discipline  are based solely on performance  competence  conduct  or business needs

job_desc: Cloud Data Analyst As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

professional in data analytics  business analytics en data science  Je doet praktische ervaring op bij ��n of meerdere van onze interessante opdrachtgevers binnen profit of non profit  Bij onze inzichten  Jij blijft niet achter je computer zitten maar trekt de organisatie in om jouw vondsten onder de aandacht te brengen  Je weet de brug te slaan tussen de big data en de praktijk en bent een
