job_title: HR Data Analyst at Ahold Delhaize GSO
job_desc: Your new job and office Location  preferably at our Head office in Zaandam  Since expertise is boundaryless  we are also open to other locations We are looking for a HR Data Analyst for Ahold Delhaize who can dramatically increase our insight into how our associates experience HR  We are looking for someone who can help give our HR community the insights to make data driven decisions across our organization  You have a strong technical background in data visualization and analytics  You will design and create operational tactical metrics and dashboards that will assist in making decision in our HR domain You will be partnering across teams to ensure that our HR metrics are consistent and aligned to our strategic goals  You will be responsible for digging into the details to improve data quality  show new insights and drive new recommendations that will impact decision making  You will be working together with the HR Analytics Lead in a newly established team that will continue to grow The job itself We are looking for someone with at least 2 4 years of HRIS or Reporting support as well as 2 years of demonstrated experience with data visualization  We need you to be able to work magic with HR data  You MUST be passionate about and have experience with Data and Reporting  and have a passion to learn and master new data analysis techniques and data science methodology  We d love to see experience with SuccessFactors  PowerBI  R  Python and other Data tools  Develop a clear understanding of the data required to drive insight for those business problems and to deliver the required data  Create insight for the appropriate area of expertise  by analyzing and presenting global data and reports  In the process you identify errors and advise on solutions  Your reporting skills should be top notch as you will do the majority of the reporting for the Global HR department  Don t know HR specific analytics  Don t sweat it  the HR Analytics lead does and can train you on things like turnover  span of control  FTE  productivity unlock  annualized rates  etc  It would be super helpful if you have worked in SuccessFactors  but again  the HR Analytics Lead can train you in that as well  You use quantitative analysis and the clear presentation of data to see beyond the numbers and drive understanding and insight into the levers in our business  Help stakeholders to become data minded by creating and delivering specialized presentations and training on HR data related topics across the business  Drive design  development and deployment of standardized metrics and dashboards to measure our delivery across all our accounts  Deliver dashboards and custom reports to support specific decisions  identifying opportunities to automate where possible  Ensure business needs are being met by evaluating the ongoing effectiveness of current data   analytics initiatives  Build global HR KPI s based on the annual report  Dow Jones Sustainability Index and other global reports together with the HR Strategy and Change manager  Implement People Analytics module within SuccessFactors together with your local stakeholders  Perform data quality checks and establish a data quality process and structure  Maintain current dashboards and provide access management to stakeholders Your new office As an HR Data Analyst  you will work at and across Ahold Delhaize where approximately 410 000 employees worldwide serve over 50 million customers a week  Locally  you ll be working with 1 500 colleagues in Zaandam  the Netherlands  Although we are working mainly from home given the current situation  We improve and innovate every day  supporting our trusted local brands and reinforcing our role as a leader in retail and e commerce  Everything you do with your colleagues is directly visible in our internal departments What do we offer Covid 19 Our main priority continues to be the health and safety of our employees and customers  Due to the Covid 19 pandemic  this position will be remote until further notice  We will continue monitor the circumstances and when we feel comfortable  this position will return to our bustling Headquarters in Zaandam  where you will have the opportunity to collaborate face to face with a talented and diverse group of colleagues  At Ahold Delhaize we want to grow  That is only possible if you grow with us  That is why you can go in all directions with us career wise and in your personal development  While we work together to build our brand and your career  you can count on  based on 40 hours a week   What do we offer  An inspiring position in an international work environment  where you will work with different HR teams as well as IT  A very dynamic and challenging job with various internal and external stakeholders and several HR process owners  Possibilities to develop yourself both professionally and personally  Plenty of holidays  45 days to be exactly  25 5 regular paid vacation days and 19 5 ADV days  Enjoy  You develop as rapidly as the tech around us  Thanks to feedback loops with the best   the brightest tech savvy colleagues  A powerful laptop and smartphone are  included   You also get discounts on insurance and groceries  up to  300   a year   You have an opportunity to provide everyone with a healthier  tastier and more sustainable diet  RequirementsWe ask At our Ahold Delhaize Global Support Office  we are looking for an experienced HR Data Analyst  And specifically  for this vacancy  you are skilled at providing clear insights within a demanding international environment  bring strong interpersonal communication skills  and are able to drive issue resolution and results leveraging a detail oriented and simplicity mindset  The recipe for maximum impact  Bachelor s Degree in Statistics  we would also be excited to see people with Degrees in Data Management  Business Information Systems or other relevant fields of study around Data  Math Statistics  minimum of 1 4 years total experience in HRIS or IT focused on applications  minimum of 1 years  experience in data visualization  experience  knowledge and expertise in business systems analysis and design and project life cycle methodology  incl  best practices  An attractive pension plan of which we pay out over 4x times the amount you contribute to the fund  So you ll continue to enjoy a comfortable income even after retiring     In addition to knowledge  you have the following key competences to be successful in this role  The ability to work cross functionally and cross boarder in international context and setting  Strong communication and data presentation skills  experience analyzing data and communicating the results to senior business leaders  Continuously able to use your process improvement skillset as well as change Management Analysis skills  The ability to document processes  functional specifications and decisions made  as well as the ability to troubleshoot  More information For more information you can contact Marleen Docters van Leeuwen  Director HR Technology   Associate Experience at marleen van der pol aholddelhaize com or feel free to reach out to our recruiter  sanne peijen ah nl  she will be happy to tell you more  Application Apply now  but in any case  not later than two weeks after date of this publication  Please send your resume and motivation letter to  sanne peijen ah nl Bachelor Junior HR NLD Zaandam  Provincialeweg 11 You will work at

groter dan groots  En beschik jij over wat nodig is om impact te maken  Dan zijn wij wellicht op zoek naar jou  Ontdek meer over de vacature Data Scientist Preventive Maintenance  Over onze organisatie Wij zijn Huisman  Wij ontwikkelen  step changing  technische oplossingen en vertalen deze naar het ontwerp en de bouw van de grootste constructie apparatuur  Al decennia werken we over de hele wereld voor de sectoren offshore wind  geothermie  olie   gas  recreatie en civiele werken  Met onze gepassioneerde medewerkers en wereldwijde productie   service  en salesfaciliteiten zijn wij  in deze tijd van transitie   equipped for impact    We houden ervan om iets te maken dat nog niet bestaat  En als het al wel bestaat  dan weet ik dat we het nog beter kunnen maken    Robin van Boven  Principal Engineer Over de functie Data Scientist Preventive Maintenance Wat kun je verwachten van de functie Data Scientist binnen Huisman  Je kunt denken aan het krijgen van uitstekende overzichten van het daadwerkelijke gebruik van onze apparatuur  het vergelijken van het gebruik met de ontwerpcriteria en het ontwikkelen van tooling om de resterende levensduur te voorspellen en onze producten te optimaliseren  Graag wijzen we je ook op de andere voordelen van werken bij Huisman  zoals de mogelijkheid om bij te dragen aan baanbrekende innovaties  een uitstekend arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket en regelmatig een borrel in onze eigen bar  Wat verwachten we van jou Als data scientist maak je deel uit van het big data team dat een dataplatform ontwikkelt en predictive maintenance uitvoert  Het team analyseert tegelijkertijd data  ontwikkelt tooling en voert predictive maintenance uit voor klanten  Wat ga je doen  Trends identificeren patronen analyseren in meetgegevens  validatiemogelijkheden uitbreiden  Samen met engineers nieuwe metrics  dashboards en visualisatie ontwikkelen nadat je alle nodige checks hebt gedaan  De resultaten van je analyse rapporteren aan onze klanten  Ontwikkelen van een onderhoudsstrategie samen met ingenieurs op basis van de data analyse  Selecteren van geschikte hardware en software in samenwerking met engineers van andere disciplines  Assisteren van onze Global Services business line bij problemen die zich voordoen terwijl het product in gebruik is bij onze klanten  Oplossen van de dataproblemen en de communicatie daaromheen  Testen van hypothesen  Actief bijdragen bij aan het borgen en overdragen van kennis in de organisatie  Benieuwd of jij  equipped for impact  bent  Je bent  Gepassioneerd om waardevolle informatie uit data te halen  Analytisch  Praktisch en punctueel  Een resultaatgerichte teamspeler  Proactief en overtuigend  Niet bang om verantwoordelijkheid te dragen Je hebt  Master of Bachelors degree en kennis over datavisualisatie  Grafana  JavaScript  Python of C   en ervaring met databases zoals PostgreSQL  Kennis in of werkervaring met software schrijven of ontwerpen  Affiniteit met Besturingssystemen  Engineering en Mechatronica heeft de voorkeur  Nog enkele praktische zaken waar je over moet beschikken  Een EU paspoort geldige werkvergunning voor Nederland  Een goede beheersing van de Engelse taal in woord en geschrift  Meer over Huisman We ontwerpen en produceren in house en leveren onze turn key producten aan klanten over de hele wereld  Klanten kiezen voor Huisman vanwege onze ondernemersgeest  vaardigheden  betrouwbaarheid en innovatieve oplossingen  Wil je voorbeelden  Wat denk je bijvoorbeeld van deze innovatieve boortechniek voor het winnen van aardwarmte   Kom je ook voor Huisman werken  Zorg dan dat je klaar bent om impact te maken  Met andere woorden  verras ons  onze klanten en  jezelf  Wat hebben wij jou te bieden  Uitstekend arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket afgestemd op ervaring en opleidingsniveau  Een multiculturele werkomgeving  Diverse doorgroei  en ontwikkelmogelijkheden  Open  informele  no nonsense cultuur met korte communicatielijnen  Klinkt dit als iets The Role Where you fit in Shell Trading integrates a worldwide trading network with an unsurpassed global portfolio in crude oil  refined products  natural gas  electrical power  and chemicals  It has larger locations in London  Houston  Calgary  Singapore  Dubai  Rotterdam  and Barbados  Shell Trading is one of the world s largest energy traders and is a key segment of the Shell portfolio  Shell Energy Europe  SE EE  sells and actively trades energy related products and services associated with European natural gas  power  and environmental products  SE EE was created in 2009 through the combination of Shell s marketing and trading companies in Europe  SE EE is part of Shell Energy which is the commercial heart of the Integrated Gas Business and aligns all Energy Trading activity throughout the world  As part of the SE EE and NEs growth strategy  Power and Gas wholesale and customer activities are scaling significantly in existing and expanding into new market areas and deal types  This involves a significant amount of work on selecting  integrating  and maintaining new systems and processes  Shell Energy Europe Ltd   SE EE  acts as the Balancing Responsible Party  BRP  for renewable assets operated across Europe  This involves consolidating for varying local markets long and short positions to net off imbalance positions  minimise value leakage  and maximise value creation opportunity against the system price  Data is critically important in this process to inform optimisation of forecasts and to predict system buyout price  Different markets have different regulatory regimes related to the balancing market and a deep understanding of each market is critical to ensure continued license to operate for SE EE  and maximising value for the end to end business  This role in SE EE will be based in The Netherlands which means that this role will officially be part of Shell Nederland BV  What s the role  The primary accountabilities of the Renewable Data Analyst  Power  are  Work in a team of multiple Data Analysts to validate and correct data to support business critical processes  Keep track of Shell Energy Europe Ltd  s Portfolio in SE EE s data management solution for NL BRP  Collect  process  and analyse operational data  including allocation  reconciliation  and measurement data  in order to report to internal and external stakeholders  Troubleshoot issues with internal and external counterparties  including Dutch Grid Operators  Anomalies in generation and consumption patterns investigated and understood  Actively manage relationships with internal and external stakeholders  including relevant market organizations  Facilitate necessary management approvals  Work to standardise  and automate as many of these processes as possible in conjunction with IT  Understand the deal funnel to assess and manage the workload associated with integrating new opportunities into relevant systems Deep understanding of balancing regimes in country  well connected with regulatory bodies  able to understand upcoming regulatory changes and able to coordinate teams to implement system and process changes ahead of new introduction of new and or changed rules  What we need from you  The successful candidate would be required to  Be inspired by and committed to the success of Shell in the Energy Transition  Be comfortable with big  complex data sets  analysis  and application of that data to drive business value  Can process large data sets through building own queries to support resolve complex issues and support decision making  Show a keen interest in IT digitalization and other technology advancements and how these can be applied to drive competitive advantage in Shell  Understand the end to end Life of a Deal process in SE EE  Excellent customer service attention manner  Ability to scope and manage changes to IT projects and drive process improvements  Have experience in regulatory reporting frameworks for Power in Europe  demonstrating an interest in balancing regimes  Develop business relationships with customers and IT vendors  Operate effectively as part of a team as well as autonomously  Adapt quickly to a dynamic environment and demonstrate resilience under pressure  The successful candidate should also possess the following skills  Very strong interpersonal and communication skills  fluent in spoken and written Dutch and English   Excellent stakeholder engagement  Highly analytical  data driven with strong attention to detail  Process Improvement mindset  A basic knowledge of Trading and Supply European Power Operations  Trade Finance and Controls  European Regulatory Reporting and Compliance  COMPANY DESCRIPTION Shell Nederland BV is a platform for international collaboration  with Shell offering direct employment to around ten thousand people in the Netherlands alone  including roughly 2 800 non Dutch employees from around 80 countries  Diversity is key at Shell Nederland  and our employees reflect the innovation that stems from a diverse workforce  By joining Shell Nederland  you will benefit from an unrivalled industry leading development programme that will see you tap into a pool of expert knowledge that will help propel your career  Shell Nederland is the holding company of most Shell companies operating in the Netherlands  Shell Nederland also has an advisory and coordinating role in numerous areas  An innovative place to work There s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell  Everyone here is helping solve one of the biggest challenges facing the world today  bringing the benefits of energy to everyone on the planet  whilst managing the risks of climate change  Join us and you ll add your talent and imagination to a business with the power to shape the future   whether by investing in renewables  exploring new ways to store energy or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently  An inclusive place to work To power progress together  we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard  Here are just some of the ways we re nurturing an inclusive environment   one where you can express your ideas  extend your skills and reach your potential  We re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process  workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles  Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply  and we ll take it from there  We re closing the gender gap   whether that s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology  We re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace  promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity  We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance  We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application  A rewarding place to work Combine our creative  collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice  We re huge advocates for career development  We ll encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings  By pushing people to reach their potential  we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had  or make career moves they never thought possible  Disclaimer Please note  We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time  including prior to the advertised closing date  Before applying  you are advised to read our data protection policy  This policy describes the processing that may be associated with your personal data and informs you that your personal data may be transferred to Royal Dutch Shell Group companies around the world  The Shell Group and its approved recruitment consultants will never ask you for a fee to process or consider your application for a career with Shell  Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand  Shell is an Equal Opportunity Employer

job_title: HR Data Analyst at Ahold Delhaize GSO
job_desc: Your new job and office Location  preferably at our Head office in Zaandam  Since expertise is boundaryless  we are also open to other locations We are looking for a HR Data Analyst for Ahold Delhaize who can dramatically increase our insight into how our associates experience HR  We are looking for someone who can help give our HR community the insights to make data driven decisions across our organization  You have a strong technical background in data visualization and analytics  You will design and create operational tactical metrics and dashboards that will assist in making decision in our HR domain You will be partnering across teams to ensure that our HR metrics are consistent and aligned to our strategic goals  You will be responsible for digging into the details to improve data quality  show new insights and drive new recommendations that will impact decision making  You will be working together with the HR Analytics Lead in a newly established team that will continue to grow The job itself We are looking for someone with at least 2 4 years of HRIS or Reporting support as well as 2 years of demonstrated experience with data visualization  We need you to be able to work magic with HR data  You MUST be passionate about and have experience with Data and Reporting  and have a passion to learn and master new data analysis techniques and data science methodology  We d love to see experience with SuccessFactors  PowerBI  R  Python and other Data tools  Develop a clear understanding of the data required to drive insight for those business problems and to deliver the required data  Create insight for the appropriate area of expertise  by analyzing and presenting global data and reports  In the process you identify errors and advise on solutions  Your reporting skills should be top notch as you will do the majority of the reporting for the Global HR department  Don t know HR specific analytics  Don t sweat it  the HR Analytics lead does and can train you on things like turnover  span of control  FTE  productivity unlock  annualized rates  etc  It would be super helpful if you have worked in SuccessFactors  but again  the HR Analytics Lead can train you in that as well  You use quantitative analysis and the clear presentation of data to see beyond the numbers and drive understanding and insight into the levers in our business  Help stakeholders to become data minded by creating and delivering specialized presentations and training on HR data related topics across the business  Drive design  development and deployment of standardized metrics and dashboards to measure our delivery across all our accounts  Deliver dashboards and custom reports to support specific decisions  identifying opportunities to automate where possible  Ensure business needs are being met by evaluating the ongoing effectiveness of current data   analytics initiatives  Build global HR KPI s based on the annual report  Dow Jones Sustainability Index and other global reports together with the HR Strategy and Change manager  Implement People Analytics module within SuccessFactors together with your local stakeholders  Perform data quality checks and establish a data quality process and structure  Maintain current dashboards and provide access management to stakeholders Your new office As an HR Data Analyst  you will work at and across Ahold Delhaize where approximately 410 000 employees worldwide serve over 50 million customers a week  Locally  you ll be working with 1 500 colleagues in Zaandam  the Netherlands  Although we are working mainly from home given the current situation  We improve and innovate every day  supporting our trusted local brands and reinforcing our role as a leader in retail and e commerce  Everything you do with your colleagues is directly visible in our internal departments What do we offer Covid 19 Our main priority continues to be the health and safety of our employees and customers  Due to the Covid 19 pandemic  this position will be remote until further notice  We will continue monitor the circumstances and when we feel comfortable  this position will return to our bustling Headquarters in Zaandam  where you will have the opportunity to collaborate face to face with a talented and diverse group of colleagues  At Ahold Delhaize we want to grow  That is only possible if you grow with us  That is why you can go in all directions with us career wise and in your personal development  While we work together to build our brand and your career  you can count on  based on 40 hours a week   What do we offer  An inspiring position in an international work environment  where you will work with different HR teams as well as IT  A very dynamic and challenging job with various internal and external stakeholders and several HR process owners  Possibilities to develop yourself both professionally and personally  Plenty of holidays  45 days to be exactly  25 5 regular paid vacation days and 19 5 ADV days  Enjoy  You develop as rapidly as the tech around us  Thanks to feedback loops with the best   the brightest tech savvy colleagues  A powerful laptop and smartphone are  included   You also get discounts on insurance and groceries  up to  300   a year   You have an opportunity to provide everyone with a healthier  tastier and more sustainable diet  RequirementsWe ask At our Ahold Delhaize Global Support Office  we are looking for an experienced HR Data Analyst  And specifically  for this vacancy  you are skilled at providing clear insights within a demanding international environment  bring strong interpersonal communication skills  and are able to drive issue resolution and results leveraging a detail oriented and simplicity mindset  The recipe for maximum impact  Bachelor s Degree in Statistics  we would also be excited to see people with Degrees in Data Management  Business Information Systems or other relevant fields of study around Data  Math Statistics  minimum of 1 4 years total experience in HRIS or IT focused on applications  minimum of 1 years  experience in data visualization  experience  knowledge and expertise in business systems analysis and design and project life cycle methodology  incl  best practices  An attractive pension plan of which we pay out over 4x times the amount you contribute to the fund  So you ll continue to enjoy a comfortable income even after retiring     In addition to knowledge  you have the following key competences to be successful in this role  The ability to work cross functionally and cross boarder in international context and setting  Strong communication and data presentation skills  experience analyzing data and communicating the results to senior business leaders  Continuously able to use your process improvement skillset as well as change Management Analysis skills  The ability to document processes  functional specifications and decisions made  as well as the ability to troubleshoot  More information For more information you can contact Marleen Docters van Leeuwen  Director HR Technology   Associate Experience at marleen van der pol aholddelhaize com or feel free to reach out to our recruiter  sanne peijen ah nl  she will be happy to tell you more  Application Apply now  but in any case  not later than two weeks after date of this publication  Please send your resume and motivation letter to  sanne peijen ah nl Bachelor Junior HR NLD Zaandam  Provincialeweg 11 You will work at

Vacature  Data Scientist Preventive Maintanence die  equipped for impact  is Wil jij onderdeel zijn van een wereldwijd opererend team van innovators  Bijdragen aan de energietransitie  Denk je ook groter dan groots  En beschik jij over wat nodig is om impact te maken  Dan zijn wij wellicht op zoek naar jou  Ontdek meer over de vacature Data Scientist Preventive Maintenance  Over onze organisatie Wij zijn Huisman  Wij ontwikkelen  step changing  technische oplossingen en vertalen deze naar het ontwerp en de bouw van de grootste constructie apparatuur  Al decennia werken we over de hele wereld voor de sectoren offshore wind  geothermie  olie   gas  recreatie en civiele werken  Met onze gepassioneerde medewerkers en wereldwijde productie   service  en salesfaciliteiten zijn wij  in deze tijd van transitie   equipped for impact    We houden ervan om iets te maken dat nog niet bestaat  En als het al wel bestaat  dan weet ik dat we het nog beter kunnen maken    Robin van Boven  Principal Engineer Over de functie Data Scientist Preventive Maintenance Wat kun je verwachten van de functie Data Scientist binnen Huisman  Je kunt denken aan het krijgen van uitstekende overzichten van het daadwerkelijke gebruik van onze apparatuur  het vergelijken van het gebruik met de ontwerpcriteria en het ontwikkelen van tooling om de resterende levensduur te voorspellen en onze producten te optimaliseren  Graag wijzen we je ook op de andere voordelen van werken bij Huisman  zoals de mogelijkheid om bij te dragen aan baanbrekende innovaties  een uitstekend arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket en regelmatig een borrel in onze eigen bar  Wat verwachten we van jou Als data scientist maak je deel uit van het big data team dat een dataplatform ontwikkelt en predictive maintenance uitvoert  Het team analyseert tegelijkertijd data  ontwikkelt tooling en voert predictive maintenance uit voor klanten  Wat ga je doen  Trends identificeren patronen analyseren in meetgegevens  validatiemogelijkheden uitbreiden  Samen met engineers nieuwe metrics  dashboards en visualisatie ontwikkelen nadat je alle nodige checks hebt gedaan  De resultaten van je analyse rapporteren aan onze klanten  Ontwikkelen van een onderhoudsstrategie samen met ingenieurs op basis van de data analyse  Selecteren van geschikte hardware en software in samenwerking met engineers van andere disciplines  Assisteren van onze Global Services business line bij problemen die zich voordoen terwijl het product in gebruik is bij onze klanten  Oplossen van de dataproblemen en de communicatie daaromheen  Testen van hypothesen  Actief bijdragen bij aan het borgen en overdragen van kennis in de organisatie  Benieuwd of jij  equipped for impact  bent  Je bent  Gepassioneerd om waardevolle informatie uit data te halen  Analytisch  Praktisch en punctueel  Een resultaatgerichte teamspeler  Proactief en overtuigend  Niet bang om verantwoordelijkheid te dragen Je hebt  Master of Bachelors degree en kennis over datavisualisatie  Grafana  JavaScript  Python of C   en ervaring met databases zoals PostgreSQL  Kennis in of werkervaring met software schrijven of ontwerpen  Affiniteit met Besturingssystemen  Engineering en Mechatronica heeft de voorkeur  Nog enkele praktische zaken waar je over moet beschikken  Een EU paspoort geldige werkvergunning voor Nederland  Een goede beheersing van de Engelse taal in woord en geschrift  Meer over Huisman We ontwerpen en produceren in house en leveren onze turn key producten aan klanten over de hele wereld  Klanten kiezen voor Huisman vanwege onze ondernemersgeest  vaardigheden  betrouwbaarheid en innovatieve oplossingen  Wil je voorbeelden  Wat denk je bijvoorbeeld van deze innovatieve boortechniek voor het winnen van aardwarmte   Kom je ook voor Huisman werken  Zorg dan dat je klaar bent om impact te maken  Met andere woorden  verras ons  onze klanten en  jezelf  Wat hebben wij jou te bieden  Uitstekend arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket afgestemd op ervaring en opleidingsniveau  Een multiculturele werkomgeving  Diverse doorgroei  en ontwikkelmogelijkheden  Open  informele  no nonsense cultuur met korte communicatielijnen  Klinkt dit als iets The Role Where you fit in Shell Trading integrates a worldwide trading network with an unsurpassed global portfolio in crude oil  refined products  natural gas  electrical power  and chemicals  It has larger locations in London  Houston  Calgary  Singapore  Dubai  Rotterdam  and Barbados  Shell Trading is one of the world s largest energy traders and is a key segment of the Shell portfolio  Shell Energy Europe  SE EE  sells and actively trades energy related products and services associated with European natural gas  power  and environmental products  SE EE was created in 2009 through the combination of Shell s marketing and trading companies in Europe  SE EE is part of Shell Energy which is the commercial heart of the Integrated Gas Business and aligns all Energy Trading activity throughout the world  As part of the SE EE and NEs growth strategy  Power and Gas wholesale and customer activities are scaling significantly in existing and expanding into new market areas and deal types  This involves a significant amount of work on selecting  integrating  and maintaining new systems and processes  Shell Energy Europe Ltd   SE EE  acts as the Balancing Responsible Party  BRP  for renewable assets operated across Europe  This involves consolidating for varying local markets long and short positions to net off imbalance positions  minimise value leakage  and maximise value creation opportunity against the system price  Data is critically important in this process to inform optimisation of forecasts and to predict system buyout price  Different markets have different regulatory regimes related to the balancing market and a deep understanding of each market is critical to ensure continued license to operate for SE EE  and maximising value for the end to end business  This role in SE EE will be based in The Netherlands which means that this role will officially be part of Shell Nederland BV  What s the role  The primary accountabilities of the Renewable Data Analyst  Power  are  Work in a team of multiple Data Analysts to validate and correct data to support business critical processes  Keep track of Shell Energy Europe Ltd  s Portfolio in SE EE s data management solution for NL BRP  Collect  process  and analyse operational data  including allocation  reconciliation  and measurement data  in order to report to internal and external stakeholders  Troubleshoot issues with internal and external counterparties  including Dutch Grid Operators  Anomalies in generation and consumption patterns investigated and understood  Actively manage relationships with internal and external stakeholders  including relevant market organizations  Facilitate necessary management approvals  Work to standardise  and automate as many of these processes as possible in conjunction with IT  Understand the deal funnel to assess and manage the workload associated with integrating new opportunities into relevant systems Deep understanding of balancing regimes in country  well connected with regulatory bodies  able to understand upcoming regulatory changes and able to coordinate teams to implement system and process changes ahead of new introduction of new and or changed rules  What we need from you  The successful candidate would be required to  Be inspired by and committed to the success of Shell in the Energy Transition  Be comfortable with big  complex data sets  analysis  and application of that data to drive business value  Can process large data sets through building own queries to support resolve complex issues and support decision making  Show a keen interest in IT digitalization and other technology advancements and how these can be applied to drive competitive advantage in Shell  Understand the end to end Life of a Deal process in SE EE  Excellent customer service attention manner  Ability to scope and manage changes to IT projects and drive process improvements  Have experience in regulatory reporting frameworks for Power in Europe  demonstrating an interest in balancing regimes  Develop business relationships with customers and IT vendors  Operate effectively as part of a team as well as autonomously  Adapt quickly to a dynamic environment and demonstrate resilience under pressure  The successful candidate should also possess the following skills  Very strong interpersonal and communication skills  fluent in spoken and written Dutch and English   Excellent stakeholder engagement  Highly analytical  data driven with strong attention to detail  Process Improvement mindset  A basic knowledge of Trading and Supply European Power Operations  Trade Finance and Controls  European Regulatory Reporting and Compliance  COMPANY DESCRIPTION Shell Nederland BV is a platform for international collaboration  with Shell offering direct employment to around ten thousand people in the Netherlands alone  including roughly 2 800 non Dutch employees from around 80 countries  Diversity is key at Shell Nederland  and our employees reflect the innovation that stems from a diverse workforce  By joining Shell Nederland  you will benefit from an unrivalled industry leading development programme that will see you tap into a pool of expert knowledge that will help propel your career  Shell Nederland is the holding company of most Shell companies operating in the Netherlands  Shell Nederland also has an advisory and coordinating role in numerous areas  An innovative place to work There s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell  Everyone here is helping solve one of the biggest challenges facing the world today  bringing the benefits of energy to everyone on the planet  whilst managing the risks of climate change  Join us and you ll add your talent and imagination to a business with the power to shape the future   whether by investing in renewables  exploring new ways to store energy or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently  An inclusive place to work To power progress together  we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard  Here are just some of the ways we re nurturing an inclusive environment   one where you can express your ideas  extend your skills and reach your potential  We re creating a space where people with disabilities can excel through transparent recruitment process  workplace adjustments and ongoing support in their roles  Feel free to let us know about your circumstances when you apply  and we ll take it from there  We re closing the gender gap   whether that s through action on equal pay or by enabling more women to reach senior roles in engineering and technology  We re striving to be a pioneer of an inclusive and diverse workplace  promoting equality for employees regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity  We consider ourselves a flexible employer and want to support you finding the right balance  We encourage you to discuss this with us in your application  A rewarding place to work Combine our creative  collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice  We re huge advocates for career development  We ll encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings  By pushing people to reach their potential  we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had  or make career moves they never thought possible  Disclaimer Please note  We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time  including prior to the advertised closing date  Before applying  you are advised to read our data protection policy  This policy describes the processing that may be associated with your personal data and informs you that your personal data may be transferred to Royal Dutch Shell Group companies around the world  The Shell Group and its approved recruitment consultants will never ask you for a fee to process or consider your application for a career with Shell  Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand  Shell is an Equal Opportunity Employer

ons Automatisering team die bestaat uit 35 enthousiaste en behulpzame collega s  Het is voor ons een sport om van onze klanten ambassadeurs te maken  Bovendien is het voor Broekhuis belangrijk dat de Amsterdam About us Moove is a mobility fintech empowering mobility entrepreneurs by democratising vehicle ownership in emerging markets  We have operations in London  Amsterdam  Lagos  Accra  Joburg  Cape Town  Nairobi and Dubai  and are scaling our global footprint rapidly  Co founded in 2019 by Ladi Delano  a serial entrepreneur who has built businesses in Asia and Africa  and Jide Odunsi  a former senior Goldman Sachs banker and McKinsey alumnus  Moove has raised over  68m to date from some of the world s leading fintech VCs including Speedinvest and Left Lane Capital  and global lenders including the IFC  We are also Uber s exclusive fleet supply and financing partner in key emerging markets  About the role Building the fintech mobility platform of the future necessitates putting data at the heart of everything we do  To support this mission we are building a newly created Data function composed of Data Science  Engineering  Analytic and Governance subgroupings  Our Governance unit is seeking experienced and creative business analysts who want to use their skills to improve people s lives and help us democratize mobility through fintech  As the Data Governance Specialist  you will contribute to establishing common processes and procedures critical to data governance including data management  curating and extending the data taxonomy catalogue and quality scorecard  and communicating the strategic and operational progress of data management to data owners and the steward community  Your key responsibilities will be to  Partner with Security and Data Protection to identify  tag  and develop data management strategies for masking and protecting sensitive data within architecture  including driving the introduction of tools and processes to simplify identification and management Work with Program management and data governance councils to define data governance processes and explore automation to enable scaling  Ensure controls are in place for access and security Develop and deploy data governance framework standards consisting of data standards  processes and procedures in the areas of data ingestion  data movement  data quality  master   reference data  data life cycle management and metadata management Document sources of truth for data enabling consistent data sources  definitions  structures and processes  Work closely with Business owners to onboard critical data assets Create and conduct governance processes to measure Data Management and Data Quality maturity Establish relevant processes toward data integrity  user trust  and data access Document  assess  influence  and synthesize business requirements Understand the upstream and downstream data impact  Help implement enterprise data catalogue documenting data glossaries  taxonomy  metadata  usage  and lineage Establish KPIs for periodic measurement and reporting to the data governance councils Educate   drive adoption of data governance practices by showing its impact on business decision making Qualifications and experience Experience with enterprise data governance  content  compliance  and security programs Experience in creating policies  standards  and playbooks Strong Experience with SQL Ability to communicate effectively with technical and business teams  drive issues to closure Strong understanding of IT systems  metadata management  data management  and data stewardship Strong time management and organization skills Ability to drive multiple projects concurrently Experience in Master Data Management  data governance  data analysis  data profiling  data quality and system integration Experience working in Data catalogue  Data Lineage and Governance practices Bachelor s degree in Computer Science  MIS  Engineering or a related technical discipline preferred Moove is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of gender  race  sexual orientation  marital status  religion  political affiliation or any other protected characteristic  Our team is collaborative  positive  curious  and engaged  We think fast  work smart  laugh often  and are looking for like minded people to join us in our mission to disrupt vehicle ownership and make cities better

Digitalization and Big Data are high on Aegon s agenda  We are working on a data lake  robotics  advanced calculation models  strategic partnerships with promising start ups  platforms and blockchain  For our constantly evolving organization  we are looking for an enterprising  Sr   Data Officer who is responsible for drawing up and helping to implement the integral data management framework  Data is a key strategic asset and is at the heart of everything we do at Aegon  It is a key enabler and instrumental for us to drive strategic ambitions and satisfy ever more invasive regulatory requirements  In order to manage data as a strategic asset our data needs to be of high quality  fit for purpose and easy to consume  Data and digitalization are high on Aegon s agenda  We are building a state of the art data lake  forging strategic partnerships with promising start ups data platforms and are pioneering in blockchain  For our rapidly changing organization we are looking for a Data Officer who will help oversee  drive and anchor our data management strategy throughout the whole organization  As a  Sr   Data Officer you are part of the central Data Management team where we act as a trusted strategic data management advisor towards our lines of business and functions  e g  Mortgages  Non life   Together we are on a mission to transform Aegon into a modern and data driven financial services provider of tomorrow  In your role you will help design and in close collaboration with key senior stakeholders continuously improve our integrated data management framework  e g  data governance  data quality management  metadata management   In addition you will have a pivotal role in understanding and translating key business requirements and firmly connecting them to our data management activities  deliverables and performance indicators  You will report to the Head of Data Management  Qualifications You have an unwavering passion for data  enterprise architecture and management consulting  Operating in a fast paced and ever changing environment gives you energy and inspires you to excel and reach your true potential  You are able to come up with innovative and practical solutions to tackle long standing complex problems and can effectively pitch them towards key  business  stakeholders  Furthermore you are able to effortlessly switch between abstract constructs and practical solutions  connect the dots and cut through complexity  You enjoy working in a talented  fun and inclusive team and always bring your A game  A completed master s degree in Information Management  Data   Analytics  Organization Studies  Econometrics  Business Economics   Engineering or related study 5 10 years track record in data management  e g  data governance  data quality  data architecture  operating model design and implementation within a complex  financial  organization Consulting skills and competences  experience at a Big 4 consulting firm is an advantage   being able to think  frame and effectively translate complex ideas and pitch them to  senior MT  business and IT stakeholders  Knowledge of and practical implementation experience with data management industry standards such as DAMA DMBOK Relevant data management certifications  e g  Certified Data Management Professional  or willing to obtain them in the short term Affinity with and   or experience in Enterprise Architecture  being able to integrally identify challenges  propose effective solutions and oversee impact in a holistic manner  data  process  organization and technology  Connecting personality  depth and focused on collaboration Impactful and discussion partner on all levels Authentic and initiating Customer oriented and excellent communication skills You are a team player with a sense of humor You look for challenges and are constantly improvement oriented Diversity   Inclusion At Aegon  we are committed to fostering a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture  We are more than a global financial insitution   we are a people business  and we recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing diverse perspectives  We value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation including race  gender  ability  language  culture  beliefs  age  origin  background  perspectives and experiences  Compensation   Benefits We offer you an interesting position where you work independently and professionally in a daring and dynamic organisation  Growth and development are important to us  that is why we invest amply in our employees in the form of development and career possibilities  In exchange for your commitment and efforts we offer you an extensive and excellent package of pay and benefits  e g   a competitive monthly salary  in addition you receive a fixed 13th month s salary and holiday allowance in the form of a monthly flexible budget of 16 7  of your monthly salary  good balance between work and Who You ll Work With You will be based in our Brussels  Amsterdam or London office as a core member of our climate analytics team  You and your team will work across all sectors at McKinsey being impacted by climate change   for example  the public  energy and financial sectors  Regardless of the sectors in which you work  you will get the opportunity to work with multi disciplinary teams with digital  analytics  research and business backgrounds  Our climate analytics team is an agile team operating collaboratively with other functional and industry teams to tailor bespoke What You ll Do You will provide insights to clients  strengthen our core client product offerings and disseminate climate related insights via internally and externally published articles and visualizations  In this role  you will spend half of your time solving specific business problems on client projects  either remotely or on site  and you will spend the other half of your time developing new  or improving upon existing  products for the climate analytics team  As a member of a client service team  you will design solutions to core business problems that best meet client needs  You will also communicate the outcomes and insights of your work to primarily non technical executive audiences  On client projects  your tasks will include retrieving and processing large amounts of data from cloud storage as well as conducting analyses and generating insight based on medium to long term projected changes in climate  You will utilize your climate domain expertise to provide climate specific insight and inform strategy for addressing climate risk across industries  You will learn how to structure business problems and serve as a client advisor while working closely with other data scientists engineers and senior leaders across industries  When working internally with the climate analytics team  you will improve current product offerings  what we call  IP development   to best meet our most common client needs  You will work in a collaborative agile team environment where you will bring together a variety of global data sources  implement different algorithms and utilize cutting edge methodologies and approaches to develop proprietary solutions  You will work together with our data engineering team to design and deploy applications and dashboards to deliver faster  more impactful insights to our clients  You will have access to unparalleled career acceleration  with ownership and responsibility to lead the work you do from day one in a collaborative  diverse  non hierarchical environment  You will have the opportunity to travel to client sites  locally and around the world to be able to provide direct and measurable impact to some of the largest players from energy to agriculture around the globe  Qualifications Graduate degree in atmospheric science  meteorology  climate earth systems science  hydrology  civil environmental engineering  astrophysics or similar fields  PhD postdoc highly preferred Experience working with climate models  e g   CMIP5 GCMs  RCMs  etc    ensemble analysis  uncertainty quantification Preferred modeling experience in flood hydrological modeling  bias correction downscaling methods  climate impact assessments Knowledge in climate risk assessment  extreme events analysis Ability to work with large  multi dimensional data  e g   netCDF  GRIB  TIFF files  Python knowledge  experience with xarray and knowledge of basic software engineering principles highly preferred Experience working with Linux and command line scripting  i e  bash  zsh  and familiarity with cloud computing environments highly preferred Self management skills and ability to work as part of an Agile team Able to work under competing  quickly changing priorities  manage expectations effectively and support the team under pressure Strong multitasking and parallel development abilities Strong analytical and problem solving skills paired with the ability to develop creative and efficient solutions Strong interpersonal communication skills

Leer de organisatie kennen Onze opdrachtgever is een snelgroeiende no nonsense consultancy organisatie met een passie voor operationele processen  Zij helpen toonaangevende bedrijven bij het verbeteren van hun operationele performance  Deze verbetering is meetbaar  levert duurzaam resultaat op en wordt bereikt door het aanpassen van processen  technologie en organisatie  Dit resultaat bereiken hun medewerkers samen met de werknemers van hun klanten  Hun opdrachtgevers zijn bedrijven in de infrastructuur  telecombedrijven  banken en verzekeraars  bedrijven in de retail   industrie en energiebedrijven  Verder onderscheiden zij zichzelf in de markt door diepgaande proces  en systeemkennis constant te combineren met operationele realisatiekracht  Over de functie Als Junior Data Consultant sla jij de brug tussen data en de business  Hier krijg je eerst een intensieve vierweekse training waarbij je alle ins en outs leert binnen het vakgebied  Dit doe je samen met een klasje starters die allemaal dezelfde passie hebben als jij  Door deze Academy bouw je een solide basis om later waarde te kunnen toevoegen aan jouw klanten  Na de Academy mag je jouw kennis gaan toepassen bij grote organisaties zoals Alliander  de Belastingdienst  ABN AMRO  AEGON  Heineken of Siemens  Uiteraard word je verder ondersteund met specialistische trainingen  coaching on the job en soft skill trainingen  Daarna kan je doorgroeien naar onder andere Data Scientist  Data Engineer  Data Governance of Data Management om een expert te worden op jouw vakgebied  Jouw kwaliteiten VWO of HAVO en daarna een afgeronde WO of HBO  HBO met een IT gerelateerde studie  In staat om snel de processen en systemen van de klant te doorgronden Analytisch sterk en wil graag samen met collega s werken eigen mentor  Evenementen en borrels met je nieuwe collega s  Uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden  Boven marktconform salaris  bonus  leaseauto  laptop en telefoon Klinkt goed  Ben jij ge�nteresseerd in bovenstaand profiel  Good Company ziet graag jouw sollicitatie tegemoet  Door middel van het klikken op de solliciteerbutton kom je in een overzichtelijk sollicitatiescherm waar je met jouw CV of LinkedIn profiel kan reageren op de vacature van Junior Data Consultant

job_desc: Ensuring that the client s data foundation is in perfect shape  that the client is in control of the data quality and is ready and flexible to respond to the future  That is the core of what we do within the Data Governance   Master Data Management discipline of Valcon Data  Driven  Fast  Together  From developing the vision to implementation and further development   We are a no nonsense consultancy agency  Valcon is an acronym for Value Consulting because value is central to everything we do for our clients  We help clients with end to end transformations that combine consulting with technology and data  We do this with more than 800 enthusiastic colleagues in the Netherlands  the United Kingdom  Germany  Denmark and Sweden for leading clients such as Heineken  Jumbo  Sligro  PVH  ING and the Dutch Tax Administration   Within Valcon Data  the DG   MDM team consists of a mix of project managers  business analysts  consultants  architects and developers  who have made this their speciality and who  together with the expertise from the wide Valcon community  ensure successful customer projects  Because the demand for a successful establishment of data foundation is very high  we want to expand the team  whereby expansion in all roles is necessary   Responsibilities Establishing and communicating a vision on data governance and or master data management Implementing the data governance and or master data management solution Realising the organisational changes as part of the implementation Further developing the client s data foundation Enabling the client to flexibly deal with changes  for example  due to mergers and acquisitions  internationalisation or new regulations Valcon core values Can do Together Curiosity Integrity Joy We offer An energetic  ambitious and international environment with a great working atmosphere  An environment with significant autonomy and responsibility  A steep learning curve and structured coaching from your own mentor  A thriving community  active in both business and social events  Market relevant employment package  salary  benefits fund  bonus  lease car or mobility allowance and laptop   Apply today  Experience A completed quantitative Master s degree   such as Computer Science  AI   Applied  Mathematics  Econometrics  etc  At least 2 years of work experience within Data Governance  Data Quality or MDM Strong in a team with good communication and analytical skills  Experience with data governance  data quality or MDM tooling   platforms is a plus  At Valcon we work with several suppliers who we have chosen for their specific qualities  Think of IBM  Informatica  Microsoft  Profisee  Stibo Systems and Tibco  For developers knowledge of java  javascript and integration  API  JSON etc   is an important foundation Fluent in Dutch and English Location The Netherlands

skills: deep, sql, r, python, spark, hadoop, git
job_desc: This is Adyen  Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world s leading companies  delivering frictionless payments across online  mobile  and in store channels  Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day  We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team  And together  we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays   We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company  building a platform from scratch  Now  Adyen serves the world s brightest companies like Meta  Uber  L Oreal  Camper  eBay  GoFundMe  Bonobos  and Spotify   Data Analyst  We are looking for a data analyst who is both passionate about data  as well as telling the stories behind it  You are a professional in insights storytelling  communication and visualization and know how to turn metrics into action  You love seeing data transform into information  enabling automation and creating convincing visualizations  such as dashboards and presentations  and stories   You are able to spot opportunities in data and know how to enable others to use it effectively  Next to being a data evangelist  you love building self serve dashboards for people to use  whether our merchants directly  or any internal stakeholders  You don t like doing the same thing twice  you have an automation mindset so your work is never repetitive  You know how to design  and maybe even create  highly optimized datasets that can be used to answer numerous questions   What You ll Do  We are currently hiring for many different streams  this stream is called Recurring   Tokenization   The Recurring and Tokenization stream builds and maintains value add products for merchants with recurring payment business models  for example  subscriptions  Identifying data insights that help ensure recurring payments don t fail is a key component to improving the value proposition and driving product adoption  Ensuring data integrity  managing ETLs  performing deep analytics into performance  managing our stakeholders and automating the delivery of insights through the creation of dashboards and reports are some of the core responsibilities our analysts perform  No two days are the same and we wouldn t have it any other way  Who you are Demonstrable past experience in a similar role at a previous company  Experience in the payments industry is a plus  You are  almost  as passionate about people as you are about data  You get excited about what data can do for others and want to contribute to a data driven organization  You are a great communicator and feel comfortable talking to stakeholders  You don t blindly follow up requests  but make sure you get the question behind the query  You love articulating data stories to your stakeholders  These can include merchants on our platform  Technical and have a good understanding of all components of an analytical data pipeline  You are comfortable writing  complex  SQL queries and have  at least  some level of coding skills  R or Python   It s a plus if you have experience with tools like JupyterHub and Looker and Big Data technology such as Spark  Hadoop and Airflow  At Adyen we use Git for version control  so some level of experience here is a plus  Data positions at Adyen  We know companies handle different definitions for their data related positions  this is for instance dependent on the size of a company  Since the birth of the Data Solution and the growth of all data streams  we categorized and defined all our positions  Have a look at this blogpost to find out   Our Diversity  Equity and Inclusion commitments  Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives  This diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum  Our business and technical challenges are unique  we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them   voices like yours  So no matter where you re from  who you love  or what you believe in  we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen  Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100  of the qualifications  Do you recognize yourself in this statement  If so  Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply  We look forward to your application   What s next   Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us  We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 3 business days  Our interview process tends to take between 3 or 4 weeks to complete  Don t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility   Please  note that this role is a full time position in Amsterdam  It will require a relocation in case you live outside of the Netherlands

skills: deep, sql, r, python, spark, hadoop, git
job_desc: This is Adyen  Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world s leading companies  delivering frictionless payments across online  mobile  and in store channels  Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day  We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team  And together  we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays   We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company  building a platform from scratch  Now  Adyen serves the world s brightest companies like Meta  Uber  L Oreal  Camper  eBay  GoFundMe  Bonobos  and Spotify   Data Analyst  We are looking for a data analyst who is both passionate about data  as well as telling the stories behind it  You are a professional in insights storytelling  communication and visualization and know how to turn metrics into action  You love seeing data transform into information  enabling automation and creating convincing visualizations  such as dashboards and presentations  and stories   You are able to spot opportunities in data and know how to enable others to use it effectively  Next to being a data evangelist  you love building self serve dashboards for people to use  whether our merchants directly  or any internal stakeholders  You don t like doing the same thing twice  you have an automation mindset so your work is never repetitive  You know how to design  and maybe even create  highly optimized datasets that can be used to answer numerous questions   What You ll Do  We are currently hiring for many different streams  this stream is called Recurring   Tokenization   The Recurring and Tokenization stream builds and maintains value add products for merchants with recurring payment business models  for example  subscriptions  Identifying data insights that help ensure recurring payments don t fail is a key component to improving the value proposition and driving product adoption  Ensuring data integrity  managing ETLs  performing deep analytics into performance  managing our stakeholders and automating the delivery of insights through the creation of dashboards and reports are some of the core responsibilities our analysts perform  No two days are the same and we wouldn t have it any other way  Who you are Demonstrable past experience in a similar role at a previous company  Experience in the payments industry is a plus  You are  almost  as passionate about people as you are about data  You get excited about what data can do for others and want to contribute to a data driven organization  You are a great communicator and feel comfortable talking to stakeholders  You don t blindly follow up requests  but make sure you get the question behind the query  You love articulating data stories to your stakeholders  These can include merchants on our platform  Technical and have a good understanding of all components of an analytical data pipeline  You are comfortable writing  complex  SQL queries and have  at least  some level of coding skills  R or Python   It s a plus if you have experience with tools like JupyterHub and Looker and Big Data technology such as Spark  Hadoop and Airflow  At Adyen we use Git for version control  so some level of experience here is a plus  Data positions at Adyen  We know companies handle different definitions for their data related positions  this is for instance dependent on the size of a company  Since the birth of the Data Solution and the growth of all data streams  we categorized and defined all our positions  Have a look at this blogpost to find out   Our Diversity  Equity and Inclusion commitments  Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives  This diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum  Our business and technical challenges are unique  we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them   voices like yours  So no matter where you re from  who you love  or what you believe in  we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen  Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100  of the qualifications  Do you recognize yourself in this statement  If so  Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply  We look forward to your application   What s next   Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us  We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 3 business days  Our interview process tends to take between 3 or 4 weeks to complete  Don t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility   Please  note that this role is a full time position in Amsterdam  It will require a relocation in case you live outside of the Netherlands

 90  accuracy   including basic troubleshooting with the ability to utilize proprietary tools  Willingness and flexibility to work in shifts  Job summary All Amazon teams and businesses  from Prime at scale  Deliver high quality of labeled data  leveraging guidelines to meet specific key performance indicators  and using in house tools and software  Report issues with tools and software to the job_desc: Want to do cool shit with amazing data to make an impact in a tech lagging industry  Would you like to join a fast growing B2B SaaS company that is revolutionizing the manufacturing industry by empowering factory workers whilst saving paper at the same time  Fresh from announcing a further  5 million of funding in March  we are now searching for our first ever Data Analyst  Working with our Founders  CTO  the Product Circle  Customer Success  well  basically  the whole company  you will take ownership of data analytics at SwipeGuide  Your mission  Empower SwipeGuide with data driven insights on the product  business  and customer to scale adoption and usage and help us make the right decisions  You ll manage the overall data architecture and develop  prioritize and recommend initiatives to improve and build upon the data architecture to support SwipeGuide  WHO ARE WE  We are SwipeGuide  We are on a mission to reduce waste  spare resources for better use  and save the world from useless paper instructions  Imagine working on a busy production line  and you have to rely upon outdated  inadequate work instructions  PDF and paper instructions are a thing of the past  so we re developing simple  intuitive cloud software to empower factory teams to perform better in their jobs and scale knowledge with digital standard work  Our SwipeGuide platform enables global companies like Coca Cola  Heineken  and PepsiCo to build and share visual step by step digital work instructions with their workforce on any device  And yes  it also feels good to enable them to use less paper and save the trees  We all know that a digital future is unavoidable  and we re providing the software essential for digital transformation  And it s working  We started with five people in 2016  today  after  5mn funding in March 2021  we have twenty five full time employees  100 000  platform users in 89 countries worldwide  and an inclusive  continuously improving culture  OUR TEAM OF SWIPEES We have recently become a part remote organization  but our office is preserved for 10 Swipees to attend each day  totally optional   For the future  it s totally up to you  hammock on the beach or face to face smiles  We work in a bustling startup hub B 2 in Amsterdam with 300  other startups  You ll see the usual ping pong table  foosball  arcade machines  and PS4s everywhere  But  there are also charming places to sit in the sun  break out areas  and ambitious  inspired people as far as the eye can see  when everyone returns    You ll soon meet the road cyclist  the yoga lover  the guy with an oyster business  the ex chef  the person to count on in an emergency  the social butterfly  the DJ trainee  the volleyball player  and someone who owns hundreds of sneakers  We like to fail  it s how we learn   and in our PowWow  we share our f    ups  failures  and learn together  Our values are at the heart of everything we do  we strive to enable Swipees to develop their potential and showcase their authentic selves and engage in a culture of inclusion YOUR ROLE AS THE DATA ANALYST AT SWIPEGUIDE Currently  we gather a lot of valuable content data  such as the number of guides created  published  viewed and more  We have built our own event tracking service with AWS Lambda and store our own analytics data in AWS Redshift and AWS RDS  From these data sources  ETL scripts  and an aggregation pipeline  we build and embed dashboards for customers with Sisense  a third party dashboarding tool  As the first ever Data Analyst at SwipeGuide  you will work closely with Sue  CTO   Daan  Founder CPO   Willemijn  Founder CEO   and a small team of Data Engineers to build  maintain  and troubleshoot data reports used by the company and our customers  This can mean everything from creating new charts based on the data architecture and tooling we currently have to transform our data strategy completely  You have the freedom and power to OWN IT  The challenge  Self Service  We are storing immense amounts of data but all of those insights are trapped inside of our tables in several databases  How can we make it easy to access and visualize that data  Can we enable non developers to get those insights themselves  Maintenance  With ever changing requirements from customers about the business about what they want to know  and ever changing features in the platform  we need to keep up and make sure the data and reports are up to date and accurate  Performance  Sisense offers customers the ability to filter views of graphs and tables based on date  and we need to keep the historical data to show adoption over time  How can we optimize our queries and data structures to do this in the most performant way possible  Cross platform experience  How can we combine and organize data from users on the web based CMS and Viewers  but also our NativeApps   Your responsibilities  Given the size of our team and demands from our customers  you ll be working on both operational and strategic levels  That means  on the one hand  you should be comfortable with data analysis  creating charts  and SQL scripts yourself  and on the other hand  you will use your broad experience and expertise to advise on what data to collect and store  how to do model and maintain it  and what tools we should use and implement  A day in the life of the Data Analyst could look like this  Defining the strategy for Data Architecture at SwipeGuide Create initiatives and develop priorities to improve upon our Data Architecture Defining and implementing new event tracking Developing reports and analysis to support SwipeGuide with decision making Analyzing existing tools and databases and providing software solution recommendations Providing technical expertise in data storage structures  data mining  and data cleansing Design and develop large and complex data warehouse architectures Take ownership of large production data systems to support a variety of growing data needs Design  implement and expand data pipelines by performing preprocessing  cleaning and monitoring activities Growing the future Data Circle with the support you need to scale ESSENTIAL ATTRIBUTES FOR THE DATA ANALYST At least 5 years of experience as a data analyst  business analyst  BI analyst  or related role  Experience with Data strategy for a young tech SaaS company Expert in writing and debugging SQL queries Experience in handling large data sets with relational databases  ex  AWS RDS  and non relational databases  ex  AWS Redshift  Demonstrated experience working with power BI tools such as Looker  Tableau  Sisense  or similar  can you walk us through a chart you created   You know what a  materialized view  and  ETL script  is Able to translate complex requirements into non technical  lay terms  Able to work independently and make decisions and manage priorities in a fast paced startup environment  Organized and structured way of working  Fast learner with a growth mindset Fluent in English NICE TO HAVES TO BE SWIPEGUIDES DATA ANALYST  Experience working with Node js or Python Basic JavaScript and bash scripting experience  for updating data scripts in our web application  Experience working with AWS and its additional data related services  ex  Snowflake  Glue  etc    we have a ton of free credits to experiment with until March 2022   Interest in machine learning  AI  etc  WHAT S IN IT FOR YOU  Unlimited holidays  and we think it works here    In office smiles or Zoom meets  up to you  Full Remote working opportunities   Amsterdam office   Competitive monthly compensation   monthly holiday pay  A challenging environment to develop your personal and professional skills with a lot of freedom to take on ownership  You ll be in a fortunate situation to make a high impact at a startup that is about to lift off after  5mn funding  You will enjoy working in a startup hub at B  Amsterdam  A chance to learn from other people s mistakes   we share and celebrate failures each week WHAT ARE YOUR FUTURE COLLEAGUES SAYING ABOUT SWIPEGUIDE   I love the atmosphere of collaboration  It really feels like everyone here cares about our product and genuinely wants it to grow and succeed  That s a healthy kind of place to work     Chris Content Marketer  SwipeGuide gives me hands on experience in how to build a company from scratch alongside really passionate people  The gap between who I am and who I wanna be as a professional gets smaller every day here  and that s what defines a good workplace for me     Ingrid  Customer Success Specialist  SwipeGuide is committed to creating a diverse environment influenced by a lifetime of individual experiences  We hire people from all walks of life  not just because it s the right thing to do  but also because when people from diverse backgrounds build a company  the understanding and embracing of their communities grow exponentially  This means our creative and strategic horizons are not only expanding  but they re consistently strengthening  thanks to a global perspective  Therefore  we make a constant effort to follow the right practices and processes so that we do not discriminate based on education  race  religion  colour  national origin  genetics  gender  gender identity  sexual orientation  age  marital status  veteran status  or disability status  Could you see yourself in a similar position  but not this one  We are open to changing this position to suit your skillset  Apply then email ben swipeguide com    we are open to new ideas for this position
