We are looking for a Master Data Analyst to further strengthen the Master Data   Sales Operations Team at Life Fitness  Join the world leader in fitness  What the Master Data   Sales Operations Team does  We ensure that our business has the right data to work with when interacting with the company s ERP systems MS Dynamics AX and Exact  We manage item master data  costs  sales prices  discounts and service related information  We develop and maintain the front end product configurator CPQ system  e Con  which enables sales team members to create quotations in a system with a user friendly interface  correct item and BOM data  Besides that  we work with custom databases that we build   maintain to make our processes more efficient  You will support operations by processing  monitoring and analysing master data  key data  and master relationship data within the organization  Acting as the hands on the ground across the various tools and systems within the International Sales Business Unit  ISBU   You also support daily deliverables across all systems acting as a support in Dynamics  Exact and e Con  You have experience working within a master data team and you can pick up system and process related knowledge very quickly  You can participate in the daily data system process management and besides that you look critically at our systems and processes and come up with suggestions on how to improve our data quality and simplify our processes  We are looking for someone who has experience working with master data processes on ERP systems  preferably someone with experience working on new product introduction projects and or processing item setup across various categories within an ERP system  Task Summary  Participate in the daily item setup master data management and sales operations activities in Dynamics AX e Con Exact  Ensures consistency in master data processes and activities  Execute recurring complex processes and ad hoc projects like cost revaluation  price changes  year end activities etc  Ensures master data integrity in all systems of scope as well as maintaining the processes and documentation to support the data quality  Hands on support in the master data and sales operations tool s assessment and improvement activities  Participate in further roll out and improvements for MS Dynamics AX for master data Who you are   what you can do  WO or HBO with minimum 2 3 years of work experience in master data management  Outstanding Analytical skills Strong communication skills in English Proactiveness in learning and sharing knowledge with the team  Solutions oriented mindset  Strong MS Excel skills Experience with ERP Systems is required   Microsoft Dynamics AX12 is a plus  Experience in an international environment is a plus What we offer  As a part of our Master Data   Sales Operations team  you will work in an open and dynamic department where the work pace is high and not one day is the same  The complexity of the work  the international environment and the possibility to make an important contribution to the success of our organization make this position particularly interesting  Besides that  you will receive competitive compensation  flexible working hours and more attractive benefits  If you are confident that you are the person we are looking for  please send your application and resume preferably through our Application Form  For any questions or further information you can contact Nina Boender  HR Advisor  through WhatsApp telephone number  31 0 6527 44 43

job_desc: We are looking for an Information Data visualization designer   Utrecht  Netherlands in Utrecht  Netherlands Reports to  Head of Product Operations Intellerts is an innovative company  Our goal is to help the business stay ahead of its competitors using Artificial Intelligence  AI  tools  We love to maximize the potential of AI and Data Science  Applying AI requires extensive Data Science expertise we harvest the true value of Big Data  Every day  we translate AI technologies and AI research into new business assets  Three core values drive our company and team culture  mastery   being good at what we do  the pursuit of mastery   autonomy   the ability to decide how we do what we do  right to self organize and self govern   and purpose   to have a clear understanding of why we do what we do  All data has hidden stories  You need to know how to write them  That is where you come in  As a Data visualization designer  you ll be part of our product development team  You will be responsible for the process of using narrative style tactics to bring our data out into the open  where it becomes easier for our audiences to understand and consume it  You will be telling a story about our data  which is fundamental for driving business growth and strategy  You are responsible for  Develop functional and beautiful visualization content and data driven solutions  Create information in a story format presenting information more memorable  persuasive  and engaging  Make data the centrepiece of content such as blog posts and case studies  Articulate findings clearly and concisely and create data driven content with unique narratives for target use cases  including presentations  design solutions  and visualization  Write up your findings in short and long reports  including visually appealing graphs and deep insights based on your analysis  answering the  why  behind the  what   Interact with clients to provide insightful answers to challenging data problems and support them in custom data visualization projects  Support the rest of the data science team in their data and research quests as needed  Work side by side with our data scientists  data engineers  developers  and industry leading clients  Be comfortable with an iterative process to continuously improve data visualizations and design based on stakeholder feedback  Self driven  agile  and able to work independently and on multiple engagements simultaneously  To succeed in this role  you should have the following skills and experience  Proven experience working with data environment and data visualization tools such as Tableau  Power BI  Qlik  D3  ggplot  etc   Basic experience with MS SQL Server  PostgreSQL  Implement processes that improve and lead to greater data quality  Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques  Understanding valuable data sources  automate collection processes  and work with other team members on the integration process  Have interest and knowledge about Graphic Design  Into data journalism  with a background in statistics  applied mathematics  or computer science  Implement processes that improve and lead to greater data quality  Ability to signal the noise in the data and answer the  so what   the question behind the observed numbers and patterns in data  Ability to visualize data effectively  producing eye catching and easy to understand graphs  Excellent presentation skills  Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both Dutch and English  Dutch language skills  A2 level or above In return  we offer you  Autonomy to define how you are going to do work  Flexible working hours  ability to work from home  and professional development  The opportunity to grow in your field in an international company  The opportunity to learn from professionals  Excellent environment to expand your knowledge and skills  Holiday pay  8   Holidays   27 days per year Pension arrangement   Employer contribution of 50  of the pension premium We are a team with challenging goals  Join us  and let s reach the company and your personal goals together  Let s talk  To apply  please send your CV and cover letter to j dobrovolskiene intellerts com Only selected candidates will be informed about the further process

Job Title Data Designer Job Description In this role  you have the opportunity to Unleash the power of design  data and AI to deliver value to people when it matters most  caring for their health  Work in a highly talented team  shape the data and AI design capability  work on exciting challenges in healthcare domain  You will bring the Data Design competence to the next level by leveraging data as design material in the creative process and impact people s health through meaningful data and AI enabled propositions  With your hands on design and programming skills  you bring in a new view on and build exciting new propositions for our users and customers through visualizing and synthesizing on data  We are looking for a Data Design expert that can run projects in the team with high level of independence  This role can be for a computer or data scientist with clear experience in a creative  design environment  able to provide portfolio proving affinity with the design field  On the other hand  this role can be for a UX designer with clear affinity with data  who is able to work hands on with data and program oneself  You are responsible for Building differentiating propositions encompassing data and AI that are relevant to our end users in the healthcare domain Gather  structure  visualize to translate data into insights Support other designers in embedding data and AI into their design practice Bridge the design capabilities with data science AI capabilities Building a toolset and repeatable way of working for data enabled design You are a part of The Data Enabled Design team  a group of data designers with expertise on data visualization  user experience research and prototyping with around data and AI  The Data Enabled Design team is part of global 400  design community and working on both business and research driven projects  To succeed in this role  you should have the following skills and experience University degree  WO HBO  in Design or Computer Science  or related  Hands on programming skills  e g  React  NodeJS  D3  Experience in creating strong design concepts Knowledge and experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence is a pre Independently act in both innovation projects as business projects English verbal and writing In return  we offer you A path towards your most rewarding career  Succeeding in this role in a complex environment will open many doors for your long term career  in other areas in Philips or otherwise  We also believe that we are at our best as a company when you are at yours as a person  Thus  we offer competitive health benefits  a flexible work schedule and access to local well being focused activities  Why should you join Philips  Working at Philips is more than a job  It s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work  focused on improving 2 5 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum  Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways  Learn more by watching this video  To find out more about what it s like working for Philips at a personal level  visit the Working at Philips page on our career website  where you can read stories from our employee blog  Once there you can also learn about our recruitment process  or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions   LI EU

We re Creative Fabrica  a fast scaling tech start up from Amsterdam   Our mission is to change the way people consume digital assets   About the platform  We launched in 2016 as a marketplace for fonts with a subscription service  In the last 6 years we have been through tremendous growth  and we re just getting started   We have scaled to 30 million  monthly page views  viewing over 4 million listed products from 10000  active designers   Our focus is to create a platform for designers that enables them to offer exceptional high quality content  We make their products searchable in unique ways  This allows our customers to speed up their workflow  allowing them to focus on what they love most  Creating   How will you help us   The Head of Data Science   Analytics is the driving force behind the company s data quality  data analytics  data science and experimentation strategy and execution  In this role you will be responsible for attracting and retaining high caliber data analysts and data scientists focused on innovation and rapid iteration  You will report to the VP of Product   You and your team will be owning the data systems for collecting  storing and analyzing data  We are entering a phase of exponential growth and need to scale the tools  data lakes and pipelines to enable data driven product development and decision making at Creative Fabrica   You  along with your team  will dig into the data to uncover insights  identify opportunities for product improvements and new product development  define product metrics with goals  enable experiments and drive customer experience  engagement  and adoption of Creative Fabrica products  As you are building your team we also need you to be hands on and deliver on data needs   Responsibilities  Foster data driven culture of innovation  iteration  and ownership throughout all of Creative Fabrica Recruit  manage and lead a team of world class data analysts and data scientists to support our aggressive growth and deliver key data products and capabilities Be the subject matter expert for driving the product instrumentation  including web tracking tools like Google Analytics and Amplitude  and product data strategy Drive data consistency and quality within a common framework and taxonomy to drive continued improvements to data driven insights across the business Own both the long term technical data strategy and the day to day operations  including fostering innovation and implementing best practices Collaborate with cross functional teams to research  build   improve data analyses to identify opportunities for product improvements  new product features  product utilization and improve customer experience  engagement  and retention Lead the creation of new data driven approaches for the purpose of generating business insights through data analytics  information visualization  and addressing unanswered business issues in a proactive manner Leverage the momentum of the business to create career defining growth opportunities for your team Facilitate Creative Fabrica s development ensuring that data enables continued growth  including marketplace dynamics technologies Design data governance and security protocols Represent the data analytics and data science disciplines throughout the organization  You will have a powerful voice in the company and represent data analytics across different parts of the business  Attract and retain a diverse  high caliber  output oriented team Profile   Essential  Bachelor s degree  or higher  in Data Science  Mathematics  Computer Science  Physics or equivalent  8  years of experience leading and building out a Data Analytics   Data Science team Strong background on Data Engineering and Web tracking tooling  Experience building powerful yet easy to use and adopt data systems and tools supporting high volume and reliable interactive modeling  analysis  and experimentation Proven track record of strong stakeholder management  interacting with senior company leadership on complex issues  Required  Good verbal and written English communication skills Ability to lead and coach while creating a high performance culture  Let us take care of you  Competitive Compensation  We believe that hard work  skills and ambition should be fairly compensated  Flexibility  30 remote days per year  Need a change of scene  Take your laptop Imagine   Imagine  being part of a dynamic and innovative team in the forefront of Global HR Delivery   Solutions  by ensuring a great employee experience through simplified digital products and services  Image you can make the difference by building rock solid Workday HR solutions that s are the foundation for our high tech  high touch strategy  Are you motivated to continuously improve Global HR solutions to meet the needs of the users  This might be the job for you  Workday is our leading global HR solution and the basis of our digitalization roadmap and data driven HR  In May 2019 Workday is implemented in many countries where Rabobank has a presence  Making a difference  As a Data steward you combine strategic vision on master data management with business instinct  You make a difference in providing data driven insights within and outside HR  The Data Steward is responsible for the daily execution of the operational processes in the Data Management   Reporting team  This includes a responsibility for a global data quality framework where the data steward translates information needs from data consumers to data suppliers  The HR Data Steward facilitates the creation of an accurate and unique client data image through execution of the following processes  Identify unique data records and match these into a unique data image Measuring and auditing of data quality Identify data quality shortcomings and act as a liaison for initiating and monitoring a data cleansing process with different  global  Rabobank locations Reviewing and creating work instructions for processes and procedures executed Act as a subject matter expert for any department within Rabobank that requires information and guidance HR data With each other Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do  across functions as well as across geographies  As a Data Steward you become part of the area Global Solutions  Data   Reporting within the HR Global People Services tribe  This area is responsible for implementing the standards for the global HR Solutions way of working  data management and reporting  working with HR teams worldwide  Standards that aim for a world class  agile professional HR organisation that delivers business value through standardisation  automation  increased forecasting capabilities and proactive handling of services  high tech  high touch   With the implementation of Workday we establish the fundament for solid basic HR services across Rabobank worldwide  And that s only the beginning  Simple and digital access to HR information and services will be embedded as part of the end to end employee experience  just as you as a customer expect in your daily live  It s great to take charge of building a HR way of working focused on every day learning to improve the way we deliver our services and make you happy   Robert Rombeek   Lead Global Solutions Support With you Customer focus  strong communications skills  result driven are clearly essential competences   characteristics for the role of Data Steward  In addition  it s important that you recognize yourself in the points below  Bachelor degree with 3 5 years of experience or Master degree with 2 3 years of experience Knowledge of working in an HR Environment Knowledge of translating data into valuable information Understanding of continuous improvement management methodologies Proven analytical capabilities Excellent command of English Besides the Rabobank core competencies of Customer focus and Collaboration  the following competencies are required for this position  Result driven Accurate Analytical Bold Flexible Agility What we offer Would you like to become the ideal version of yourself  We would love to help you achieve this by focusing firmly on your growth  development  and investing in an environment where you keep learning every day  We give you the space to innovate and initiate  In this way  we offer you numerous opportunities to grow and help you exceed your expectations  to do the right thing exceptionally well  and to therefore grow as a professional  In addition  with us  on the basis of a 36 hour working week   you can also expect  a gross monthly salary in salary scale 9 a thirteenth month and holiday pay  an Employee Benefit Budget  10  of your monthly salary   You decide how to spend this budget  This may include purchasing extra leave days  making extra pension contributions or even receiving a monthly cash pay out  a personal budget that you can spend on activities related to your personal development and career  flexible working times and location independent working is negotiable  100  reimbursement of commuting costs if you travel by public transport  Do you still prefer to travel by car or different Business Group to deliver the best cloud and on premises solution   We are seeking a Data Privacy Lead to support the evolution of the Compliance and Security Program  This role will drive Data Privacy practices and provide guidance in identifying global compliance risks  help implement and maintain compliance processes and documentation  In addition  enable our team to implement a GRC tool  focusing on tracking with the Legal team to comply with different local regulations  Finally help build foundation and support our internal and external audits   Duties and Responsibilities  This role will work closely with our internal IT and Tencent cloud product teams  as well as our game studios to build the best Data Privacy program within the Compliance and Security Organization  This role will be responsible for leading IT Risk Analysts to align our processes and best practices over Governance  Risk  and Compliance  Building cross team processes and providing support to build metrics to measure accomplishment and milestones   The scope includes establishing relationships with different teams and building a Security Trust Center to better enable our internal customers to improve their Cybersecurity and Privacy posture  Implement a GRC tool  Improve overseas IT Compliance and Security programs by assessing and recording risks  working with Security engineers to manage technical risks  and providing enablement support for internal and external audits  Collaborate with the Legal and Privacy team to adjust our processes to comply with local regulations   Who we are looking for Self motivated  articulate  passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction Love satisfying customers with state of the art cloud solutions  realizing ideas  building services  and unlocking the potential of new technology  Collaborative  independent  insistent  flexible  and open minded  And you see no conflict in any of these things Knowledgeable  resourceful  and show initiative  You always keep the customer s objectives in mind Positive by nature  a great team player  and both dependable and autonomous Customer oriented  and could work at a very fast pace Requirements Leads and provides guidance in the identification of global compliance risks  implementation  and maintenance of organizational privacy compliance processes and procedures Experience working with Legal to comply with different local regulation Experience with leading GRC implementation tool Conduct Privacy Impact assessment for different Business Group and external vendor Corporate with Data Protection Officer to drive local compliance Oversee and process Personal data breach Incident Assist on vendor Data Privacy assessment Collaborate with Legal on localized compliance need  and translate into controls to be implemented Lead privacy audit such as ISO  GDPR  SOC Certification  CIPM  CIPP E  CISAare a plus About Tencent  Founded in November 1998  Tencent is a leading provider of Internet value added services in China  Since its establishment  Tencent has maintained steady growth under its user oriented operating strategies  On June 16  2004  Tencent Holdings Limited  SEHK 700  went public on the main board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange  Tencent is focused on bringing high quality and engaging internet services and entertainment to its users  In China  Tencent is the largest publisher of online games and we work together with world renown developers such as Activision  Epic Games  Halfbrick Studios  King  and Riot Games

job_desc: We are looking for an Information Data visualization designer   Utrecht  Netherlands in Utrecht  Netherlands Reports to  Head of Product Operations Intellerts is an innovative company  Our goal is to help the business stay ahead of its competitors using Artificial Intelligence  AI  tools  We love to maximize the potential of AI and Data Science  Applying AI requires extensive Data Science expertise we harvest the true value of Big Data  Every day  we translate AI technologies and AI research into new business assets  Three core values drive our company and team culture  mastery   being good at what we do  the pursuit of mastery   autonomy   the ability to decide how we do what we do  right to self organize and self govern   and purpose   to have a clear understanding of why we do what we do  All data has hidden stories  You need to know how to write them  That is where you come in  As a Data visualization designer  you ll be part of our product development team  You will be responsible for the process of using narrative style tactics to bring our data out into the open  where it becomes easier for our audiences to understand and consume it  You will be telling a story about our data  which is fundamental for driving business growth and strategy  You are responsible for  Develop functional and beautiful visualization content and data driven solutions  Create information in a story format presenting information more memorable  persuasive  and engaging  Make data the centrepiece of content such as blog posts and case studies  Articulate findings clearly and concisely and create data driven content with unique narratives for target use cases  including presentations  design solutions  and visualization  Write up your findings in short and long reports  including visually appealing graphs and deep insights based on your analysis  answering the  why  behind the  what   Interact with clients to provide insightful answers to challenging data problems and support them in custom data visualization projects  Support the rest of the data science team in their data and research quests as needed  Work side by side with our data scientists  data engineers  developers  and industry leading clients  Be comfortable with an iterative process to continuously improve data visualizations and design based on stakeholder feedback  Self driven  agile  and able to work independently and on multiple engagements simultaneously  To succeed in this role  you should have the following skills and experience  Proven experience working with data environment and data visualization tools such as Tableau  Power BI  Qlik  D3  ggplot  etc   Basic experience with MS SQL Server  PostgreSQL  Implement processes that improve and lead to greater data quality  Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques  Understanding valuable data sources  automate collection processes  and work with other team members on the integration process  Have interest and knowledge about Graphic Design  Into data journalism  with a background in statistics  applied mathematics  or computer science  Implement processes that improve and lead to greater data quality  Ability to signal the noise in the data and answer the  so what   the question behind the observed numbers and patterns in data  Ability to visualize data effectively  producing eye catching and easy to understand graphs  Excellent presentation skills  Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both Dutch and English  Dutch language skills  A2 level or above In return  we offer you  Autonomy to define how you are going to do work  Flexible working hours  ability to work from home  and professional development  The opportunity to grow in your field in an international company  The opportunity to learn from professionals  Excellent environment to expand your knowledge and skills  Holiday pay  8   Holidays   27 days per year Pension arrangement   Employer contribution of 50  of the pension premium We are a team with challenging goals  Join us  and let s reach the company and your personal goals together  Let s talk  To apply  please send your CV and cover letter to j dobrovolskiene intellerts com Only selected candidates will be informed about the further process

job_desc: About Apeiron Insight Apeiron Insight is a data driven research   analytics company  providing insights   data products to investment companies for them to make better informed  investment  decisions  The amount of data is growing exponentially and it is becoming more difficult to distinguish signal from the noise  We deliver actionable intelligence by leveraging the power of predictive modelling   Machine Learning  Apeiron Insight is growing fast and we are hiring for a number of roles in multiple disciplines  Your role at Apeiron Insight We are looking for an Data Research Analyst to assist in leading a data driven research approach to covering companies the telecoms sectors  You will be responsible for generating and publishing investment research  The responsibilities for this role include using proprietary data sets to build financial and statistical models  perform data analysis  write reports  update marketing materials  and service client requests  The individual should be proficient with Excel  mathematical modeling  and have a basic understanding of financial statements and accounting  Experience with Python  SQL  or R is highly preferred  The individual should also be an effective written and verbal communicator  Additionally  the candidate must be self motivated  detail oriented  and a creative thinker who has interest   curiosity in the intersection of  alternative data   investment research  and financial markets  Responsibilities Development and deployment of predictive models for estimation and prediction of corporate performance across the telecommunation sector  Identify and execute creative ways to answer key industry questions using our proprietary data and insights  Gather and analyze data from a variety of internal and external resources  including  but not limited to  proprietary datasets  company documents and materials  SEC regulatory filings such as annual reports and 10Ks  industry publications  and online data services  Write  edit  and publish equity research reports incorporating insights derived from financial and statistical models  Vet new and unique data sets for relevancy to continually improve and broaden our scope and accuracy  Perform ad hoc analyses in response to client requests  Support the sales process by developing analyses for sales pitches and press releases  What are we looking for  Functional understanding of data analysis using Python  SQL or R is a must  Ability to identify and work with strategic data partners  Responsible for forecasting KPIs and identifying key business industry trends based on use of alternative data  Experience working with and analyzing large data sets and in developing actionable intelligence from the data  Self starter who works well in a fast paced environment  Team player  happy to work in closed proximity with the Data Engineering   the Management team  You are currently living in the Netherlands and are able to fluently communicate in English  verbally and in writing   Command of the Dutch language is a plus  Enjoy working in a cool   stylish office  overlooking the Hague  with excellent facilities  We also really appreciate  Strong mathematical and statistical background  An intuitive understanding of business problems  What to expect  We believe in commitment  your permanent contract will be waiting for you  Highly competitive salary tailored to your qualities   experience  Bonus scheme  8  holiday payment  25 vacation days based on a 40 hour working week  Personal education study budget  An informal working environment with innovative colleagues who strive for the very best  Based in Rijswijk  of course in  hybrid mode   working from home and office as best fits the nature of the work  If you think this position fits you well  we sincerely hope to hear from you  If so  please submit your resume and motivation letter

job_desc: This is Adyen  Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world s leading companies  delivering frictionless payments across online  mobile  and in store channels  Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day  We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team  And together  we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays   We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company  building a platform from scratch  Now  Adyen serves the world s brightest companies like Facebook  Uber  L Oreal  Casper  Bonobos  and Spotify   Our engineers are reshaping the payments landscape  We re looking for more talented problem solvers to help us address a unique set of challenges   As Adyen is growing  one of the ways for us to improve the experience of our merchants is to improve our use of data  for example for fraud detection or conversion optimization  That is why we are looking for a passionate coder  writer  and communicator to help drive our data science and engineering experience at Adyen as well as helping us show the external world our advancements and achievements around data and machine learning   You will be part of our advocacy team  based in Amsterdam and report to Engineering  Here  you will get familiar with and work on the payment industry s most advanced and robust platform   What you ll do Extend bridges from Adyen to the world data community by scouting  keeping tuned and participating or enabling the participation of the Adyen data people in industry developments  conferences  podcasts and popular sites and communities  Develop  strengthen and grow relationships with partners and universities  Build example algorithms  pipeline examples and notebooks to help partners and engineers use and understand Adyen s data products and features  Help empower the internal community by organizing internal lectures and alignment sessions  even inviting external guest speakers and curating a newsletter with internal developments and public articles on relevant developments to the Adyen data community  Work together with the Tech Academy team in recognizing new learning areas and crafting training sessions and courses  Identify open source opportunities and ideas that we would like to explore and possibly adopt and contribute to  Own the on boarding process for new data and machine learning scientists  engineers and analysts  Contribute to our technical documentation and tech blog  Be the voice of the data and machine learning scientists and engineers  gathering feedback and sharing it with internal stakeholders Work with a global team  including international travel to visit our different offices or participate and run events Who you are You have technical experience in data science and machine learning algorithms and methodologies  You are experienced in one or more machine learning  data science and big data frameworks and tools  Airflow  TensorFlow  Spark   You have a good graph of the data science ecosystem  events  conferences  support channels  tech personalities and trends  You have experience with technical writing and or blogging on development topics  You are passionate about new technologies and open source  You love working with people and making their day happier  These are not required but would be a plus  Background in event production  including hosting  organizing and participating in developer community events Knowledge in payments or fintech Contribution to opensource projects Please  note that this role is a full time position in Amsterdam  It will require a relocation in case you live outside of the Netherlands   Our Diversity  Equity and Inclusion commitments  Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives  This diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum  Our business and technical challenges are unique  we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them   voices like yours  So no matter where you re from  who you love  or what you believe in  we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen   Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100  of the qualifications  Even if you don t meet 100  of the criteria then Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply  We look forward to your application

The challenge To keep customer data complete  right and up to date  we have to reach out to hundreds of thousands of customers  That requires an efficient and customer friendly solution  online  but also offline for customers that aren t able or willing to do their banking online  What questions do we have to ask to receive the right information  What do our supervisors require from us  How to seduce our clients to share the information  How to validate  verify and process the gathered information  How to structurally keep the data up to date  Can we prevent doing an outreach by designing automated fixes or buying the data externally  Or design a robot   Are you on the edge of your seat now  For everything we do as a bank  data quality is key  To ensure this data quality we have several multidisciplinary teams  We are looking for a business analyst to support product managers and squads in analyzing issues and designing and implementing solutions to solve and prevent data quality issues  You will be working with product managers  data stewards  customer data experts  architects  developers and stakeholders within Tribe Digital Customer Processes  Tribe Data   Analytics  Tribe KYC Tech  Operations  Compliance  Legal and Risk to achieve you own and shared goals  Create an Impact As a business analyst within the Digital Customer Processes tribe  you are responsible for the analysis of complex issues that require cross team and cross system solutions  You will be part of the Client Data Quality area in which you will be responsible to identify impact and model  assess and document the functional and non functional design of the business requirements  You create overview and understand the big picture that needs to be resolved  You are decisive  know how to involve stakeholders at the right moment and you come up with clear advice and solutions that are aligned with both business and architecture  The first two topics you will be working on together with the product managers are  1  remediation of full given names and  2  enabling customers to update and verify their own client profile  Both are mandatory to for the success on the number one CEP  KYC  Your contribution Analyze data and data quality issues to find the root causes Advise on and design solutions for our issues  Your ideas go further than only technical solutions  you cover unhappy flows and take the devil in the detail into account  Translate business requirements into high level designs that are input for detailing and development of functionality by the DevOps teams  Backlog management and writing user stories  Conduct business impact analyses on themes and epics  Manage and maintain relations with stakeholders  You promote the importance of data quality in your environment  Challenge your peers on proposed solutions and decisions  Be a conversation partner for the area triangle  Arealead Architect  IT lead   Give input to the architecture and product management visions  Your profile Experience HBO WO level  preferably in Business Administration  Information management  Computer Science or equivalent  Experience in or affinity with the financial sector  At least 10 years of experience in business analysis  At least 5 years of experience in implementing complex systems in large corporate environments in a business analyst role  Broad experience in data management and or data quality management Experience with the Agile way of working  Competencies Analytical Collaborative Results driven Good negotiation skills Good verbal and written communication  Dutch and English  Organising and monitoring Pro active Good presentation skills Happy people You are happy and lose track of time when digging in details of data and unraveling unhappy flows With each other  The Area Client Data Quality together with six other areas forms the Tribe Digital Customer Processes  They ensure that processes between customer and Rabobank are smooth and flawless  Within the tribe the Area Client Data Quality is responsible for the accelerated resolution of customer data quality issues  Growing a better world together You ll already be aware that Rabobank is a financial services provider for 9 5 million customers in 40 countries  But did you know that we aim to contribute to real change with our  Growing a better world together  mission  We do so in countless ways  such as  Together with the world Wildlife Fund  we re helping to create a harmonious balance between nature and the agricultural sector in Brazil  We make sizeable annual investments in the voluntary sector in the Netherlands  This allows us to support about 1 250 sport and cultural organisations that are a second home to many people  Your reward Do you want to become the ideal version of yourself  We would love to help you achieve this by focusing firmly on your growth  development  and investing in an environment where you keep learning every day  We give you the space to innovate and initiate  In this way  we offer you numerous opportunities to grow and help you exceed your expectations  to do the right thing exceptionally well  and to therefore grow as a professional  In addition  with us  on the basis of a 36 hour working week   you can also expect  a gross monthly salary is scaled in function group 9 or 10  a thirteenth month and holiday pay  an Employee Benefit Budget  10   of your monthly salary   You decide how to spend this budget  This may include purchasing extra leave days  making extra pension contributions or even receiving extra cash on a monthly basis  a personal budget that you can spend on activities related to your personal development and career  100  reimbursement of commuting costs if you travel by public transport  Do you still prefer to travel by car or motorbike  Then choose a commuting allowance  a pension scheme  to which your contribution is only 3 5   Good to know  Apply via the button  Apply now   Responses will be handled in accordance with our vacancy management policy  Senior Recruiter Frank Simons  email  frank simons rabobank nl The application process includes screening  Based on the screening procedures in place at Rabobank  we assess whether new staff are reliable enough to work at Rabobank  Everyone is different  and it is exactly those differences that help us become an even better bank  That s why we want to know who you really are

Wie zijn wij  Al meer dan 50 jaar richt Intergas  sinds 2019 onderdeel van het Amerikaanse bedrijf Rheem  zich op het perfectioneren van verwarmingssystemen  In die periode is Intergas uitgegroeid tot marktleider op het gebied van hoog rendement cv ketels  Die status verplicht ons om ook in de toekomst oplossingen te bedenken en te ontwikkelen die voldoen aan de vraag naar comfortabele warmte  Met slimme en innovatieve producten  maar ook met duurzame energiebronnen en hightech warmte oplossingen die beantwoorden aan de energietransitie  Daarbij geloven we in een toekomst waarin ruimte is voor meerdere warmte oplossingen naast elkaar  Geavanceerde oplossingen als all electric en hybridetoestellen  maar ook de  conventionele  gasgestookte cv ketel  Zo zijn we voortdurend bezig om onze grenzen te verkennen en te verleggen  Het uitgangspunt is steeds hetzelfde  het ontwikkelen en produceren van betrouwbare warmtebronnen met een hoog rendement  De vestiging in Coevorden telt ruim 350 medewerkers   Wat ga jij doen  Als Master Data Specialist analyseer je data van onze bedrijfsprocessen en systemen  Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de kwaliteit van data en data integratie binnen de systemen bij Intergas  Je hebt veel contact met collega s over de inrichting van systemen en adviseert interne stakeholders over datakwaliteitsverbeteringen   Jouw werkzaamheden zullen onder andere bestaan uit Het vormgeven aan governance rondom het gebruik van data  analyses en rapportage Je ontwerpt en implementeert corporate datamodellen en business intelligence Het zorgdragen voor een juist verloop van data entry processen  Het ontwerpen  bouwen  testen en beheren van het datawarehouse Je stelt gebruikers in staat om de gewenste en benodigde data analyses te produceren door middel van het datawarehouse Het inspelen  participeren en oplossingsgericht beantwoorden van vragen die uit de business komen Draagt bij aan overige werkzaamheden binnen het team   Als Master Data Specialist ben jij onderdeel van de afdeling ICT  die bestaat uit een IT generalist  twee applicatiebeheerders en een Manager ICT  Je rapporteert aan de Manager ICT   Wat breng jij mee  Jij neemt een gezonde dosis enthousiasme en proactiviteit mee en bent een echte teamplayer  Het werken met data en het continu verbeteren van processen geeft jou energie   Daarnaast zijn de volgende aspecten belangrijk voor ons Een afgeronde Bacheloropleiding  bij voorkeur in de richting van bedrijfskunde en of informatica Beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift Je bent in staat om effectief te presenteren en om te communiceren met de verschillende stakeholders Je begrijpt de uitdagingen in een productie en sales omgeving Bij voorkeur heb je al enkele jaren relevante werkervaring   Wat krijg je ervoor terug  Een uitdagende en afwisselende functie binnen een gezonde organisatie met ambitie  De werksfeer is informeel en je krijgt voldoende kansen om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen  Je werktijden zijn flexibel en je hebt de mogelijkheid om thuis te werken  Met 27 vakantiedagen en 13 ATV dagen  op fulltime basis  is er voldoende ruimte om te genieten van je vrije tijd Want to build a stronger  more sustainable future and cultivate your career  Join Cargill s global team of 155 000 employees who are committed to safe  responsible and sustainable ways to nourish the world  This position is in Cargill s food ingredients and bio industrial business  where we anticipate trends around taste  nutrition and safety to innovate and provide solutions to manufacturers  retailers and foodservice companies  Job Purpose and Impact  The Data and Analytics Business Analyst will be part of the data and analytics team and help drive the transformation towards a data driven organization  Our aim is to empower the business to unlock value from data assets  uplift analytical capabilities and support data driven decision making across the organization  As a Data and Analytics Business Analyst  you will work closely with business teams to help explore how data and analytics solutions can address business needs  Together with business and technical stakeholders at the group  functional and regional level you will co create and deliver data and analytics solutions  Key Accountabilities Collaborate with businesses and product teams to translate business problems and opportunities into data and analytics requirements and solutions  Facilitate requirements gathering sessions with business  data and technology stakeholders and document requirements  Analyze and interpret requirements and prioritize them in alignment with the data and analytics strategy and roadmap  Drive cross functional and global regional data and analytics initiatives  Partner collaboratively with business  data  and IT teams to explore and deliver data in new and useful ways that enables data driven decision making  Help drive the adoption of new data and analytics solutions within our businesses and coach users to assess  analyze and access data via various data and analytics tools  Independently handle complex issues with minimal supervision  while escalating only the most complex issues to appropriate staff  Other duties as assigned Qualifications  MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor s degree in a related field or equivalent experience Business acumen and the ability to partner and communicate effectively with business counterparts Experience in translating business requirements into data solutions Experience with data analytics tools and applications Experience in extracting data from databases and other applications such as cloud based Data Lake Experience in writing SQL queries Minimum of four years of related work experience  PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS Experience in data visualization tools like Tableau or PowerBI to develop dashboards  Experience in data engineering  data modeling and data science  Experience working with KNIME or Alteryx  Our Offer We provide a fast paced stimulating international environment  which will stretch your abilities and channel your talents  We also offer competitive salary and benefits combined with outstanding career development opportunities in one of the largest and most solid private companies in the world   Interested  Then make sure to send us your CV and cover letter in English today  Follow us on LinkedIn  https   www linkedin com company cargill Cargill is committed to being an inclusive employer  Click here to find out more https   careers cargill com diversity

job_title: IV Expert Data en Business Intelligence
job_desc: De functie Opdracht omschrijving Politiewerk draait meer en meer om de beschikbaarheid en het gebruik van data en informatie  Voor de politie is informatie dan ook van levensbelang waarbij de politie zich steeds meer ontwikkelt tot een data gedreven organisatie  Intelligence gaat over binnen wettelijke kaders en privacy richtlijnen relevante data bij elkaar brengen en daar betekenis aan geven  Zodanig dat er informatie ontstaat die gebruikt kan worden voor een betere en veiligere uitvoering van het werk  Zowel in de dagelijkse operatie  als bij het nemen van beslissingen binnen de opsporing  handhaving en bedrijfsvoering  In toenemende mate werkt de politie daarin samen met partners om maatschappelijke en veiligheidsvraagstukken op te lossen  De productielijn BI richt zich op het ontsluiten en beschikbaar maken van data uit een groot aantal uiteenlopende bronnen  Er wordt gebruik gemaakt van  state of the art  cloud  en big data technologie  Gelijk vervullen de meer traditionele data warehouse concepten nog steeds een grote rol  Dit resulteert in concrete datamarts  generiek inzetbare dataservices en het leveren van gegevens aan afnemende voorzieningen of partners in het veiligheidsdomein  De realisatie van IV voorzieningen is georganiseerd binnen de landelijke dienst ICT  Om de verbinding tussen realisatie enerzijds en strategie en functionele behoeften anderzijds maximaal te laten aansluiten  heeft de dienst IM de verantwoordelijkheid om te komen tot goede uitgewerkte voorstellen die in uitvoering genomen worden  Binnen de realisatietrajecten  agile teams  heeft de dienst IM de verantwoordelijkheid de gebruikersorganisatie te ondersteunen in het formuleren van haar behoefte en het ondersteunen van de Product Owner bij het opstellen en prioriteren van de backlog  De Dienst IM is op zoek naar een ervaren IV expert op het terrein van Data en  Business  Intelligence  Hierbij wordt specifiek gezocht naar kandidaten die ervaring hebben met het ontsluiten en gebruiken van  big  data  logical data warehouses en het ontwikkelen van generieke services op cloud technologie  Je bent medeverantwoordelijk voor het adequaat laten werken van de informatievoorzieningsketen  van beleidsthema s tot applicaties en systemen  Je adviseert en regisseert bij de intake  vormgeving en uitvoering van realisatieopdrachten  Je draagt zorg voor een goede vraagarticulatie aan de hand van IV verzoeken vanuit de business en verricht de benodigde analyses en vooronderzoeken  Hierbij houd je rekening met de IV strategie en de BI job_desc: As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

Grasp the Opportunity  The key to success of a winning trade can be found in the fluid processing of the latest relevant data  As a Business Intelligence Data Analyst you should be capable of creating a bridge between the Business and IT  Connecting and translating the requirements of the traders and trading analysts into data requirements  automation of operational processes and providing new dashboards and quick tools to help the traders in their trading decisions  As Business Analyst you will be the spider in the web  the central person  to enable new developments  You will combine your skills in programming  SQL and business expertise to deliver information solutions to improve business processes and productivity   Along the way you will be coordinating the implementation of new data sources and assisting the trading analysts with their data extractions  Together with the software engineers you will develop and organize the data structure capable for handling these new relevant information sources and build the foundation blocks of the technology ready for the energy transition   Interested   Do you like to see the trading in real practice or directly want to apply for this job  Please submit your resume  motivation and grade list to careers northpool nl or contact us at  31 0 88 2400 300  We will respond to your application as soon as possible   Acquisition based on this vacancy is not appreciated  Contact us We ask  An analytical  quantitative or IT degree at BSc or MSc level Capability to translate business requirements into technical solutions Extensive experience performing SQL data analysis and or reporting 5  years work experience in commercial environment Experience with business intelligence and data visualization tools like power BI Excellent social and communication skills We like  Interest in trading and or the energy markets Experience with database architecture Familiar with Java  Python and or R Attention to detail and the ability to learn quickly Knowledge about cloud solutions Experience with data mining  using various methods for research We offer  Competitive compensation package Annual company performance based bonuses A non hierarchical workplace Young and highly motivated teammates High responsibility An office that s fun to work in

As Data Scientist you will work for one of the biggest dairy companies in the world  The business group Food   Beverages offers consumers all over the world a wealth of high quality  delicious and nutritious products  such as milk  yoghurt  condensed milk  dairy based beverages  cheese  butter  cream and many more  The business group has brands such as Campina  Olper s and Peak in its portfolio  You will work in the global DMI Team  which represents Digital  Media  Insight  Data   Analytics and eCommerce  In your role as Data Scientist  you join a team of experts in data science  Together they help to further accelerate our digital transformation by developing top notch and scalable data driven tools and by providing actionable insights from the most advanced modeling techniques  Your activities will span across both global business group and local operating company  What we ask You are customer focused and able to act with speed and decisiveness to achieve the best results You take responsibility for your work and are continuously looking for new opportunities to make a change You set the right priorities and you have strong communication skills You are proactive in your analyzing data for a better understanding of how the business performs You collaborate with product and business owners to understand company needs and devise solutions You have  Master s degree in a quantitative field  econometrics  physics  mathematics  artificial intelligence  data science  5  years  experience and relevant track record working in international environments with experience as a data scientist or advanced analyst Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and experience with common data science toolkits  e g   R  Python  SQL  etc   Experience in applying Advanced analytical techniques on topics such as Market mix modeling  Price elasticity  Demand Forecasting Experience using tools for business intelligence  data visualization  presentation techniques  and MS Office suite in general or proven agility in the adoption of various toolsWhat we offer A challenging job in data science  that allows you to make an impact to our company on a global scale and allows you to work in a dynamic and international team of experts We have access to top notch tooling to ensure we provide the best quality output efficiently We work from our headquarters in Amersfoort  the Netherlands   and from our  home offices  when required  We strive for flexibility when it comes to working locations in offices or working from home We offer a competitive compensation and benefits such as holiday scheme  travel allowance  pension  laptop  etc Vacancy description As Data scientist in our team  you will be working on larger projects as well as ad hoc analytical tasks that help accelerate our digital transformation and help the business group make data driven decisions on both strategical and tactical levels  Our output should ultimately benefit both our consumers  our customers and our company  Win Win   Your activities will span across both global business group and local operating companies  In your role you are involved in the start to end delivery of our projects and deliverables  from data processing and verification through data science and machine learning applications and into output that is presented in a clear manner to the audience in question  You are proactive in analyzing data for a better understanding of how the business performs  You collaborate with product and business owners to understand company needs and devise solutions  You create and enhance various machine learning based tools that offer significant business value  such as recommendation engines or automated lead scoring systems  You actively contribute to the creation of the vision   roadmap for analytical products and data science applications

job_desc: Eindhoven Do you enjoy building in depth understanding of our business processes by deep diving into data  and turning this information and insights and creating applications with business stakeholders  Then you are the Data Analyst we are looking for    Your challenges   The mission of the data analyst is to draw fact based conclusions based on available data  You will create reports and small applications for this  As a Data Analyst you will also participate in improvement programs   As a Data Analyst you take responsibility to   Create in depth understanding of the business problems the stakeholders face  Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends and patterns to clarify and detail our understanding of the issues  Find and combine  structured and unstructured  data Clean and prepare data for processing  statistical analysis and  predictive  modelling Transform data into information and insights Directly manage stakeholders of your analysis by involving them on developments in your work Take ownership over your team s work to together create a successful end product challenge business assumptions using fact based analyses on business process data  What do we expect from you   To succeed in this role  you should have the following skills and experience   Excellent analytical skills including statistics on BSc  Level Between the 3 6 years of experience in data analytics  Business Intelligence  databases and related techniques Knowledge of data cleaning  modelling  and transformation  Good knowledge of data analytics methods and tools  like datamining  machine learning  predictive modelling  SQL  R  Phyton  Matlab  Tableau  etc   and affinity with IT systems applications  Experience with applications like Spotfire  Mendix  SAP HANA  Excel  SQL and Python  Good communications skills  verbally and in writing in both Dutch and English Pro  active  enthusiastic and critical towards representativeness and accuracy of results   What does our Business Cell have to offer   We have a highly specialized and varied team  This provides a lot of expertise and knowledge that you can learn a lot from   With our strong network and your personal ambition  we will ensure a wonderful career together     What can you expect from TMC   TMC is an international high tech consultancy company that brings expertise to their clients in order to support them with the realization of their technological challenges  As such  TMC is operating as an expert center at the disposition of its clients and we help them to be more competitive in an ever more global and faster changing technological world   At TMC we believe that people are the driving force behind technological innovation  That is why we want to create the best possible conditions for tech talents to thrive in  We offer you a challenging and stimulating work environment in which you can be the director of your own career  As an Employeneur you are part of our TMC family  Next to our outstanding technical expertise  fun and engagement are meaningful parts of our culture    Why choose for Employeneurship   We are truly unique thanks to our Employeneurship model which is a true innovation for the High Technology consulting business  It is the business relationship of the 21th century for high skilled technical professionals  It is built around 5 main pillars   You will have a permanent employment contract  offering you stability and security You will get to know your market value and have a share in the profit your work generates thanks to the individual profit sharing We will support you with a one on one coaching and trainings designed to help you develop your entrepreneurial skills The competence cells structure  provides you with a strong meaningful and relevant network The entrepreneurial lab  a playground for new ideas and a potential launching for start ups TMC is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity  We do not discriminate on the basis of race  religion  color  national origin  gender  sexual orientation  age  marital status  veteran status  or disability status Is TMC a perfect fit for you  Feel Free to Contact Marnix Bosch Business Manager Data Science  Netherlands Tel   31  0 6 15 57 86 19

blij van deze functie Wat ga jij doen Steek die handen maar uit de mouwen  want als data analist bij Freshheads heb je een uiteenlopende functie waarbij je niet alleen bezig bent met data analyse  maar ook betrokken bent bij andere stappen binnen innovatie  en groeiprojecten  Samen met collega s start je met het ontdekken van de groeikansen voor de producten  website  app of campagne van een klant  Wanneer jullie samen een geschikte strategie hebben bepaald richt jij je op het implementeren van de juiste data analysetools  Dankzij jouw kennis over programmeertalen zorg jij ervoor dat jullie geen data mislopen Jouw liefde voor cijfers komt optimaal tot uiting wanneer je de data gaat analyseren  Jij ziet meteen waar kansen en pijnpunten liggen  Aan de hand van een visualisatie van de data in een dashboard leg je aan je team en de klant uit waar ze staan ten opzichte van hun doelen  Daarbij kom je met concrete voorbeelden  bedenk je relevante acties en of kom je proactief met verbetervoorstellen Bij Freshheads zijn acht teams iedere dag bezig met het realiseren van relevante digitale producten en diensten  Op dit moment zijn we op zoek naar een data analist die alle teams gaat helpen bij datavraagstukken van diverse klanten Met wie ga je dit doen Als nieuwe data analist sta je er natuurlijk niet alleen voor  Jij wordt de compagnon van data analist Nienke  Naast tennis en Nick   Simon is Nienke dol op cijfers  al helemaal op oplopende cijfers  Bijna 4 jaar geleden begon ze dan ook als eerste data analist bij Freshheads  Daardoor kan ze jou alle fijne kneepjes van voeten met SQL  En R of Python zijn mooi meegenomen  maar geen must  Helder communiceren en adviseren gaat je goed af  Je weet inzichten uit data op de juiste manier te verwoorden en klanten en job_title: Data Analyst, CO Business Reporting & Analytics
job_desc: Community Operations  focus is on supporting our users through both direct support interactions as well as scalable solutions  and on improving the health of our products by helping people understand how to use them  Those who join our teams are very passionate about solving people s issues  and are strong advocates for the Facebook community  We need influencers who can align cross functional partners to ensure the best possible experience for our platforms  If you like helping people  Community Operations is for you  Facebook is seeking an analytical and data savvy self starter with a passion for helping others and protecting our community  We value people who can strategically drive the team using macro level insights  while still caring for micro level cases affecting people around the globe  We re targeting a disciplined  intellectually curious  and creative individual who is comfortable operating in ambiguity a strategic thinker with strong analytical and creative problem solving skills  As a Data Analyst for Community Operations  you will be directly responsible for ensuring that we effectively monitor and improve our global operations  deeply understand issues that impact our communities globally  and work closely with operations  Analytics  and Engineering partners to set the right business priorities to best support the community Data Analyst  CO Business Reporting   Analytics Responsibilities  Work with cross functional partners and internal tooling to provide best in class monitoring and alerting for our global support operations  by way of dashboards  ad hoc data pulls  and regular business reviews Apply your expertise in quantitative business analysis  technical knowledge  and presentation of data to identify trends and opportunities in driving down nefarious behaviour Partner with Engineering  Analytics  and operations partners to identify  influence  and execute our abuse fighting strategies to improve the user experience on the site Partner with analytics and data engineering teams to identify and close gaps in logging and data infrastructure At scale  address sensitive content issues  including but not limited to graphic images  videos and writings  offensive or derogatory language  and other objectionable materialMinimum Qualifications  BA BS degree in Computer Science  Statistics  Finance Commerce  Physics  Applied Economics or similar technical field 2  years of work experience in an Analytics role involving strategy  problem solving  or technical systems Experience with data analysis and visualisation tools  SQL  Tableau  etc   Analytical thinker who can break down complex problems using data and technology Experience communicating effectively to technical and non technical audiences Experience solving ambiguous problems Experience thinking under pressure  both individually and in team environment Experience adapting to a fast paced  fast changing environment  juggling multiple priorities and stakeholdersPreferred Qualifications  Master s or other advanced degree in engineering or technical scientific field of study or equivalent practical experience  Experience at a leading management consulting firm or corporate strategy team for a technology firm  software  internet and or media industry   Familiarity with internet policy and regulatory environments  Online operations experience  Experience with computer programming  scripting languages  market analysis  or strategic analysis
